speaker: Narrator
text: Once upon a time, in the magical land of Equestria, there were two regal sisters who ruled together and created harmony for all the land. To do this, the eldest used her unicorn powers to raise the sun at dawn; the younger brought out the moon to begin the night. Thus, the two sisters maintained balance for their kingdom and their subjects, all the different types of ponies. But as time went on, the younger sister became resentful. The ponies relished and played in the day her elder sister brought forth, but shunned and slept through her beautiful night. One fateful day, the younger unicorn refused to lower the moon to make way for the dawn. The elder sister tried to reason with her, but the bitterness in the young one's heart had transformed her into a wicked mare of darkness: Nightmare Moon.

speaker: Narrator
text: She vowed that she would shroud the land in eternal night. Reluctantly, the elder sister harnessed the most powerful magic known to ponydom: the Elements of Harmony. Using the magic of the Elements of Harmony, she defeated her younger sister, and banished her permanently in the moon. The elder sister took on responsibility for both...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Narrator
text: *...sun and moon...*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *...and harmony has been maintained in Equestria for generations since.* Hmm... Elements of Harmony. I know I've heard of those before... but where?

speaker: Twinkleshine
text: There you are, Twilight! Moon Dancer is having a little get-together in the west castle courtyard. You wanna come?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, sorry, girls... I've got a lot of studying to catch up on.

speaker: Twinkleshine
text: [sigh] Does that pony do anything except study? I think she's more interested in books than friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know I've heard of the Elements of Harmony.

speaker: Spike
text: Ow!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! Spi-ike! Spike?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There you are. Quick, find me that old copy of *Predictions and Prophecies*. What's that for?

speaker: Spike
text: Well, it *was* a gift for Moon Dancer, but...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh Spike, you know we don't have time for that sort of thing.

speaker: Spike
text: But we're on a break!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, no, no... no, no, no! [grunts] *Spike*!

speaker: Spike
text: It's over here!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ah! *Elements*, *Elements*, E, E, E... Aha! *Elements of Harmony, see: Mare in the Moon*?

speaker: Spike
text: *Mare in the Moon*? But that's just an old ponies' tale.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mare, mare... aha! *The Mare in the Moon, myth from olden pony times. A powerful pony who wanted to rule Equestria, defeated by the Elements of Harmony and imprisoned in the moon. Legend has it that on the longest day of the thousandth year, the stars will aid in her escape, and she will bring about nighttime eternal*! [gasp] Spike! Do you know what this means?

speaker: Spike
text: No-- whoa!

speaker: Spike
text: Ow!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Take a note please, to the Princess.

speaker: Spike
text: Okie dokie.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *My dearest teacher, my continuing studies of pony magic have led me to discover that we are on the precipice of disaster!*

speaker: Spike
text: Hold on. Preci... preci...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Threshold.

speaker: Spike
text: Threh...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, brink? Ugh, that something really bad is about to happen! *For you see, the mythical Mare in the Moon is in fact Nightmare Moon, and she's about to return to Equestria, and bring with her eternal night! Something must be done to make sure this terrible prophecy does not come true. I await your quick response. Your faithful student, Twilight Sparkle.*

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight Sparkle. Got it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Great! Send it.

speaker: Spike
text: Now?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course!

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, I dunno, Twilight, Princess Celestia's a little busy getting ready for the Summer Sun Celebration. And it's like, the day after tomorrow.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's just it, Spike. The day after tomorrow is the thousandth year of the Summer Sun Celebration! It's imperative that the Princess is told right away!

speaker: Spike
text: Impera... impera...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Important*!

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa!

speaker: Spike
text: Okay, okay! [inhale] There, it's on its way. But I wouldn't hold your breath...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I'm not worried, Spike. The Princess trusts me completely. In all the years she's been my mentor she's never once doubted me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See? I knew she would want to take immediate action.

speaker: Spike
text: [clears throat] *My dearest, most faithful student Twilight. You know that I value your diligence and that I trust you completely.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mm-hm!

speaker: Spike
text: *...but you simply must stop reading those dusty old books!*

speaker: Spike
text: *My dear Twilight, there is more to a young pony's life than studying, so I'm sending you to supervise the preparations for the Summer Sun Celebration in this year's location: Ponyville. And, I have an even more essential task for you to complete: make some friends!*

speaker: Spike
text: Look on the bright side, Twilight. The Princess arranged for you to stay in a library. Doesn't that make you happy?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, yes it does. You know why? Because I'm right! I'll check on the preparations as fast as I can, then get to the library to find some proof of Nightmare Moon's return.

speaker: Spike
text: Then... when will you make friends, like the Princess said?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She *said* to check on preparations. I am her student, and I'll do my royal duty, but the fate of Equestria does not rest on me making friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank you, sirs.

speaker: Spike
text: Maybe the ponies in Ponyville have interesting things to talk about. Come on, Twilight, just try!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um... hello?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, that was interesting all right.

speaker: Spike
text: Summer Sun Celebration official overseer's checklist. Number one, banquet preparations: Sweet Apple Acres.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeehaw!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] Let's get this over with... Good afternoon. My name is Twilight Sparkle--

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, howdy-doo, Miss Twilight, a pleasure makin' your acquaintance. I'm Applejack. We here at Sweet Apple Acres sure do like making new friends!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Friends? Actually, I--

speaker: Applejack
text: So, what can I do you for?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [clears throat] Well, I am in fact here to supervise preparations for the Summer Sun Celebration. And you're in charge of the food?

speaker: Applejack
text: We sure as sugar are! Would you care to sample some?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: As long as it doesn't take too long...

speaker: Applejack
text: *Soup's on, everypony*!

speaker: Applejack
text: Now, why don't I introduce y'all to the Apple family?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks, but I really need to hurry--

speaker: Applejack
text: This here's Apple Fritter. Apple Bumpkin. Red Gala. Red Delicious, Golden Delicious, Caramel Apple, Apple Strudel, Apple Tart, Baked Apples, Apple Brioche, Apple Cinnamon Crisp... [deep breath] Big McIntosh, Apple Bloom and Granny Smith. Up'n'attem, Granny Smith, we got guests.

speaker: Granny Smith
text: [snort] Wha..? Soup's on? I'm up, here I come, ahm comin'...

speaker: Applejack
text: Why, I'd say you're already part of the family!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [spit] [nervous laughter] Okay, well, I can see the food situation is handled, so we'll be on our way.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Aren't you gonna stay for brunch?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sorry, but we have an awful lot to do...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...fine.

speaker: Spike
text: Food's all taken care of, next is weather.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh... I ate too much pie...

speaker: Spike
text: Hmm, there's supposed to be a Pegasus pony named Rainbow Dash clearing the clouds.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, she's not doing a very good job, is she?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nng.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sheepish laughter] Uh, 'scuse me? [more sheepish laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nnnn.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [laughter] Lemme help you.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [more sheepish laughter] Oops, I guess I overdid it. Um, uh, how about this? My very own patented Rain-Blow Dry! No no. Don't thank me. You're quite welcome. [bursts out laughing]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Let me guess. You're Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The one and only. Why, you heard of me?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I *heard* you were supposed to be keeping the sky clear. [sigh] I'm Twilight Sparkle, and the Princess sent me to check on the weather.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, yeah, that'll be a snap. I'll do it in a jiffy. Just as soon as I'm done practicing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Practicing for what?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The Wonderbolts! They're gonna perform at the Celebration tomorrow, and I'm gonna show 'em my stuff!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *The* Wonderbolts?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yep!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The most talented flyers in *all* of Equestria?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's them!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pfft! Please. They'd never accept a Pegasus who can't even keep the sky clear for one measly day.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, I could clear this sky in ten seconds flat.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Prove it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sounds of exertion] Loop-de-loop around, and wham! What'd I say? Ten. Seconds. Flat. I'd never leave Ponyville hanging. [sheep baaing] [chuckles] You should see the look on your face. Ha! You're a laugh, Twilight Sparkle. I can't wait to hang out some more.

speaker: Spike
text: Wow, she's amazing! [laughs]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rrgh.

speaker: Spike
text: Wait! It's kinda pretty once you get used to it!

speaker: Spike
text: Decorations. Beautiful...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, the décor is coming along nicely. This ought'a be quick. I'll be at the library in no time. Beautiful indeed.

speaker: Spike
text: Not the décor, her!

speaker: Rarity
text: No, no, no, oh! Goodness no.

speaker: Spike
text: How are my spines? Are they straight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Good afternoon--

speaker: Rarity
text: Just a moment, please! I'm 'in the zone', as it were. Oh, yes! Sparkle always does the trick, does it not? Why, Rarity, you are a talent. Now, um, how can I help yo-- [yelp] Oh my stars, darling! Whatever happened to your coiffure?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, you mean my mane? Well, it's a long story. I'm just here to check on the decorations, and then I'll be out of your hair!

speaker: Rarity
text: Out of *my* hair? What about *your* hair?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wait! Where are we going?! Help!

speaker: Rarity
text: No, no, uh-uh. Too green. Too yellow. Too poofy. Not poofy enough. Too frilly. Too... shiny. Now go on, my dear. You were telling me where you're from.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [wincing] I've... been sent... from Canterlot... to--

speaker: Rarity
text: Huh?

speaker: Rarity
text: *Canterlot*?! Oh, I am so envious! The glamour, the sophistication! I have always dreamed of living there! I can't wait to hear all about it! We are gonna be the best of friends, you and I... *Emeralds*?! What *was* I thinking? Let me get you some rubies!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Quick! Before she decides to dye my coat a new color!

speaker: Spike
text: Wasn't she wonderful?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Focus, Casanova. What's next on the list?

speaker: Spike
text: [clears throat] Oh, uh, music! It's the last one!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh my. Um, stop please, everyone, umm. Excuse me, sir? I mean, no offense, but your rhythm is just a teeny-tiny bit off. Now, follow me, please. A-one, a-two, a-one two three-

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hello!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh my, I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to frighten your birds. I'm just here to check up on the music and it's sounding beautiful. [pause] I'm Twilight Sparkle. [pause] What's your name?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [very quietly] Um... I'm Fluttershy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sorry, what was that?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [even quieter] Um... My name is Fluttershy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Didn't quite catch that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [pause] Well, um, it looks like your birds are back, so I guess everything's in order. Keep up the good work!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oookay. [to Spike] Well, that was easy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] A baby dragon!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I've never seen a baby dragon before. He's sooo cute!

speaker: Spike
text: Well, well, well...!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh my, he talks. I didn't know dragons could talk. That's just so incredibly wonderful I, I just don't even know what to say!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, in that case we'd better be going.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wait, wait! What's his name?

speaker: Spike
text: I'm Spike.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hi Spike, I'm Fluttershy. Wow, a talking dragon! And what do dragons talk about?

speaker: Spike
text: Well, what do you wanna know?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Absolutely *everything*.

speaker: Spike
text: Well... I started out as a cute little purple and green egg...

speaker: Spike
text: ...and that's the story of my whole entire life! Well, up until today. Do you wanna hear about today?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, yes, please!

speaker: Spike
text: Gyah!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I am so sorry, how did we get here so fast? This is where I'm staying while in Ponyville and my poor baby dragon needs his sleep.

speaker: Spike
text: No I don't-- whoa!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aww, wook at dat, he's so sweepy he can't even keep his widdle bawance!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Poor thing, you simply must get into bed...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, yes, we'll get right on that. Well, g'night!

speaker: Spike
text: Huh. Rude much?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sorry, Spike, but I have to convince the Princess that Nightmare Moon is coming, and we're running out of time! I just need to be alone so I can study without a bunch of *crazy* ponies trying to make friends all the time. Now, where's the light?

speaker: Ponies
text: *Surprise!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Surprise*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hi, I'm Pinkie Pie, and I threw this party just for you! Were you surprised? Were ya? Were ya? Huh huh huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Very surprised. Libraries are supposed to be *quiet*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, that's silly! What kind of welcome party would this be if it were quiet? I mean, duh, bo-ring! Y'see, I saw you when you first got here, remember? You were all "hello" and I was all [deep gasp], remember? Y'see I've never saw you before and if I've never saw you before that means you're new, 'cause I know everypony, and I mean *everypony* in Ponyville!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And if you're new, that meant you haven't met anyone yet, and if you haven't met anyone yet, you must not have any friends, and if you don't have any friends then you must be lonely, and that made me so sad, then I had an idea, and that's why I went [deep gasp]! I must throw a great big ginormous super-duper spectacular welcome party and invite everyone in Ponyville! See? And now you have lots and lots of friends!

speaker: Applejack
text: Are you all right, sugarcube?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aww, she's so happy she's crying!

speaker: Spike
text: "Hot sauce". Ooh...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [with mouth full] What? It's good!

speaker: Spike
text: Hey Twilight! Pinkie Pie's starting "pin the tail on the pony"! Wanna play?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *No*! All the ponies in this town are *crazy*! Do you know what time it is?!

speaker: Spike
text: It's the eve of the Summer Sun Celebration. Everypony has to stay up, or they'll miss the Princess raise the sun! You really should lighten up, Twilight. It's a party!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh, here I thought I'd have time to learn about the Elements of Harmony but, silly me, all this ridiculous friend-making has kept me from it! "*Legend has it that on the longest day of the thousandth year, the stars will aid in her escape, and she will bring about everlasting night.*" I hope the Princess was right... I hope it really is just an old pony tale...

speaker: Spike
text: C'mon, Twilight, it's time to watch the sunrise!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Isn't this exciting? Are you excited, 'cause I'm excited, I've never been so excited-- well, except for the time that I saw you walking into town and I went [deep gasp] but I mean really, who can top that?

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Fillies and gentlecolts, as mayor of Ponyville, it is my great pleasure to announce the beginning of the Summer Sun Celebration!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: In just a few moments, our town will witness the magic of the sunrise, and celebrate this, the longest day of the year! And now, it is my great honor to introduce to you the ruler of our land, the very pony who gives us the sun and the moon each and every day, the good, the wise, the bringer of harmony to all of Equestria...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ready?

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: ...Princess Celestia!

speaker: Rarity
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This *can't* be good.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Remain calm, everypony, there must be a reasonable explanation!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, ooh, I love guessing games! Is she hiding?

speaker: Rarity
text: She's *gone*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, she's good. [yelp]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no... Nightmare Moon!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: Oh, my beloved subjects. It's been so long since I've seen your precious, little sun-loving faces.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What did you do with our Princess?!

speaker: Applejack
text: [muffled] Whoa there, Nelly...

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: [chuckle] Why, am I not royal enough for you? Don't you know who I am?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, ooh, more guessing games! Um, Hokey Smokes! How about... Queen Meanie! No! Black Snooty, Black Snooty--[muffled noises]

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: Does my crown no longer count now that I have been imprisoned for a thousand years? Did you not recall the legend? Did you not see the signs?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I did. And I know who you are. You're the Mare in the Moon – Nightmare Moon!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: Well well well, somepony who remembers me. Then you also know why I'm here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're here to... to... [gulp]

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: [chuckle] Remember this day, little ponies, for it was your last. From this moment forth, the night will last *forever*! [laughter, thunder]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "Elements of Harmony, see 'Mare in the Moon'"?

speaker: Spike
text: But that's just an old ponies' tale.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She will bring about nighttime eternal.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's imperative that the princess is told right away.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See? I knew she would wanna take immediate action.

speaker: Spike
text: *My dear Twilight. There is more to a young pony's life than studying. Make some friends.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All the ponies in this town are *crazy*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I hope the Princess was right.

speaker: Rarity
text: She's *gone*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no. Nightmare Moon!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Seize her! Only she knows where the Princess is!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: Stand back, you *foals*! [laughs]

speaker: Applejack
text: Ergh...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Come back here! [pants] Nighttime? Forever? Where's she going?

speaker: Spike
text: Uh... We gotta stop Nightmare!...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You've been up all night, Spike. You are a *baby* dragon after all. Elements, elements, elements... Ugh! How can I stop Nightmare Moon without the Elements of Harmony?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And just what *are* the Elements of Harmony? And how did *you* know about Nightmare Moon, huh? Are you a *spy*? Whoa!

speaker: Applejack
text: Simmer down, Sally. She ain't no spy. But she sure knows what's going on. Don't you, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I read all about the prediction of Nightmare Moon. Some mysterious objects called the Elements of Harmony are the only things that can stop her, but I don't know what they are, where to find them; I don't even know what they do!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: "The Elements of Harmony: A Reference Guide."

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How did you find that?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sing-song voice] It was under "E"!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh. There are six Elements of Harmony, but only five are known: Kindness, Laughter, Generosity, Honesty and Loyalty. The sixth is a complete mystery. It is said, the last known location of the five elements was in the ancient castle of the royal pony sisters. It is located in what is now--

speaker: Everypony
text: The Everfree Forest!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whee! Let's go!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not so fast. Look, I appreciate the offer, but I'd really rather do this on my own.

speaker: Applejack
text: No can do, sugarcube. We sure ain't lettin' any friend of ours go into that creepy place alone. We're stickin' to you like caramel on a candy apple.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Especially* if there's candy apples in there. What? Those things are *good*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So, none of you have been in here before?

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh, heavens no! Just look at it - it's dreadful.

speaker: Applejack
text: And it ain't natural. Folks say it don't work the same as Equestria.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's that supposed to mean?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nopony knows. You know why?

speaker: Applejack
text: Rainbow, quit it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: 'cause everypony who's ever come in has never come *out*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Fluttershy! Quick!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh my goodness, oh my goodness.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hold on! I'm a-comin'!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack! What do I do?

speaker: Applejack
text: Let go.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Are you *crazy*?

speaker: Applejack
text: No I ain't. I promise you'll be safe.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's not true!

speaker: Applejack
text: Now listen here. What I'm sayin' to you is the honest truth. Let go, and you'll be safe.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yaaah! Phew-wah!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Sorry girls. I'm not used to holding anything more than a bunny or two.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And once Pinkie and Rarity were saved, whoosh... Me and Fluttershy loop-de-loop around and WHAM! Caught you right in the nick of time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, Rainbow, I was there, and I'm very grateful, but we gotta- [gasp] A manticore!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We've gotta get past him!

speaker: Rarity
text: Take that, you ruffian!

speaker: Rarity
text: *My hair*! Woop--

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wait.

speaker: Applejack
text: YEE-HAW! Git along, little dogie.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Wait*.

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoa! All yours, partner.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm *on it*.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Wait*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *WAIT*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Shhh... It's okay. Oh, you poor, poor little baby.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Little?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now this might hurt for *just* a second.

speaker: Everypony
text: Fluttershy!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [giggles] Aw you're just a little ol' baby kitty, aren't you? Yes you are, yes you are.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How did you know about the thorn?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I didn't. Sometimes we all just need to be shown a little kindness.

speaker: Rarity
text: No. My eyes need a rest from all this icky muck. Well, I didn't mean that literally.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That ancient ruin could be right in front of our faces and we wouldn't even know it.

speaker: Rarity
text: I didn't see you there, my apologies.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Right here... guh...

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh wait, I think I stepped in somethin'.

speaker: Applejack
text: It's just mud.

speaker: Applejack
text: Aah!

speaker: Everypony
text: Huh?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [laughter] Bleh. Ooo! [funny noises] [laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, what are you doing?! Run!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh girls, don't you see?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: When I was a little filly and the sun was going down...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Tell me she's not...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: The darkness and the shadows, they would always make me frown...

speaker: Rarity
text: She is.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
I'd hide under my pillow
From what I thought I saw
But Granny Pie said that wasn't the way
To deal with fears at all

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Then what is?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
She said, "Pinkie, you gotta stand up tall
Learn to face your fears
You'll see that they can't hurt you
Just laugh to make them disappear."

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ha! Ha! Ha!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
So, giggle at the ghostly
Guffaw at the grossly
Crack up at the creepy
Whoop it up with the weepy
Chortle at the kooky
Snortle at the spooky

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And tell that big dumb scary face to take a hike and leave you alone and if he thinks he can scare you then he's got another thing coming and the very idea of such a thing just makes you wanna... hahahaha... heh...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Laaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaauuuugh!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: How are we gonna cross this?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh?

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: [sobbing] What a world, what a *world*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Excuse me, sir. Why are you crying?

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: Well, I don't know. I was just sitting here, minding my own business, when this tacky little cloud of purple smoke just whisked past me and tore half of my beloved mustache *clean off*, and now I look simply *horrid*. [wails]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, give me a break.

speaker: Applejack
text: That's what all the fuss is about?

speaker: Rarity
text: Why, of course it is. How *can* you be so insensitive? Oh, just look at him. Such lovely luminescent scales.

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: [sniffs] I know.

speaker: Rarity
text: And your expertly coiffed mane.

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: Oh, I know, I know.

speaker: Rarity
text: Your fabulous manicure.

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: [gasp] It's so true!

speaker: Rarity
text: All ruined without your beautiful mustache.

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: It's true, I'm *hideous*!

speaker: Rarity
text: I simply cannot let such a crime against fabulosity go uncorrected.

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: [yelp] What did you do that for?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity, what are you-

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: [moans] Oh-hohohoho! My mustache. How wonderful.

speaker: Rarity
text: You look smashing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Rarity, your beautiful tail...

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh. It's fine, my dear. Short tails are in this season. Besides, it'll grow back.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So would the *mustache*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] We can cross now. Let's go. Ah!

speaker: Steven Magnet
text: Allow me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There it is, the ruin that holds The Elements of Harmony. We made it!

speaker: Applejack
text: Twilight, wait for us!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We're almost there. Whoa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What's with you and falling off cliffs today?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sighs] Now what?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Duh.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh yeah.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: Rainbow...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who's there?

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: Rainbow...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I ain't scared of you! Show yourself!

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: We've been eagerly awaiting the arrival of the best flyer in Equestria.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who?

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: Why, you, of course.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Really?! I mean... Oh yeah, me. Hey, uh, you wouldn't mind telling the Wonderbolts that, would ya? 'cause I've been trying to get into that group for like, *ever*.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: No, Rainbow Dash. We want you to join us, *The Shadowbolts*. We're the greatest aerial team in the Everfree Forest, and soon we will be the greatest in all Equestria, but first, we need a captain. The most magnificent-

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yep.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: Swiftest-

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: Bravest flyer in all the land.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes, [chuckle] it's all true.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: We need... *you*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: WOOHOO! Sign me up. Just let me tie this bridge real quick and then we have a deal.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: No! It's *them* or *us*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow, what's taking so long? Oh no. Rainbow! Don't listen to them.

speaker: Shadowbolt Leader
text: Well?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You... Thank you! For the offer, I mean, but I'm afraid I have to say no.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: See? I'd never leave my friends hangin'.

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoa. Come on, Twilight. Isn't this what you've been waitin' for?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The Elements of Harmony, we've found them. Careful, careful!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: One, two, three, four... There's only five!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Where's the sixth?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The book said: *when the five are present, a spark will cause the sixth Element to be revealed.*

speaker: Applejack
text: What in the hay is that supposed to mean?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm not sure, but I have an idea. Stand back. I don't know what will happen.

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on now, y'all. She needs to concentrate.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aah!

speaker: Everypony
text: Twilight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The Elements!

speaker: Applejack
text: Twilight, where are you?

speaker: Rarity
text: Look!

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Hmph!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: You're kidding. You're kidding, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [groan] Just one spark. Come on, *come on*. Aah!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: No, no!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] But... where's the sixth Element?!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: [laughter] You little foal! Thinking you could defeat *me*? Now you will never see your princess, or your sun! The *night* will last *forever*! [evil laugh]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] You think you can destroy The Elements of Harmony just like that? Well, you're wrong, because the spirits of The Elements of Harmony are right *here*.

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: What?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Applejack*, who reassured me when I was in doubt, represents the spirit of... *honesty*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Fluttershy*, who tamed the manticore with her compassion, represents the spirit of... *kindness*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Pinkie Pie*, who banished fear by giggling in the face of danger, represents the spirit of... *laughter*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Rarity*, who calmed a sorrowful serpent with a meaningful gift represents the spirit of... *generosity*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And *Rainbow Dash*, who could not abandon her friends for her own heart's desire represents the spirit of... *loyalty*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The spirits of these five ponies got us through every challenge you threw at us.

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: You still don't have the sixth Element! The spark didn't work!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But it did! A different kind of spark. I felt it the very moment I realized how happy I was to hear you, to see you, how much I cared about you. The spark ignited inside *me* when I realized that you all... are *my friends*! You see, Nightmare Moon, when those Elements are ignited by the... the *spark*, that resides in the heart of us all, it creates the sixth element: the element of... *magic*!

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: *Nooo*! Nooo!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh, my head.

speaker: Applejack
text: Everypony okay?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, thank goodness.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Why Rarity, it's so lovely.

speaker: Rarity
text: I know! I'll never part with it again.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No. Your necklace. It looks just like your cutie mark.

speaker: Rarity
text: What? Ooh. So does yours.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Look at mine! Look at mine!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aw *yeah*.

speaker: Applejack
text: Gee, Twilight! I thought you were just spoutin' a lot of hooey, but I reckon we really do represent the elements of friendship.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Indeed you do.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasps] Princess Celestia.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Twilight Sparkle, my faithful student. I knew you could do it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But... you told me it was all an old pony tale.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I told you that you needed to make some friends, nothing more. I saw the signs of Nightmare Moon's return and I knew it was you who had the magic inside to defeat her, but you could not unleash it until you let true friendship into your heart. Now if only another will as well. Princess Luna!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: It has been a thousand years since I have seen you like this. Time to put our differences behind us. We were meant to rule together, little sister.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Twilight Sparkle
text: *Sister*?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Will you accept my friendship?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whoa!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: I'm so sorry! I missed you so much, big sister!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I've missed you, too.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [blows her nose] [sobs] Hey, you know what this calls for?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A *party*!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Why so glum, my faithful student? Are you not happy that your quest is complete and you can return to your studies in Canterlot?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's just it. Just when I learned how wonderful it is to have friends, I have to leave them.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Spike, take a note, please. *I, Princess Celestia, hereby decree that the unicorn Twilight Sparkle shall take on a new mission for Equestria. She must continue to study the magic of friendship. She must report to me her findings from her new home in Ponyville.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh thank you, Princess Celestia! I'll study harder than ever before.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Isn't this exciting? Are you excited cause I'm excited I've never been so excited, well, except for the time that I went [gasp] but I mean really-

speaker: Spike
text: No. Nope. Nope-- [continues in background]

speaker: Applejack
text: Thank you kindly, Twilight, for helping me out. I bet Big McIntosh I could get all these Golden Delicious in the barn by lunchtime. If I win, he's gonna walk down Stirrup Street in one of Granny's girdles. [chuckles]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No problem at all, Applejack. I'm glad the goal is lunchtime. All this hard work is making me hungry.

speaker: Spike
text: I know, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ooh-wee, Spike. You've been lounging on my back all morning while *we* worked.

speaker: Spike
text: Exactly. You two are taking so long, I missed snack-time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [stomach grumbles] [laughs nervously] Eh, I guess we better get some food.

speaker: Spike
text: Nope. Worm. A-ha!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh Spike, that looks delicious.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Spike*.

speaker: Spike
text: What? [burp]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's a letter from Princess Celestia.

speaker: Spike
text: [clears throat] *Hear ye, hear ye. Her Grand Royal Highness, Princess Celestia of Equestria, is pleased to announce the Grand Galloping Gala to be held in the magnificent capital city of Canterlot, on the 21st day of*, eh, yadda yadda yadda, *cordially extends an invitation to Twilight Sparkle plus one guest.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
text: [gasp] The Grand Galloping Gala!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
text: The Grand Galloping Gala! [cheering]

speaker: Applejack
text: Woo-hoo!

speaker: Spike
text: [burp] Look, two tickets.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, great! I've never been to the gala. Have you, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: *No*, and I plan to keep it that way. I don't want any of that girly frilly frou-frou nonsense.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aw, come on Spike. A dance would be nice.

speaker: Applejack
text: *Nice*? It's a heap good more than just nice. I'd love to go. Land sakes, if I had an apple stand set up, ponies would be chowin' our tasty vittles 'til the cows came home. Do you have any idea how much business I could drum up for Sweet Apple Acres? Why, with all that money, we could do a heap of fixin' up 'round here. We could replace that saggy old roof, and Big McIntosh could replace that saggy old plow, and Granny Smith could replace that saggy old hip.

speaker: Applejack
text: Why, I'd give my left hind leg to go to that gala.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, well in that case, would you like to--

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa! [crash] Ugh. Are we talking about the Grand Galloping Gala?

speaker: Applejack
text: Rainbow Dash. You told me you were too busy to help me harvest apples. What were you busy doing? *Spyin'*?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: No, I was busy napping, and I just happened to hear that you have an extra ticket?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, but--

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: YES! This is *so* awesome. The Wonderbolts perform at the Grand Galloping Gala *every year*. I can see it now. Everyone would be watching the sky. Their eyes riveted on the Wonderbolts, but then in would fly *Rainbow Dash!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I would draw their attention with my Super Speed Strut.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Then, I would mesmerize 'em with my Fantastic Filly Flash. And for my grand finale, the Buccaneer Blaze! The ponies would go wild!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The Wonderbolts would insist that my signature moves be incorporated into their routine, and then welcome me as their newest member.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't you see, Twilight? This could be my one chance to show 'em my stuff. You gotta take me! [grunt]

speaker: Applejack
text: Hold on just one pony pickin' minute here. [spit] *I* asked for that ticket first.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So? That doesn't mean you own it.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, yeah? Well I challenge you to a hoof-wrestle. Winner gets the ticket.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Girls, these are *my* tickets, *I'll* decide who gets it, thank you very much. Whoever has the best reason to go should get the ticket, don't you think?

speaker: Applejack
text: Drummin' up business for the farm?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: A chance to audition for the Wonderbolts?

speaker: Applejack
text: Money t' fix Granny's hip.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Living* the *dream*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh my, those were all pretty good reasons, aren't they? [stomach rumbles] [chuckles] Listen to that, I am starving. I don't know about you, but I can't make important decisions on an empty stomach, so I'll, uh, think about it over lunch and get back to you two, okay?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Applejack
text: Okay. [groan]

speaker: Spike
text: So, who you gonna give the ticket to, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know Spike, but I *really* can't think straight when I'm hungry, so where should we eat?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [crash] Gah! Bats! Bats on my face! Help! Wait, these aren't... tickets to the Grand Galloping Gala?! It's the most amazing incredible tremendous super-fun wonderful terrifically humongous party in all of Equestria! I've always always *always* wanted to go!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Oh the Grand Galloping Gala is the best place for me
Oh the Grand Galloping Gala is the best place for me
Hip hip
Hooray!
It's the best place for me
For Pinkie...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: With decorations like streamers and fairy-lights and pinwheels and piñatas and pin-cushions. With goodies like sugar cubes and sugar canes and sundaes and sun-beams and sarsaparilla. And I get to play my favorite-est of favorite fantabulous games like Pin the Tail on the Pony!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Oh the Grand Galloping Gala is the best place for me
Oh the Grand Galloping Gala is the best place for me
'Cause it's the most galarrific superly-terrific gala ever
In the whole galaxy
Wheee!!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh thank you, Twilight, it's the most wonderful-est gift ever.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, actually--

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] Are these what I think they are?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh--

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes, yes, *yes*! Twilight's taking me to the Grand Galloping Gala in Canterlot.

speaker: Rarity
text: The gala? I design ensembles for the gala every year, but I've never had the opportunity to attend. Oh, the society, the culture, the glamour! It's where I truly belong, and where I'm destined to meet *him*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Him! ...* Who?

speaker: Rarity
text: Him. I would stroll through the gala, and everyone would wonder, "Who *is* that mysterious mare?" They would never guess that I was just a simple pony from little old Ponyville. Why, I would cause such a sensation that I would be invited for an audience with Princess Celestia herself, and the princess would be so taken with the style and elegance that she would introduce me to *him*, her nephew: the most handsome, eligible unicorn stallion in Canterlot. Our eyes would meet, our hearts would melt. Our courtship would be *magnificent.*He would ask for my hoof in marriage, and of course I would say, "*Yes!"* We would have a royal wedding, befitting a princess, which is [giggles] what I would become upon marrying *him*, the stallion of my dreams.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight, I simply cannot believe you would invite Pinkie Pie so she can... *party*, and prevent me from meeting my true love.**How could you? Hmph.

speaker: Spike
text: Hey!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] Angel, these are perfect.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, listen guys, I haven't decided who to give the extra ticket to.

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: You haven't?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, excuse me, Twilight. I would just like to ask, I mean, if it would be all right, if you haven't given it to someone else--

speaker: Rarity
text: *You*? You want to go to the gala?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no. I mean, yes, or, actually, kind of. You see, it's not so much the Grand Galloping Gala as it is the wondrous private gated garden that surrounds the dance. The flowers are said to be the most beautiful and fragrant in all of Equestria. For the night of the gala, and that night alone, would they all be in bloom... and that's just the flora! Don't get me started on the fauna. There's loons and toucans and bitterns, oh my! Hummingbirds that can really hum, and buzzards that can really buzz. White-blue jays, and red jays, and green jays, pink jays and pink flamingos!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Gee, Fluttershy, it sounds... beautiful...?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait just a minute.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash! Were you following me?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: No. I mean, yes. I mean, maybe. Look, it doesn't matter. I couldn't risk a goody-four-shoes like you giving that ticket away to just anybody.

speaker: Applejack
text: Wait just another minute.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, were you following me too?

speaker: Applejack
text: No. I was followin' *this* one to make sure she didn't try any funny business. Still trying to take mah ticket.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Your* ticket?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But Twilight's taking *me*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *QUIET*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And then I said, "Oatmeal, are you craz--" oh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Girls, there's no use in arguing.

speaker: Rarity
text: But Twilight-

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Eh! This is my decision, and I'm gonna make it on my own, and I certainly can't think straight with all this noise... [stomach rumbles] not to mention hunger. Now go on, shoo.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And don't worry, I'll figure this out... somehow.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sighs] Spike, what am I gonna do? All five of my best friends have really good reasons to go to the gala. Applejack, or Rainbow Dash? Pinkie Pie or Fluttershy, Rarity... Oh, who should go with me? [stomach rumbles]

speaker: Savoir Fare
text: Have you made your decision?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I CAN'T DECIDE!

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, he just wants to take your order.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh. I would love a daffodil and daisy sandwich.

speaker: Spike
text: Do you have any rubies? No? Okay. I'll have the hay fries, extra crispy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What do you think, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: I think we have to try another restaurant. I mean, I like grass just fine, but would it hurt anybody to offer some gemstones?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I *mean* about the Gala and the ticket and who I should take.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh. You're still on *that*?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, *listen*. How do I choose? And when I do choose, will the other four be mad at me? I mean, I could give up my ticket and give away two, but that would still leave three disappointed ponies. What if I--

speaker: Savoir Fare
text: Ah, your food.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh thank you. This looks so good. I'm sure everything will be much clearer once I eat.

speaker: Savoir Fare
text: Em, madam? Are you going to eat your food in ze rain?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's not raining... What's going on?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hi there, best friend forever I've ever ever had. Enjoying the sunny weather?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash, what are you doing?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whaddya mean? I just saw the smartest, most generous pony about to get rained on, so I thought I'd kick a hole in the clouds to keep her dry so she could dine in peace, that's all.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow, you're not trying to get extra consideration for the extra ticket by doing me extra special favors, are you?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Me*? No no no, of course not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Seriously, I'd do it for anypony. Heh heh, eh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow, I am *not* comfortable accepting unwanted favors, so I'd appreciate it if you close up that rain cloud right now.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh, *fine*. [zip]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's better. [groans]

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight, it's raining.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, really?

speaker: Rarity
text: Come with me before you catch a cold.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Heh heh, oops, sorry.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh no, it's quite all right. After all, we are... the best of friends, are we not? And you know what the best of friends do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh...

speaker: Rarity
text: *Makeovers*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh, Rarity, ow, this really isn't fixing it. I mean, thank you but, ooh, *that's too tight*.

speaker: Rarity
text: There. Oh, you're simply *darling*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, yeah, it is kinda pretty, isn't it?

speaker: Rarity
text: And *you*. Oh Spike, I have a dandy little outfit for the dashing gent.

speaker: Spike
text: D-ah, ow, oh, hey, wow, watch it, *whoa*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [giggles] Oh, Spike.

speaker: Rarity
text: Now you just need a hat.

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh, I told you, I don't want any part of this girly gala gunk. See you back at the library.

speaker: Rarity
text: [laughs] Oh, who needs him anyway. This is all about *you*, and how fabulous you'll look at the Grand Galloping Gala.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wait, the *Grand*--

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] And oh, my goodness, what a coincidence. I happen to have an ensemble of my own that matches yours to a T. We would be the belles of the ball, you and I. Everyone would be clamoring for our attention. All eyes would be on us, and then everyone would finally know, the most beautiful, most talented, most sophisticated pony in all of Equestria is Rarity the unicorn. Ah, [nervous laughter] and Twilight Sparkle, of course.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I see what's going on. You're just buttering me up so I give you the extra ticket. Well it's not gonna work. You're going to have to wait for my decision just like everyone else. Now if you'll excuse me, I've been trying all day just to get some *lunch*.

speaker: Applejack
text: Did somepony say lunch?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You've got to be kidding me!

speaker: Applejack
text: I got apple pie, apple fritters, apple tarts, apple dumplings, apple crisps, apple crumblers, and apple Brown Betty. Uh, the dessert, not my auntie. What do you say there, best friend?

speaker: Applejack
text: Is that a yes?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No. *No.* I don't know who I'm giving the ticket to, and all these favors aren't making it any easier to decide. In fact, I'm less sure now than I was this morning. Ugh!

speaker: Applejack
text: So, that's a maybe?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh, I never thought being showered with favors would be so *aggravating*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Fluttershy, not you too?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, well, hello Twilight. I hope you don't mind, but we're all doing a little spring cleaning for you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's summer.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, well, better late than never, right? It was Angel's idea.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're not doing this for the ticket, are you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh no, I'm doing this because you're my very best friend. Right, Angel? Oh, yes, we *are* just doing this for the ticket.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, no, no! Well, this was all very nice of you and Angel, but I'm not accepting any extra favors until I've made my final decision, so I'm going to have to ask you to leave.

speaker: Ponies
text: SURPRISE!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Twilight is my bestest friend
Whoopie, whoopie!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She's the cutest, smartest, all around best pony, pony!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I bet if I throw a super-duper fun party, party!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She'll give her extra ticket to the Gala to me!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *PIIINKIIIE!!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: At least the other ponies *tried* to be subtle about the ticket.

speaker: Drizzle
text: Wait, what ticket? What gala?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, you didn't know? Twilight has an extra ticket to the Grand Galloping Gala!

speaker: in unison
Ponies
text: *The Grand Galloping Gala?!*

speaker: Daisy
text: Would you like any help with your gardening?

speaker: Shoeshine
text: I have a cartload of extra carrots.

speaker: Spike
text: What are we gonna do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We're... gonna... *run*!

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh... Warn me next time you're gonna do that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I didn't even know it was gonna happen. Now quick, lock the doors. Yaaaargh! I can't decide, I just can't decide. It's important to all of you and I just can't stand to disappoint any of you, and giving me gifts and doing me favors won't make any difference, because you're all my friends and I wanna make you all happy and I can't, I just *can't*!

speaker: Applejack
text: Twilight, sugar, I didn't mean to put so much pressure on you, and if it helps, I don't want the ticket anymore. You can give it to somepony else. I won't feel bad, I promise.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Me too. I feel just awful that I made *you* feel so awful.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And me too. It's no fun upsetting your friends.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight, it was unfair of me to try to force you as I did.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes! That means the ticket is mine. Ha ha, [sing-song voice] I got the ticket, I got the ticket-- you know, I haven't perfected my signature moves for the Wonderbolts anyway. I don't need that ticket either.

speaker: Applejack
text: We all got so gun-ho about going to the gala that we couldn't see how un-gun-ho we were making you.

speaker: Ponies in unison
text: We're sorry, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, take down a note. *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *I've learned that one of the joys of friendship is sharing your blessings, but when there's not enough blessings to go around, having more than your friends can make you feel pretty awful. So, though I appreciate the invitation, I will be returning both tickets to the Grand Galloping Gala.*

speaker: Ponies in unison
text: What?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *If my friends can't all go, I don't wanna go either.*

speaker: Applejack
text: Twilight, you don't have to do that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nope. I've made up my mind. Spike, you can send the letter now.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now you won't get to go to the gala either.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's okay, girls. I couldn't possibly enjoy myself without my best friends there with me, so I would rather not go at all.

speaker: Spike
text: Hgh... hgh... urk... urk...

speaker: Applejack
text: Well wallop my withers, Spike. Isn't that just like a boy? Can't handle the least bit of sentiment.

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoa Nelly!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A letter from the princess? That was fast.

speaker: Spike
text: "*My faithful student Twilight,*

speaker: Spike
text: *Why didn't you just say so in the first place?*" Six tickets to the Grand Galloping Gala.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now we can all go.

speaker: Rarity
text: Allow us to treat you to dinner.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What a great way to apologize.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And to celebrate. Come on everyone, the cupcakes are on me.

speaker: Spike
text: How come I don't get a ticket to the gala? Hurk! [burp] "*And one for you, Spike.*" [giggles] I mean, *gross*, I have to go too? [continues giggling]

speaker: Applejack
text: Boy howdy! I got my work cut out for me. That there is the biggest bumper crop o' apples I ever laid eyes on.

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup. Too big for you to handle on your own.

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on, big brother! You need to rest up and get yourself better. I haven't met an apple orchard yet that I can't handle. Oops, sorry. I'll take a bite out of this job by day's end.

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Biting off more than you can chew is just what I'm afraid of.

speaker: Applejack
text: Are you sayin' my mouth is makin' promises my legs can't keep?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup.

speaker: Applejack
text: Why of all the... This is your sister Applejack, remember? *The loyalest of friends and the most dependable of ponies*?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: But still only one pony, and one pony plus hundreds o' apple trees just doesn't add up to...

speaker: Applejack
text: Don't you use your fancy mathematics to muddy the issue! I said I could handle this harvest and I'm gonna prove it to you. I'm gonna get every last apple out of those trees this applebuck season *all by myself*. [gulps]

speaker: Applejack
text: Well I better get kickin'. These apples aren't gonna shake themselves outta the trees. Hey! Oh *no*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *STAMPEDE!*

speaker: Bon Bon
text: Stampede!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [laughter] Hey...! [vibrating] This makes my voice sound silly!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie, are you crazy?! Run!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Everypony calm down. There is no need to panic.

speaker: Rarity
text: But Mayor, whatever shall we do?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Look there!

speaker: Applejack
text: YEEHAW!

speaker: Applejack
text: Move aside, Winona. Put 'em up, girl!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This is the best rodeo show I've ever seen. [eats popcorn]

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on, little dogies! Turn! [whistle] Winona, put 'em up! Ha hah! Gotcha. [grunt]

speaker: Applejack
text: Attagirl. [grunts] Yee haw!

speaker: Applejack
text: *Whoaaa*. Hooie. Now what was *that* all about?

speaker: Daisy Jo
text: [moo] [cough] Oh my! Begging your pardon, Applejack, but Mooriella here saw one of those nasty snakes.

speaker: Daisy Jo
text: And it just gave us all the willies, don'tcha know.

speaker: Applejack
text: I completely understand. Just next time, try and steer clear of Ponyville.

speaker: Daisy Jo
text: We certainly will, Applejack. So long, Winona!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yee haw!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yee haw! Ride 'em, cowpony!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Applejack was just... *just*...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Apple*tastic*!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: *Exactly*. We must do something to thank Applejack for single-hoofedly saving the town.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I know.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A party!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We all ready?

speaker: Rarity
text: Just one last thing. *Now* we're ready.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is Applejack all set?

text: Actually, I haven't seen her all week.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Not since the stampede.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But she'll be here for sure. Applejack is *never* late.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Welcome, everypony! Today we are here to honor a pony we can always count on to help in matters great and small. A pony whose contributions to--

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Did you see Applejack's slick moves out there? *What* an *athlete*. This week she's gonna help me with my new flying trick, and I know it's gonna be *so awesome*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Exactly*. And...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This week, I get to run Sugarcube Corner for the first time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What does that have to do with Applejack?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Oh*. Applejack, one of the best bakers *ever*, is gonna help me. Applejack makes everything great, so free samples for everypony!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh-kay, that's great. Now if I could just make a point without being inter--

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: --*rupted*.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Twilight, I'm so sorry, but I just wanted to mention that Applejack is also helping *me* this week with the official bunny census, where we count up all the new baby bunnies that were born this season. She's gonna help gather them using her wonderful herding skills.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Anyone else*? *Anyone*? *No*? Well then, as I was trying to say... Urgh! *Never mind*.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Ah-ahem. And so, with no further ado, it is my privilege to give the prize, Pony of Ponyville Award, to our beloved guest of honor, a pony of the utmost trustworthiness, reliability, and integrity. Ponyville's most capable and dependable friend: *Applejack*!

speaker: Spike
text: Cool! Way to go Applejack, that was awesome! I mean-- heh.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Ah-ahem.

speaker: Spike
text: *Awkward*.

speaker: Applejack
text: *I'm here*. *I'm here*. [yawn] [sigh] Sorry I'm late--whoa--I was just... whoa... Did I get your tail? Miss Mayor. Thank you kindly for this here... award thingy. [yawn] It's so bright and shiny and, heh, heh heh, I sure do look funny heh. Ooo-ooo.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Woo-ooo.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ooo-ooo.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Okay*. Well, thank you Applejack for saving us from that scary stampede, and always being there for everypony.

speaker: Applejack
text: [yawn] Yeah. I like helping the ponyfolks and [yawn] and stuff. [snore] Oh, uh, yeah. Uh, Thanks.

text: Was it just me, or did Applejack seem a little--

text: Tired?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Dizzy?

text: Messy? Well, did you *see* her mane?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She seemed fine to me. Woo! Woo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hmm.

speaker: Applejack
text: [grunts] [sigh] Phew. [gasp] O-oah.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What on Earth is that pony *doing*?

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoops.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey Applejack!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack. Apple*JACK*!

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, howdy, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What *is* all this?

speaker: Applejack
text: It's Applebuck season. Whoa.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Apple*what* season?

text: But why are you doing it all alone?

speaker: Applejack
text: 'cause Big McIntosh hurt himself.

text: What about all those relatives I've met when I first came to Ponyville? Can't they help?

speaker: Applejack
text: [sigh] They were just here for the Apple family reunion. They actually live all over Equestria and are busy harvestin' their own orchards. So, uh, I'm on my own. *Which means*, I should really get back to work. Ahem... *hint hint*? *Get back to work*?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fine.

speaker: Applejack
text: Could you step aside, Twilight?

text: Do you... want some help?

speaker: Applejack
text: Isn't that a mite dangerous?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pfft, Heh, not for a pony who can *fly*.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, all right-y then. Oh my.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ready? One... two... THREE!

speaker: Applejack
text: Got it. [grunt] [grunt] [grunt]

text: Applejack, what the hay is going on? I mean, I thought I was working with Ponyville's best athlete!

speaker: Applejack
text: You *are*. I'm okay. Really. I-I have an idea. Watch this. [groan] *Ta da*! Oh... Maybe not. Okay, one more try. I'm sure to get it this time.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh!

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh heh... Here I go!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait, Applejaaaaack!

speaker: Applejack
text: *You're welcome*!

text: Can I help you?

text: I think somepony else needs your help.

text: Applejack?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yep.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ow!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, can we talk? *Applejack, can we talk?*

speaker: Applejack
text: *Can bees squawk?! I don't think so.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No. Can we talk?

speaker: Applejack
text: *Twenty stalks? Bean or celery?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No! *I need to talk to you*.

speaker: Applejack
text: *You need to walk to the zoo? Well, who's stoppin' you?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I *need* to *talk* to *you*!

speaker: Applejack
text: *Oh! Well why didn't you say so? What you wanna talk about?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Rainbow Dash dropped in to see me today.*

text: *That's quite neighborly of her.*

text: *Yes, except that she crashed onto my balcony after you launched her into the air.*

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, yeah. I wasn't feeling quite myself this morning.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Because you're working *too hard* and *you need help*.

speaker: Applejack
text: What? Kelp? I don't need kelp. I don't even like seaweed.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: HELP! *You need HELP!*

speaker: Applejack
text: Nothin' doin', Twilight. I'm gonna prove to you, t'everypony, that I can do this *on my own*. Ow! Now if you'll *excuse* me, I've gotta go help Pinkie Pie.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh.

text: Yes siree bob, Mrs. Cake. Plus, I have Ponyville's prized pony to help me out. Why, she's the best baker *ever*. Right, Applejack?

text: WHAT? Oh no! I mean, don't you fret. I can bake anything from fritters to pies in the blink of an eye.

text: [sigh] All right. Well, see you later, girls!

text: Eh, uh, whu, what was that?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Chocolate chips*.

speaker: Applejack
text: *Chips*... got it. Tater chips, a little salty and dry, okie-dokie. What next?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Baking soda*.

speaker: Applejack
text: *Soda*. Perfect. That'll get the tater chips nice and wet. *Now what*?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A cup of flour.

speaker: Applejack
text: A cup o' sour? Well, lemons are sure sour. One cup o' sour, comin' up. Anything else, Pinkie?

text: One last thing. Wheat germ.

speaker: Applejack
text: Wheat worms? Oh, that must be fancy talk for earthworms.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Now *that's* gonna be *delicious*.

speaker: Applejack
text: If you say so.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Free muffin sample spectacular!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah! Muffin spectacles! Get 'em while they're hot.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We came as soon as we heard.

text: Oh thank you, Twilight. We need all the help we can get.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no! What happened?

speaker: Nurse Redheart
text: It was a mishap with some of the baked goods.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, not baked *goods*, baked *bads*. [groans]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Applejack*.

speaker: Spike
text: [chomp] Want one?

speaker: Applejack
text: [grunt] [snore] What? Huh? [grunt] [snore]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, we need to talk.

speaker: Applejack
text: Wha, huh? Oh, it's you, Twilight. [yawn] I know what you're gonna say, but the answer is still *no*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not to upset your applecart, but you *need* help.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hardy har. [groan] And no I don't.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Here, let me help.

speaker: Applejack
text: Help? *No thanks*. [groan] A little more... [groan] Little... [grunt] There. I'll prove that this apple can handle *these* apples. Come on [grunt] apples [grunt] *fall off* [grunt].

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: AJ, think you're beating a dead... tree.

speaker: Applejack
text: I knew that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Actually, Applejack, I had something else to talk to you about. I just came back from Ponyville Urgent Care and--

speaker: Applejack
text: You know, I'm a little busy to get lectured right now, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But if you'd just let me help--

speaker: Applejack
text: Ugh. No, *no*, *NO*! How many times do I gotta say it? I don't need no help from nopony!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh. That pony is stubborn as a mule.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No offense.

speaker: Mule
text: None taken.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh Applejack! Thank you so much for offering your herding skills for the annual rabbit roundup.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ugh. Why are we doin' this?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, lots of new baby bunnies have been born, so it's my job to get a count of all the new families.

speaker: Applejack
text: Fine. Can we just get on with it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Certainly, but remember, these are bunnies we're dealing with, not cows. They're a timid bunch and need to be treated gently.

speaker: Applejack
text: I do NOT need any direction on corrallin' critters. Right, Winona?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Okay, little bunnies! I need you to all gather here in the middle.

speaker: Applejack
text: That's right! Let's go, bunnies. In the center. *Hop to it*. Swell. Just *swell*. Put 'em up, Winona!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Applejack! Winona! Stop! You're *scaring* them.

speaker: Applejack
text: We know what we're doin'. Get along, little bunnies.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh no.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *STAMPEDE*!

speaker: Daisy
text: [yelps] Stampede!

speaker: Rose
text: The horror, the horror.

speaker: Lily Valley
text: It was *awful*.

speaker: Daisy
text: A *disaster*. A horrible, *horrible* disaster.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't get it.

speaker: Lily Valley
text: Our gardens, destroyed.

speaker: Rose
text: Every last flower, devoured.

speaker: Daisy
text: By... by... THEM!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh my. Oh... Please stop, little bunnies. Oh no! Please, let's go home. Oh my goodness.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right. *Enough is enough*.

speaker: Applejack
text: Must [gasp] keep [gasp] buckin'... just [gasp] a few [gasp] more. Must finish harvestin'.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right, Applejack. Your applebucking hasn't just caused *you* problems, it's over-propelled Pegasus', practically poisoned plenty of ponies, and terrorized bushels of brand new bouncing baby bunnies. I don't care *what* you say, *you*. *Need*. *Help*.

speaker: Applejack
text: [grunts] Ha! No, I don't. Look, I did it. I harvested the entire Sweet Apple Acres without your help. How d'ya like them apples?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Um, how do *you* like *them* apples?

speaker: Applejack
text: [mumbling] Where'd all the apple...? [mumbling] [sighs]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack. Applejack.

speaker: Applejack
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, good, you're okay. Now Applejack, I completely respect the Apple family ways. You're always there to help anypony in need, so maybe you can put a little of your stubborn pride aside and allow your friends to help you.

speaker: Applejack
text: Okay, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I am not taking "no" for an answer--*what*?

speaker: Applejack
text: Yes, Twilight. Yes, *please*. I could really use your help.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *My friend Applejack is the best friend a pony could ever have, and she's always there to help anypony. The only trouble*is*, when she needs help, she finds it hard to accept it, so while friendship is about giving of ourselves to friends, it's also about accepting what our friends have to offer.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Your faithful student,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Twilight Sparkle*

speaker: Applejack
text: How about y'all take a little break? I got some *fine* apple juice waitin' for ya! [sigh] Girls, I can't thank you enough for this help. I was acting a *bit* stubborn.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A *bit*?

speaker: Applejack
text: Okay. A mite stubborn, and I'm awful sorry. Now, I know the town gave me the Prized Pony award, but the real award is having you five as my friends.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Phew! That applebucking sure made me hungry.

speaker: Spike
text: And I've got the perfect treat.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Eeew... Spike, I threw those all away. Where'd you get them?

speaker: Spike
text: From the trash.

speaker: Ponies
text: [in unison] EW!

speaker: Spike
text: Just a little nibble? Come on.

speaker: Ponies
text: Ew! Gross!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hoof-biting action overload! She was like a stunt superstar, flying higher and higher, and then Rainbow Dash swooped down--swoosh--and right before she hit the ground--shoom-she pulled up--vrrrmmm!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And then she looped around and around like whoo whoo whoo whoo whoo whoo whoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh. Phew.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [grunt] *Pinkie Pie*? Not again.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not now, Pinkie Pie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But, but Rainbow Dash–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm in the middle of something.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I said not now--[grunt]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I was gonna tell you to look out for that mountain.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [humming] Hi, I'm looking for Rainbow Dash. Have you seen her? Hi there, have you seen Rainbow Dash? Okay, thanks anyway. Twilight, have you seen Rainbow Dash anywhere?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Isn't she right up there?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow *Dash*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Phew. That was close.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hi!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aah!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hi again.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aah!

Snails

text: Enough. Enough, all of you. I take your hint, but Rarity is above such nonsense. Rainbow Dash and Applejack may behave like ruffians, but Rarity conducts herself with beauty and grace.

speaker: Trixie
text: Ooo, what's the matter? Afraid you'll get a hair out of place in that rat's nest you call a mane?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, it. Is. On! You may think you're tough with all of your so-called powers, but there's more to magic than your brutish ways. A unicorn needs to be more than just muscle. A unicorn needs to have style.

speaker: Audience
text: Ooh!

speaker: Rarity
text: A unicorn is not a unicorn without grace and beauty.

speaker: Spike
text: Rarity won't let Trixie get the best of her! She's strong, she's beautiful, she's—

speaker: Rarity
text: *Quick! I need a mirror! Get me a mirror!* What did she do to my hair? I know she did something terrible to my hair!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nothing.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It's fine.

speaker: Applejack
text: It's gorgeous.

speaker: Spike
text: It's green. What?

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh, no. Green hair! Not green hair! [cries] Such an awful, awful color! [cries]

speaker: Golden Harvest
text: Well, I never!

speaker: Spike
text: Well Twilight, guess it's up to you. Come on, show her what you're made of.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What do you mean? I'm nothing special.

speaker: Spike
text: Yes, you are! You're better than her!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm not better than anyone.

speaker: Trixie
text: Hah! You think you're better than the Great and Powerful Trixie? You think you have more magical talent? Well, come on, show Trixie what you've got. Show us all.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Who, me? I'm just your run-of-the-mill citizen of Ponyville. No powerful magic here. I, uh... I think I hear my laundry calling. Sorry, gotta go.

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight?

speaker: Trixie
text: Ha! Once again, the Great and Powerful Trixie has proven herself to be the most amazing unicorn in all of Equestria. Huh, was there ever any doubt?

speaker: Snips
text: Here's your smoothie you asked for, with extra hay, just how you like it.

speaker: Snails
text: Mmm, hay.

speaker: Trixie
text: [sips] Yes?

speaker: Snips
text: Ooo, tell us another story, Great and Powerful Trixie.

speaker: Snails
text: Yeah, tell us about how you vanquished the ursa major.

speaker: Trixie
text: Guh! Trixie is far too exhausted from performing feats beyond imagination. Begone with you until morning.

speaker: Snails
text: Oh, of course, Great and Powerful Trixie.

speaker: Snips
text: Anything you say. We are at your beck and call.

speaker: Trixie
text: Ah.

speaker: Spike
text: What are you two doin'?

speaker: Snips
text: Just bringin' the Gee an' Pee Tee a—

speaker: Spike
text: The what?

speaker: Snips
text: The Great and Powerful Trixie.

speaker: Spike
text: Sheesh.

speaker: Snips
text: Just bringin' her a smoothie.

speaker: Spike
text: How can you fall for her lameness? She's just a show-off. Unlike Twilight, who—

speaker: Snips
text: The Great and Powerful Trixie vanquished an ursa major. Can your Twilight claim that?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh really? Were you guys actually there?

speaker: Snips
text: Well, eh, uh... no, but—

speaker: Spike
text: But nothin'. The proof is in the pudding.

speaker: Snails
text: [laughs] I like pudding.

speaker: Spike
text: Look, unless an ursa major comes waltzing up the street for Trixie to vanquish, I am not gonna believe a word she says, and neither should you!

speaker: Snips
text: Hm, an ursa walkin' up the street, hey? Snails! You thinkin' what I'm thinkin'?

speaker: Snails
text: Why is it they call it a flea market when they don't really sell fleas?

speaker: Snips
text: Yeah, uh... oh, come on!

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, would you put down that book and just listen to me?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Didn't you see how they hated Trixie's bragging, Spike? If I go out there and show off my magic, I run the risk of losing them as friends.

speaker: Spike
text: It's not the same thing, Twilight. You'll be using your magic to stand up for your friends!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, Spike, it's exactly the same.

speaker: Spike
text: Come on, Twilight, any one of these tricks, even the teeniest, would be enough to show up Trixie.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't want to be seen as a bragger like Trixie.

speaker: Spike
text: But you're the best!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh. Please, Spike, I said no!

speaker: Spike
text: [sighs] If that's the way you want to be, then fine.

speaker: Snips
text: Oh, how we gonna find an ursa major when I can't even see my own hoof in front of my face?

speaker: Snails
text: Hold on. [grunts]

speaker: Snips
text: Oh, heh. That's better.

speaker: Snails
text: Yaaaah!

speaker: Snips
text: Yaaaah!

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, guys, where ya goin'?

speaker: Snips
text: Can't talk now.

speaker: Snails
text: Got a *major* problem!

speaker: Snips
text: Yeah, ursa major, to be exact.

speaker: Spike
text: Huh?

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Trixie!

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight!

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Trixie! [mingled speech]

speaker: Trixie
text: Trixie thought she said the Great and Powerful Trixie did not want to be disturbed!

speaker: Snips
text: [nervous laughter] We— We have a— a tiny problem.

speaker: Snails
text: Actually, it's a big one.

speaker: Trixie
text: What is so important that you cannot wait until morning to disturb Trixie?

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight! You've gotta come! Quick!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I already told you, Spike, I don't wanna show up Trixie!

speaker: Spike
text: No, you don't understand, it's—

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, is that what I think it is?

speaker: Spike
text: *Major*ly.

speaker: Snips
text: Great and Powerful Trixie, you've got to vanquish the ursa.

speaker: Snails
text: Yeah, vanquish so we can watch.

speaker: Snips
text: It took a lot of trouble to get that thing here.

speaker: Trixie
text: Wait, *you* brought this here? [gasp] Are you out of your little pony minds?

speaker: Snips
text: But, you're the Great and Powerful Trixie.

speaker: Snails
text: Yeah, remember? You defeated an ursa major.

speaker: Trixie
text: Uh, okay. [gulp] Stand back.

speaker: Trixie
