text: Heh. Piece of cake.

speaker: Snips
text: Aw, come on, Trixie.

speaker: Snails
text: Stop goofin' around and vanquish it, eh?

speaker: Snails
text: Well, that was a dud.

speaker: Snips
text: Yeah, pfft, come on! Where's all the cool explosions and smoke and stuff like earlier? You know.

speaker: Trixie
text: Uh-oh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's going on?

speaker: Snips
text: We brought an ursa to town.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You *what!?!*

speaker: Snails
text: Don't worry, the Great and Powerful Trixie will vanquish it.

speaker: Trixie
text: I can't.

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: What!?

speaker: Trixie
text: Oh, I can't, I never have. No one can vanquish an ursa major. I just made the whole story up to make me look better.

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Made it up!?

speaker: Spike
text: Nice use of number sixteen.

speaker: Unidentified cow
text: Golly, dont'cha know?

speaker: Spike
text: That's new.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Unbelievable!

speaker: Spike
text: That was amazing!

speaker: Applejack
text: Heavens to Betsy! We knew you had ability, but not that much!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sorry. Please, please don't hate me.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Rarity
text: Hate you?

speaker: Rarity
text: Why, whatever do you mean, darling?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, I know how much you all hated Trixie's showing off with her magic tricks, and I just thought--

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Magic's got nothing to do with it. Trixie's just a loudmouth.

speaker: Rarity
text: *Most* unpleasant.

speaker: Applejack
text: All hat and no cattle.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So, you don't mind my magic tricks?

speaker: Applejack
text: Your magic is a part of who you are, sugarcube, and we like who you are. We're proud to have such a powerful, talented unicorn as our friend.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And after whuppin' that ursa's hindquarters, we're even prouder.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You are?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh-huh.

speaker: Applejack
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Rarity
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Spike
text: Wow, Twilight, how'd you know what to do with that ursa major?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's what I was doing when you came looking for me. I was so intrigued by Trixie's bragging that I was compelled to do a little reading up on them.

speaker: Spike
text: So it *is* possible to vanquish an ursa major all by yourself?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That wasn't an ursa major. It was a baby, an ursa *minor*.

speaker: Trixie
text: *That* was just a *baby?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And it wasn't rampaging. It was just cranky because *someone* woke it up.

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Awww...

speaker: Spike
text: Well, if *that* was an ursa minor, then what's an ursa *major* like?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You don't wanna know.

speaker: Trixie
text: Huh. You may have vanquished an ursa minor, but you will never have the amazing, show-stopping ability of the Great and Powerful Trixie!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Why, that little...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Just let her go. Maybe someday she'll learn her lesson. Now, about you two.

speaker: Snips
text: Ah [nervous laughter]. Uh, we're sorry that we woke up the ursa minor.

speaker: Snails
text: We just wanted to see some *awesome magic*.

speaker: Snips
text: Yeah! And the way you vanquished that ursa minor was *awesome!*

speaker: Snails
text: We deserve whatever punishment you give us.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: For starters, you can clean up this mess. And... What do you think, Spike? Should I give them number twenty five?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, twenty five! Yes! And I think I deserve it, too.

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Heah?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I think you're right.

speaker: Spike
Snips
Snails
text: Sweet!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *I have learned a very valuable lesson about friendship: I was so afraid of being thought of as a show-off that I was hiding a part of who I am. My friends helped me realize that it's okay to be proud of your talents, and there are times when it's appropriate to show them off... Especially when you're standing up for your friends.*

speaker: Spike
text: So, you finally admit that you're the most talented unicorn in all of Ponyville?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, yeah, but it's nothing to brag about. So, uh, how did it go with Rarity?

speaker: Spike
text: Eh, she didn't go for the mustache.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You know, Spike, that mustache has nothing to do with who you really are. Maybe you should just try being yourself.

speaker: Spike
text: Or... Maybe the mustache wasn't enough. Maybe if I had a mustache *and* a beard?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, not this again!

speaker: Spike
text: Okay, imagine me with a nice, long, Fu Manchu type beard. Or maybe a goatee. Oh, no, a soul patch right on my chin!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [spits] Not too fast now, Angel bunny. You don't wanna get a tummy ache. [chuckles] You really should eat more than that, don't you think? It's not play time yet. I know you want to run, but... just three more bites. Two more bites? One more bite? Pretty please? [sighs]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, goodness. Are you okay?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Are you coughing because there's a carrot stuck in your throat?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Because you need some water?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] Because of that giant cloud of scary black smoke? I'll take that as a... yes.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Help. Help! Please? Help? There's-- there's a horrible cloud of smoke. It's headed this way and--[shrieks]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't be such a scaredy-pony. It's just me, future Equestria ball-bouncing record holder. Three forty six, three forty seven...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This calls for a celebration!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no, Pinkie Pie, this is *no* time for celebration. This is a time for panic, for--

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooo! I'm going to need balloons! One for every pony in Ponyville!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: There's-- there's smoke. And-- and where there's smoke, there's fire. And--

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Let's see, that's one, two, three, four...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Three hundred fifty four...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Five, six...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Three hundred fifty five, no, wait...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Seven.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pinkie Pie! Now I have to start over.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: We're all going to have to start over, in a new village. 'Cause ours is gonna be--

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, Rainbow Dash, wait up!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, please, this is an emergency. I-I need everypony to--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Listen up! Smoke is spreading over all of Equestria.

speaker: Ponies
text: What? Oh no! That's awful!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: That's what I've been trying to--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But don't worry, I've just received a letter from Princess Celestia informing me that it is not coming from a fire.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, thank goodness.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's coming from a dragon.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: A... d-dragon?

speaker: Applejack
text: What in the name of all things cinnamon swirled is a full-grown dragon doing here in Equestria?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sleeping.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Rarity
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: According to Princess Celestia, he's taking a nap. His snoring is what's causing all this smoke.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: He should really see a doctor. That doesn't sound healthy at all.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, at least he's not snoring fire. What are *we* meant to do about it?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'll tell you what we're meant to do. Give him the boot. Take that. And that!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We need to *encourage* him to take a nap somewhere else. Princess Celestia has given us this mission, and we must not fail. If we do, Equestria will be covered in smoke for the next one hundred years.

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmph. Talk about getting your *beauty* sleep.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right everypony, I need you to gather supplies quickly. We've got a long journey ahead of us. Let's meet back here in less than an hour.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, girls, you heard her. The fate of Equestria is in our hooves. Do we have what it takes?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, actually...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Raaah!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yaaa!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [laughter] Oh, I mean, grrr!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ewww! Much better. Onward!

speaker: Applejack
text: Let's go!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, let's... not? [squeak]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right girls, listen up. I'm mapping out the fastest route, but we've all got to keep a good pace if we expect to make it up the mountain by nightfall.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: M-m-mountain?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The dragon is in *that* cave at the very top.

speaker: Applejack
text: Looks pretty cold up there.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You bet it is. The higher you go, the chillier it gets.

speaker: Rarity
text: Good thing I brought my scarf.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooo! Pretty!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh, oh yeah. *That'll* keep you nice and cozy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gulp] Um, excuse me, Twilight? I know you're busy, but...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh. Well, we could go this way.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But if I could just have a second...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh. No, we want to avoid that.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So, um, I was thinking that, um, maybe I should just stay here in Ponyville.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh! Good. I'll stay here and--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wait! You *have* to come! Your way with wild animals will surely come in handy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't think I--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, and don't worry about your little friends in the meadow. Spike's got it covered while you're gone.

speaker: Spike
text: You can count on me! Oooh! Hey! Hey! Wait!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't really think he's up to the task. Maybe... But... But... no!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are you sure you want Fluttershy to come along? I mean, that pony's afraid of her own shadow. She's just going to slow us down.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, she's just a little nervous. Once we get going, I'm sure she'll be fine.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right girls, move out!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But... but...! [scream]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa. What was that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That is what it sounds like when a dragon snores.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It-- it's so... high!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, it *is* a mountain. I'm going to fly up there and check it out! Wah!

speaker: Applejack
text: Hold on, now. I think we should all go up together. Safety in numbers and all.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, all right.

speaker: Rarity
text: I hear the only thing that sparkles more than a dragon's scales are the jewels they use to build their nests. Ooo, if I play my cards right, I might be able to convince him to part with a few!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [imitating a dragon] Welcome to my cave, Rarity. Care for a diamond? [roar]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Girls! This is no laughing matter! Fluttershy, you're the expert on wild creatures. What do *you* think the dragon will be like? Fluttershy?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey! What are you waiting for? An invitation?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooo, I think I have one in my bag!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I-it's so... so... steep.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, it *is* a cliff. You could just, oh, I don't know, *fly* up here?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Come on, Fluttershy, you can do it. Flap those wings!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh... okay. [soft cry]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Augh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, we don't have time for this. What are you doing?

speaker: Applejack
text: I'll need this if I'm going to take her around the mountain another way.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [groan] *Around* the mountain? That's going to take them forever.

speaker: Applejack
text: Don't worry, Twi. We'll be there lickety-split.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whoo-hoo! I win again!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh. That's thirty-five games in a row. Best of seventy-one?

speaker: Applejack
text: [panting] We. Made. It. [panting]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Told you it was going to take them forever.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Your turn, Fluttershy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But... it's so... wide.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come on, Fluttershy, we should be much farther along by now.

speaker: Applejack
text: You could just leap on over.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't know.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: There's nothing to be afraid of. It's just a hop, skip and a jump. See?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
It's not very far
Just move your little rump
You can make it if you try with a hop, skip and jump

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We don't have time for this.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
A hop, skip and jump,
Just move your little rump,
A hop, skip and jump,
A hop, skip and jump,
A hop, skip and jump,
A hop skip and jump,
A hop skip and jump!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: O-okay. Here I go. A hop.

speaker: Applejack
text: That's it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You've got it.

speaker: Rarity
text: Almost there.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Skip.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Just don't look down.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I guess I forgot to jump.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [whispers] Let's keep it down. According to my map, we're entering an avalanche zone. The smallest peep could cause a huge rock slide.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: An... an ava... ava...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Shhh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: AVALA--!

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: Avalanche! [cries]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no! Help! Ooh!

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh my! [stops coughing] Everypony okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks to you I am.

speaker: Rarity
text: Eugh. Blech.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whoo-hoo! Let's do it again!

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh! This is why a girl always packs *extra* accessories. Oh, *please* tell me I brought the tiara that goes with this.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, think we got bigger problems than making sure our hair bows match our horseshoes.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sigh] Sorry.

speaker: Applejack
text: Aw, no big whoop, sugarcube.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, we'll just have to [sigh] climb over.

speaker: Applejack
text: Wha! Wha...

speaker: Rarity
text: My apologies.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not *your* fault.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sigh] Still think it was a good idea to bring Fluttershy along?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We're about to find out. We're here. Rainbow Dash, you'll use your wings to clear the smoke.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity and Pinkie Pie, you'll create a diversion to distract the dragon if things get a little hairy in there.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, you're ready with the apples in case he decides to attack. But it shouldn't come to that, because Fluttershy will do what she needs to do to wake him up, and between the two of us, we should be able to get him to understand why he needs to go. Is everypony ready?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay then, we're goin' in. So, what *is* the best way to wake up a sleeping dragon without upsetting him? Fluttershy? Oh, come on! Come on! [grunt] We have to do this! [grunt] Now! Every [grunts] second longer that dragon [grunts] sleeps is another [grunts] acre of Equestria that is covered in [grunts] smoke. Ooh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I-- I-- I can't go in the cave.

speaker: Ponies
text: Ugh. [crash]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, great. She's scared of *caves* now, too.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm not scared of caves, I'm scared of [mumble].

speaker: Applejack
text: What's that, sugarcube?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm scared of [mumble].

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm scared of dragons!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But Fluttershy. You have a wonderful talent dealing with all kinds of animals.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes, because they're not *dragons*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh come on! We've seen you walk right up to a horrible manticore like it was nothing.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes, because he wasn't a dragon.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Spike is a dragon. You're not scared of him.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes, because he's not a huge, gigantic, terrifying, enormous, teeth-gnashing, sharp-scale having, horn-wearing, smoke-snoring, could eat a pony in one bite, totally all grown-up dragon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But, if you're so afraid of dragons, why didn't you say something before we came all the way up here?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I was afraid to.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh.

speaker: Applejack
text: All of us are scared of that dragon.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm not!

speaker: Applejack
text: *Almost* all of us are scared of that dragon, but we've got a job to do. So, get in there with Twilight and show her what you're made of.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I-- I-- I just... can't.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Fluttershy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm goin' in. He... probably just doesn't realize what he's doing... right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mr. Dragon.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Excuse me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mr. Dragon.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, good, you're awake. Please allow me to introduce myself. My name is Twilight--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Augh! Puh! Sparkle, and my friends and I are residents here in Equestria. Ponyville, to be exact. We've come here to ask that you find another spot to take your nap. It's just that you seem to be doing an awful lot of snoring, and every time you do you send out a terrible cloud of smoke. [coughs] Equestria simply can't survive a hundred years in a dark haze. You understand, don't you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So, you'll find another place to sleep? [coughs]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So much for [coughs] persuading him.

speaker: Applejack
text: Now what?

speaker: Rarity
text: [coughs] Obviously, this situation just calls for a little "pony charm". Allow me, girls. I'm so sorry to interrupt. [clears throat] But I couldn't possibly head back home without mentioning what *handsome scales* you have. And those scales have to be hidden away in some *silly* cave for a hundred years?

speaker: Rarity
text: Personally, *I* think you should skip the snoozing and be out *there*, *showing* them off. Hmm. Obviously, I would be *more* than happy to keep an eye on your jewels while you're gone.

speaker: Rarity
text: I was *this* close to getting that diamond.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You mean... getting rid of that *dragon*?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, yeah... sure.

speaker: Applejack
text: What in tarnation...?

speaker: Rarity
text: Darling, you look ridiculous.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Exactly! Sharing a laugh is a sure-fire way to get someone on your side! Hi!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Apparently he doesn't like laughing, heh. Or sharing.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: All right, that's it. We tried persuasion, charm, whatever it is Pinkie Pie does.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It's time to stop wasting time! I'm going in!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow, no!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Get! Out! [smack]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. Sorry.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who-o-o-o-o-a!

speaker: Ponies
text: Ugh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: How dare you... How dare you! Listen here, mister. Just because you're big doesn't mean you get to be a bully! You may have huge teeth, and sharp scales, and snore smoke, and breathe fire. But you do not-- I repeat-- You do *not! Hurt! My! Friends*! You got that?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well?

speaker: Dragon
text: But that rainbow one kicked me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And I am very sorry about that. But you're bigger than she is, and you should know better. You should also know better than to take a nap where your snoring can become a health hazard to other creatures.

speaker: Dragon
text: But I--

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Don't you 'but I' me, mister. Now what do you have to say for yourself? I said, *what* do you have to say for yourself?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: There, there. No need to cry. You're not a bad dragon, you just made a bad decision. Now go pack your things. You just need to find a new place to sleep. That's all.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You did it! I knew you could do it.

speaker: Spike
text: [pant] I said come back here! Ooh! How does Fluttershy put up with you furry little things?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, take a letter.

speaker: Spike
text: [sigh] With pleasure.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *I am happy to report that the dragon has departed our fair country, and that it was my good friend, Fluttershy, who convinced him to go. This adventure has taught me to never lose faith in your friends. They can be an amazing source of strength, and can help you overcome even your greatest fears.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Always your faithful student,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Twilight Sparkle.*

speaker: Applejack
text: Twilight! You gotta come see this! She's just five away from a new pony record!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Three hundred forty-seven, three hundred forty-eight...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Dragon!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [pants] Why are you laughing? That awful dragon is back!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pinkie Pie, you scared me! I mean, uh, you... broke my concentration.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's okay, Rainbow Dash. Not everypony can be as brave as me. [scream]

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmm. Hah! Perfect.

speaker: Applejack
text: [spit] Just take the broken limbs down, Rarity. Don't y'all care about nothin' other than prettifyin'?

speaker: Rarity
text: Somepony has to. You were making an absolute mess of the town square, Applejack.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah, well, the storm's gonna make an even bigger mess if we don't prune all these loose branches so they don't tumble down on anypony.

speaker: Rarity
text: I simply cannot imagine why the Pegasus ponies would schedule a dreadful downpour this evening and ruin what could have been a glorious sunny day.

speaker: Applejack
text: [sigh] Think more practical-like, will ya? They accidentally skipped a scheduled sprinkle last week, so we need a doozy of a downpour to make up for it, is all.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh no! My wonderfully styled mane shall be ruined!

speaker: Applejack
text: Ya shoulda hurried up and finished the job already.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Ah! Oh! Ph! It's coming down too fast! Ah! Oh! Oh! Ah! Help me!

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, there. Hunker down to yer heart's content whilst I finish things.

speaker: Rarity
text: [pant] Oh, no, no, no!

speaker: Applejack
text: What now?

speaker: Rarity
text: I prefer not to get my hooves muddy.

speaker: Applejack
text: Guh. There is just no pleasin' ya, is there? Everything's got to be just so.

speaker: Rarity
text: [scoff] Well, and how does muddying my hooves serve any useful purpose?

speaker: Applejack
text: Y'all wouldn't know useful if it came up and bit'cha.

speaker: Rarity
text: [laugh] That doesn't even make any sense.

speaker: Applejack
text: Does so.

speaker: Rarity
text: Does not.

speaker: Applejack
text: Does so.

speaker: Rarity
text: Does not.

speaker: Applejack
text: Does so.

speaker: Rarity
text: Does not.

speaker: Applejack
text: Does so infinity. Hah.

speaker: Rarity
text: Does not infinity plus one. Heh. What say we go our separate ways before one of us says something she will regret?

speaker: Applejack
text: I reckon y'all are gonna say something you'll regret first.

speaker: Rarity
text: On the contrary, I believe it shall most certainly be you who says something *you* will regret first.

speaker: Applejack
text: I'm not sayin' anythin'.

speaker: Rarity
text: Nor am I.

speaker: Applejack
text: Y'all just be on yer way, then.

speaker: Rarity
text: After you!

speaker: Rarity
text: Perhaps we should stick together for now and find some shelter.

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh-huh, perhaps we should. And fast.

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh. Nice and dry under here, sorta.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Unacceptable.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack! Rarity! Applejack! Rarity!

speaker: Applejack
Rarity
text: Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come inside girls, quick.

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoa, nelly. Is inside a tree really the best place to be in a lightning storm?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It is if you have a magical lightning rod protecting your home like I do. Come on in!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hah! We are most grateful for your invitation.

speaker: Applejack
text: Thank ya kindly for yer hospitality.

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh, do be a polite house guest and go wash up please, won't you?

speaker: Applejack
text: [grumble] If I gotta spend one more second with that fussbudget Rarity today, I can't be held responsible for what I'm gonna do.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Some storm, huh? The Pegasus ponies sure have outdone themselves this time. I hope you and Applejack don't have any trouble getting home.

speaker: Rarity
text: It may indeed be a problem.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, you're welcome to stay if need be. Spike is away in Canterlot on royal business. I'm home all alone tonight. [gasp] You and Applejack should totally sleep over! We'll have a slumber party! I've always wanted one of those.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Uh, goodness. Uh, I do believe I have another engagement scheduled for this evening that completely slipped my mind until just now. [nervous laugh] Ah, silly me, I can't possibly stay here all night -- with Applejack.

speaker: Rarity
text: *Slumber 101: All You've Ever Wanted to Know About Slumber Parties But Were Afraid to Ask.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My own personal copy. It's a fantastic reference guide. You should see the table of contents. I've been waiting for a chance to use it, and today is the day! This is gonna be so great!

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes, uh, great. [nervous laughter]

speaker: Applejack
text: [gasp] What in tarnation... Now wait just a goll-darn minute. Ya make me wash the mud off my hooves, but it's okay for y'all to have mud all over yer faces?

speaker: Rarity
text: Silly! This is called a mud *mask*. It's to refresh and rejuvenate your complexion.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We're giving each other makeovers! Eee-hee! We have to do it, it says so in the book.

speaker: Applejack
text: *Slumber 101: Everything You...* Oh hey, heh, would'ja look at the time. I gotta skidaddle on home quick. I'm powerful late for, uh, fer somethin'. Uh, g'night. [cry] Or maybe I'll sit here for a spell.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hurray slumber party!

speaker: Applejack
text: Blahch. What in the world is this for?

speaker: Rarity
text: [sigh] To reduce the puffiness around one's eyes, of course.

speaker: Applejack
text: Puffiness-schmuffiness! That's good eatin'! [chews loudly]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hee-hee! Isn't this exciting? We'll do everything by the book, and that will make my slumber party officially fun.

speaker: Rarity
text: Did you hear that, Applejack? You certainly would not want to do anything that would ruin Twilight's very first slumber party, *would you*?

speaker: Applejack
text: Of course not, 'n you wouldn't either, I reckon?

speaker: Rarity
text: So do we have an agreement?

speaker: Applejack
text: You betcha. [spit]

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Gross! You know, there's messy and there's just plain rude.

speaker: Applejack
text: You know, there's fussy, 'n there's just plain gettin' on my nerves.

speaker: Rarity
text: Fortunately, I can get along with anypony, no matter how difficult *she* may be.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh yeah? Well, I'm the "get-alongin-est" pony you're ever gonna meet.

speaker: Rarity
text: That's not even a word.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is going to be the bestest slumber party ever! Yay!

speaker: Applejack
Rarity
text: Yay.

speaker: Rarity
text: So, how are you getting along over there, Applejack?

speaker: Applejack
text: Just fine, Rarity.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is so awesome! [giggle] Makeovers, check. Ooh, it says here we have to tell ghost stories. Who wants to go first?

speaker: Applejack
text: Me! I'd like to tell y'all the terrifying tale of the prissy ghost who drove everypony crazy with her unnecessary neatness. Oo-oo! I'm sure y'all are familiar with that one?

speaker: Rarity
text: Never heard of it, but I have a much better one. It's the horrifying story of the messy, inconsiderate ghost who irritated everypony within a hundred miles! Oo-oo!

speaker: Applejack
text: That's not a real story. You made it up.

speaker: Rarity
text: It is a ghost story, they're *all* made up.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've got one! This story is called *The Legend of The Headless Horse*. It was a dark and stormy night, just like this one. And three ponies were having a slumber party, just like this one...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...and just when the last pony thought she was safe, there, standing right behind her, just inches away was -- *The Headless Horse!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ghost story, check. Now, who wants s'mores?

speaker: Rarity
text: Then you place one marshmallow on the top of the chocolate and be sure it's centered -- that's critical -- and then carefully put another perfectly square graham cracker on the top. And done. Ta-da! [laugh]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ooo!

speaker: Applejack
text: Nah, ya just eat 'em. [munch] Mmm-mmm! [belch]

speaker: Rarity
text: [sigh] You could at least say excuse me.

speaker: Applejack
text: Aw, I was just about to, but you interrupted me. Pardon.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: S'mores, check. Now the next item of fun we have to do is Truth or Dare.

speaker: Rarity
text: I dare Applejack to do something carefully and neatly for a change.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh yeah? Well I dare Rarity ta lighten up and stop obsessin' over every last little detail, for a change.

speaker: Rarity
text: I think the *truth* of the matter is that somepony could stand to pay a little more attention to details.

speaker: Applejack
text: And I think the *truth* is somepony oughta quit with her fussin' so the rest of us can get things done.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, I don't think this is how the game's supposed to work. You have to give an honest answer to any question or do whatever anypony dares you to do.

speaker: Applejack
text: I dares you to step outside and let your precious, tidy mane get ruined again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You have to. It's the rule.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hah!

speaker: Rarity
text: Fine! [cries]

speaker: Rarity
text: Okay. I dare Applejack to play dress-up in a frou-frou, glittery, lacey outfit.

speaker: Applejack
text: [gasp] Happy?

speaker: Rarity
text: Very. [smirk]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, do I ever get a turn?

speaker: Applejack
text: I dare ya to enter the next rodeo when it comes to town.

speaker: Rarity
text: I dare you *not* to enter the next rodeo that comes to town.

speaker: Applejack
text: I dare ya to not comb your mane a hundred times before bed.

speaker: Rarity
text: And I dare you to comb yours just *once*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I, uh, I think we should check off Truth or Dare and move on. Let's see what our next fun-fun-fun thing is, shall we? Hm, what does this mean? Pillow fight?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, please. I am not at all interested in participating in something so crude. Oh! It! Is! On! [grunt]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I get it! Pillow, fight! Fun! Ugh. Ah. Uh, girls? Maybe we should take it down a notch?

speaker: Applejack
text: I will if she will.

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] She started it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [spit] Maybe we should just call it a night and get some sleep?

speaker: Rarity
text: Keep your muddy hooves on your side of the bed.

speaker: Applejack
text: My hooves ain't muddy.

speaker: Rarity
text: They were. There might still be a little on them.

speaker: Applejack
text: There ain't. See?

speaker: Rarity
text: Eww!

speaker: Applejack
text: Now who's bein' inconsiderate?

speaker: Rarity
text: I have to make the bed again so the blanket will be right. Get up.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hey!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ah ah ah! You'll ruin it. You have to do it like this. Mm, uh, ooh, u-u-u-uh, uh, ah.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah, that's not gonna happen. Geronimo!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hey!

speaker: Applejack
text: Ah.

speaker: Rarity
text: You did that on purpose.

speaker: Applejack
text: Um, yeah?

speaker: Rarity
text: Get up so I can fix it again.

speaker: Applejack
text: Can't hear ya, I'm asleep. [snore]

speaker: Rarity
text: M-mmm!

speaker: Applejack
text: I ain't budgin'.

speaker: Rarity
text: You will if you want any blankets.

speaker: Applejack
text: Give it back!

speaker: Rarity
text: I will not!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yes, you will!

speaker: Rarity
text: Won't!

speaker: Applejack
text: Will!

speaker: Rarity
text: Won't!

speaker: Applejack
text: Will!

speaker: Rarity
text: Won't!

speaker: Applejack
text: Will!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Enough! It says right here that the number one thing you're supposed to do at a slumber party is have fun, and thanks to you two I can't check that off!

speaker: Applejack
text: I've been tryin' my darndest to get along.

speaker: Rarity
text: No, it is I who have been trying *my* best.

speaker: Applejack
text: No, it was me.

speaker: Rarity
text: No, it was I.

speaker: Applejack
text: Me!

speaker: Rarity
text: I!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *I* hope you're happy, both of you. You've ruined my very first slumber party. The makeover, the s'mores, Truth or Dare, the pillow fight... I mean, is there anything else that could possibly go wrong?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sorry I asked.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ya see? That's why we needed to take down all those loose branches in town, not spiffy 'em up.

speaker: Rarity
text: But I--

speaker: Applejack
text: Outta my way, missy! Time's a-wastin'.

speaker: Rarity
text: Wait! Stop! Don't!

speaker: Applejack
text: No waitin'! No stoppin'! Doin'! And that, my friends, is what we call gettin' 'er done.

speaker: Rarity
text: [cries] I tried to tell you it would come crashing down in here.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, ya shoulda tried harder. [sigh] I'm mighty sorry, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's... Well, it's not okay. There's a giant tree branch in the middle of my bedroom, and the book doesn't say anything about having a giant tree branch at your slumber party. Or at least I haven't found that entry yet. Ooh... ah!

speaker: Applejack
text: What in tarnation are y'all doin' over there?

speaker: Rarity
text: Cleaning up this mess *somepony* made. Who was that again? Oh, right, that's *you*.

speaker: Applejack
text: We gotta do somethin'!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Baking*... *BFFs*... *Brothers*... There's nothing in here about *branches*.

speaker: Applejack
text: [grunts] Rarity, for pony's sake, stop sweatin' the small stuff and help me get rid of this thing! I said hussle over here and help me! Look, I'm sorry, all right?

speaker: Rarity
text: What was that?

speaker: Applejack
text: I said I'm sorry! I shoulda listened to you when you noticed where this here branch would end up. Yer annoyin' attention to detail would'a saved us from this whole mess. But right now, ya need to stop bein' so dang fussy pickin' up all the little things and help me move the one big thing in here that actually matters! Please!

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh. Uh, but I'll get all icky.

speaker: Applejack
text: Consarnit! What the... eh... you... I mean, yes, ickiness is often a side effect of hard work. But y'all need to get over it, on account I just can't fix this mess I made myself. I need your help.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh. Let's do this.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, they do have a section about backyard slumber parties. Is that what we're doing right now? Does this count as camping?

speaker: Rarity
text: U-ugh. Oh, I look awful.

speaker: Applejack
text: Better?

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmph, thanks.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, pretty! Where did these come from? They're not in the book either.

speaker: Applejack
text: Is it bigger than a barn?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [laugh] Nope.

speaker: Rarity
text: Is it smaller than a saddle?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [laugh] No! Only three of your twenty questions left!

speaker: Applejack
text: [sigh] We're never gonna guess what you're thinkin' of, it could be anythin'.

speaker: Rarity
text: Are we getting warmer?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why? Is it too cold in here for you? I can turn up the heat.

speaker: Applejack
text: She means are we gettin' any closer with our guesses?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh! No. And that technically counted as a question, so only two more left!

speaker: Applejack
text: Is it... a six-legged pony with a purple polka-dotted mane and shootin' stars comin' out of his eyes?

speaker: Rarity
text: Who flies through the air all over the world to hide magic, sparkly eggs?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's it!

speaker: Applejack
Rarity
text: It is?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No. [chuckle] It's that. But it was just so nice to see you two finally getting along, I wanted you to be able to win together.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See? We could have been having fun like this all along.

speaker: Applejack
text: If only somepony hadn't been so persnickety.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, maybe she wouldn't have been if somepony else hadn't been so sloppy.

speaker: Applejack
text: Sorry for being such a pain in the patootie.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, no, I'm sure I was much worse.

speaker: Applejack
text: That's kind of ya to say, but I'm the one who's sorry.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, I'm much more sorry than you are.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ugh. Are not.

speaker: Rarity
text: Are too.

speaker: Applejack
text: Are not!

speaker: Rarity
text: Are too.

speaker: Applejack
text: Are not.

speaker: Rarity
text: Are too.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I declare my first slumber party a success!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Have fun, check.

speaker: Rarity
text: Now take two steps to your left. Uh, no, *my* left.

speaker: Applejack
text: Whu, which is it? [crash] Whoa! That mess is your fault, not mine. [laughter]

speaker: Rarity
text: [laughter] Sorry.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *It's hard to believe that two ponies who seem to have so little in common could ever get along. But I found out that if you embrace each other's differences, you just might be surprised to discover a way to be friends after all.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So, who's up for another slumber party tomorrow night? Ugh. How about a week from Thursday? Oh, how about two weeks from Saturday? A month from now?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, what a gorgeous day!

speaker: Spike
text: Rainbow Dash must have gotten up early for once and cleared all the clouds away.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I bet all of Ponyville is going to be out enjoying the sunshine. What? Where is everypony?

speaker: Spike
text: Is it some sort of pony holiday?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not that I know of.

speaker: Spike
text: Does my breath stink? [belch]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not more than usual.

speaker: Spike
text: Is it... zombies?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh... not very likely.

speaker: Spike
text: Not likely... but possible?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Psst! Twilight! Spike! Come here! Come! Here! *Hurry!* Before she gets you!

speaker: Spike
text: Who?! The zombie pony?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Z-Zombie pony?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! There are no zombie ponies. Pinkie, what are you doing here alone in the dark?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm not alone in the dark.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Okay then, what are you *all* doing here in the dark?

speaker: Applejack
text: We're hidin' from her!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Did you see her Twilight? Did you see... Zecora?

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom! I told you never to say that name.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, I saw her glance this way...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Glance *evilly* this way.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ... And then a bunch of you flip out for no good reason.

speaker: Applejack
text: No good reason? You call protectin' yer kin no good reason? Why, as soon as my sister saw Zecora ridin' into town, she started shakin' in her lil' horseshoes.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [shakily] Did not!

speaker: Applejack
text: So I swept her up and brought her here.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I walked here myself!

speaker: Applejack
text: For safe keepin'.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Applejack, I'm not a baby! I can take care of myself!

speaker: Applejack
text: Not from that creepy Zecora.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She's mysterious.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sinister.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And spoooooky!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Will you cut that out?

speaker: Rarity
text: Just look at those stripes! So garish!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She's a zebra.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: A what!?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A zebra, and her stripes aren't a fashion choice Rarity, they're what she was born with.

speaker: Applejack
text: Born where? I've never seen a pony like that in these parts, 'cept... *her*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, she's probably not from here, and she's not a pony. My books say that zebras come from a faraway land. But I've never seen her in Ponyville. Where does she live?

speaker: Applejack
text: That's just it, she lives in... the Everfree Forest!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, sorry.

speaker: Applejack
text: The Everfree Forest just ain't natural. The plants grow...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Animals care for themselves...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And the clouds move...

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
text: All on their own!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And that wicked enchantress Zecora lives there doing her evil... stuff! She's so evil I even wrote a song about her!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Here we go...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
She's an evil enchantress
She does evil dances
And if you look deep in her eyes
She'll put you in trances
Then what will she do?
She'll mix up an evil brew
Then she'll gobble you up
In a big tasty stew
Soooo... *Watch out!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow. Catchy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's a work in progress.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is all just a lot of gossip and rumors. Now tell me; what exactly have you actually *seen* Zecora do?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well... Once a month, she comes into Ponyville.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [dramatically] *Oooooh.*

speaker: Rarity
text: Then, she *lurks* by the stores.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [dramatically] Oh, my.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And then, she digs at the ground.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [dramatically] Good gracious! [normal tone] Okay, I'm sorry. But how is any of this bad? Maybe she comes to town to visit?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah! Maybe she's just tryin' to be neighborly.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And maybe she's not lurking by the stores, maybe she's *going* to them, lurk free, to do some shopping?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah! Everypony likes to shop. You know what I think?

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom! Hush and let the big ponies talk.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [under breath] I *am* a big pony!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: W-what about digging at the ground? You've got to admit *that's* weird.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What if she's digging for innocent creatures?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I am sure there is an explanation for everything Zecora does. And if *anypony* here were actually *brave* enough to approach her, she would find out the truth.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Well, *I'm* brave enough; I'm gonna find out myself. [gasps]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You ponies are being ridiculous!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, I heard that Zecora eats *hay*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, *I* eat hay; *you* eat hay!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah, but I heard it's the *evil* way she eats hay.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hey! Where's Apple Bloom?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: The door's open.

speaker: Rarity
text: She went outside!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And Zecora's still out there.

speaker: Applejack
text: [sigh] That silly lil' filly! I told her to stay put!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, you stay here in case Apple Bloom comes back.

speaker: Spike
text: Will do!

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom?

speaker: Applejack
text: You get back here right now!

speaker: Zecora
text: Beware! Beware, you pony folk! Those leaves of blue are not a joke!

speaker: Applejack
text: Y-you keep your creepy mumbo-jumbo to yourself, ya hear?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sighs] Oh brother.

speaker: Zecora
text: Beware! Beware!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, back at ya, Zecora! You and your lame curse are the ones who better beware!

speaker: Applejack
text: And you! Why couldn't you just listen to yer big sister?

speaker: Applejack
text: Who knows what kind of nasty curse Zecora could have just put on you?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Just like in my song! [Starts singing a shorter version of "Evil Enchantress"]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You guys, there's no such thing as curses!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, *that's* interesting to hear coming from Miss Magic Pants herself.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My magic, *real* magic, comes from within. It's a skill you're born with. Curses are artificial, fake magic. It's conjured with potions and incantations; all smoke and mirrors meant to scare. But curses have no real power, they're just an old pony tale.

speaker: Applejack
text: Just you wait, Twilight. You're gonna learn that some pony tales really *are* true.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *She's an evil enchantress, she does evil dances!*

speaker: Zecora
text: *Beware! Beware!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *If you look deep in her eyes, she will put you in trances!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Yeah, was that supposed to scare us?!*

speaker: Rarity
text: *Wicked, wicked zebra!*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *... it's a curse.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Then what will she do?*

speaker: Applejack
text: *Just you wait, Twilight; some pony tales really are true.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Then she'll gobble you up in a big tasty stew! Soooo... Watch out!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Ugh*... what a dream... Curses, schmurses. Whoa! [chuckle] Maybe Zecora cursed my hair. [Laughs nervously and then gasps] Or she cursed my horn!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No no no no no! None of these books have a cure! Ugh! There has to be a real reason for this! An illness? An allergy?!

speaker: Spike
text: A curse!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I said a *real* reason. Something that points to something *real*.

speaker: Spike
text: How about this one?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "*Supernaturals*"? Spike, the word supernatural refers to things like ghosts and spirits and zombies, which are as make-believe as curses. This book is just a bunch of hooey!

speaker: Spike
text: But what if you're wrong, Twilight? What if this really is a-

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ah pfurse!

speaker: Spike
text: A purse? How could it be a purse?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie? What happened?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Pee pah Zthecora! Sthe put a cursthe on me!

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, say it, don't spray it, Pinkie!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [thud] Ow! [thud] Oh! She's [thud] trying to say-ow!- Zecora [thud]-oh!-[crash] she slapped us all with a-ow- curse!

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm afraid I have to agree. [Blows hair out of her face]

speaker: Applejack
text: [high pitched voice] I hate to say I told ya so, Twilight, but I told ya so!

speaker: Applejack
text: It's a curse, I tells ya!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But Fluttershy... seems just fine!

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes, there doesn't seem to be a *thing* wrong with her.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy? Are you okay? Is there something wrong with you? Would you care to tell us? So... you're not going to tell us? Yes you're not, or yes you will?

speaker: Applejack
text: Good gravy, girl! What's wrong with you?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [deep male voice] I don't want to talk about it.

speaker: Spike
text: This is hilarious! [laughs] Look at all of you! We got: Hairity, Rainbow Crash, Spitty Pie, Apple Teeny, Flutterguy, and... uh... I got nothin'... Twilight Sparkle. I mean seriously, I can't even work with that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [Sarcastic laughter] This is no joke, Spike. Now start looking for more books so I can find a cure!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [groans] I think we'll find a cure to this curse at Zecora's place!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's not a curse!

speaker: Applejack
text: I agree with Dash! We'll go to Zecora's and force her to remove this hex!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's not a hex either!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: This is all my fault. If I hadn't followed Zecora in the first place, none of this would have happened. I just gotta fix this.

speaker: Applejack
text: Now where does she think she's goin' this time?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I don't care what you say, Twilight. It's time to pony up and confront Zecora. Come on, girls. Are you with me?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ah am-pft!

speaker: Rarity
text: And I as well.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh, I don't know. Seems awfully dangerous.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: How about you, Applejack? Applejack?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Pf-she's gone-pft!

speaker: Rarity
text: Aah! Or somepony stepped on her!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ... or sat on her?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rarity's hair!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! OH! Pinkie, what are you doing? Ah, really. Aah! You ever hear of personal space?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nopthe.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Apple Bloom is gone too!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I bet they went after Zecora.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well we better go find them. Come on girls, let's go.

speaker: Rarity
text: [grunt] Oh dear. Oh, this is so unseemly. Auuuaah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, a little help here?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oopsie! Sorry.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [crash] OW!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh... Spike? Are you coming?

speaker: Spike
text: Nope! Uh... gotta stay here and look for a cure. [gasp] Twilight Flopple!

speaker: Applejack
text: Stop right there! Turn around right now, missy!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No.

speaker: Applejack
text: No?! You can't ignore a direct order from your big sister!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Hehehe. Sorry, Applejack, but *I'm* the big sister now.

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom, you come back here right this instant! *I'm gonna tell Big McIntosh on you!* Aw, pony feathers.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: C'mon girls. We've got to get to Zecora's. Hurry!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh... Ahaha. Easier said than done.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, wait for me! [screaming and owing]

speaker: Applejack
text: Rainbow! Thank Celestia! There's no time to lose! I need to get to Zecora's pronto! Giddy-up pony!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ex-CUSE me?

speaker: Applejack
text: YEEE-HAW!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What the...

speaker: Applejack
text: No, Rainbow Dash. Other way!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh. I look horrible!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Plis place plooks horrible!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh my. That place really *does* look horrible. Nice decorations, if you like creepy!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Sthe sthtole my sthong! Shthe shtole mm mm!

speaker: Rarity
text: She stole your song?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh Pinkie. Doesn't sound anything like your song.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ah. Hmm... Pbth! [whimper]

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
She's an evil enchantress
And she does evil dances
And if you look deep in her eyes
She will put you in trances
Then what would she do?
She'll mix up an evil brew
Then she'll gobble you up
In a big tasty stew
Soooo... Watch out.

speaker: Rarity
text: You saw those terrible things. *Now* do you believe us Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Scary looking masks, confusing incantations, and a great big bubbling cauldron? [sigh] Everything *is* pointing to Zecora being... *bad*. Or... what if Zecora is just making soup?

speaker: Zecora
text: Mmm! The perfect temperature for ponies, I presume. Now, where is that little Apple Bloom?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Or... what if she's making Apple Bloom soup?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What if she's making Apple Bloom soup?!

speaker: Applejack
text: I'm comin' for ya, Apple Bloom!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aaah!

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoa there. Easy, Rainbow Crash.

speaker: Zecora
text: Oh. [Native language]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What have you done with Apple Bloom?

speaker: Zecora
text: No! No! [Native language]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ahh!

speaker: Zecora
text: Ponies! What is this you...

speaker: Zecora
text: No! You know not what you do! You've gone and spilled my precious brew!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We're onto you Zecora. I didn't want to believe that you cursed us, but the evidence is overwhelming!

speaker: Rarity
text: You made me look ridiculous.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You made me *sound* ridiculous!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [incoherent] You made me speak ridiculous!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You ruined my horn!

speaker: Zecora
text: How *dare* you! You destroy my home, destroy my work. Then rudely accuse *me* of being a jerk?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You put this curse on us, now you're gonna uncurse us.

speaker: Zecora
text: It is unwise to venture down this road. Your actions will make my anger explode!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Where is Apple Bloom!?*

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Zecora! I think I found all the things ya asked for. What in Ponyville is goin' on here?

speaker: Applejack
text: [gasp] Apple Bloom! You're okay!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Why wouldn't I be?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Because Zecora is an evil enchantress who cursed us and was gonna cook you up into soup!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh Twilight. Did those silly fillies finally get in yer head? You know there's no such thing as a curse.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Apple Bloom, sweetie. You can't just stand there and tell me this isn't a curse.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: This *isn't* a curse.

speaker: Zecora
text: If you will remember back, the words I spoke were quite exact. [flashback: Beware, beware you pony folk. Those leaves of blue are not a joke.]

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: It was a warnin'. About that blue plant. It's called Poison Joke.

speaker: Zecora
text: That plant is much like poison *oak*. But its results are like a joke.

speaker: Applejack
text: What in the hay does that mean?

speaker: Zecora
text: It means this plant does not breed wrath. Instead this plant just wants a laugh.

speaker: Applejack
text: Will somepony please talk normal?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I think what she's saying is that when we ran in to save Apple Bloom, we ran into the poison joke. All our problems are just little jokes it played on us.

speaker: Applejack
text: *Little* jokes?! Very funny.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, fine. But what about the cauldron?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And the chanting?

speaker: Rarity
text: And the creepy décor?

speaker: Zecora
text: Treasures of the native land where I am from. This one speaks 'hello', and this 'welcome'.

speaker: Rarity
text: Not welcoming at *all*, if you ask me.

speaker: Zecora
text: The words I chanted were from olden times. Something you call a nursery rhyme.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But the cauldron... The Apple Bloom soup?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Lookie here Twilight. That pot of water wasn't for me, it was for all these herbal ingredients. The cure for poison joke is a simple old-natural remedy. You just gotta take a bubble bath!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But I tried to find a cure in all my books and couldn't find anything. What book has this natural remedy?

speaker: Zecora
text: Here is the book, you see? Sad that you lack it in your library.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Actually, I do have this book, but I didn't look inside because the title was so... Weird. *Supernaturals: Natural Remedies and Cure-alls That Are Simply Super*. I...I... I'm so sorry, Zecora. I had the answer the whole time, if only I had bothered to look inside.

speaker: Zecora
text: [chuckle] Maybe next time you will take a second look, and not judge the cover of the book.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Hahaha.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Zecora? Would you be kind enough to mix up another batch of the herbal bath?

speaker: Zecora
text: Mix it up I certainly will. Yet I am missing an herb from Ponyville.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: But whenever Zecora comes to town, all the shops are *mysteriously* closed.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, well... I think we can help you with that.

speaker: Daisy
text: Look Rose! How awful!

speaker: Rose
text: The wicked enchantress has cursed them all.

speaker: Lily Valley
text: The horror, the horror!

speaker: Daisy
text: Run, ponies! Run!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Daisy, we need to talk.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *My friends and I all learned an important lesson this week: Never judge a book by its cover. Someone may look unusual, or funny, or scary. But you have to look past that and learn who they are inside. Real friends don't care what your "cover" is; it's the "contents" of a pony that count. And a good friend, like a good book, is something that will last forever.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Your faithful student,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Twilight Sparkle*

speaker: Lotus Blossom
text: Miss Zecora, I would love to get the recipe for this bath. It's simply luxurious!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Applejack! Hey, where's Applejack?!

speaker: Applejack
text: [normal voice] I'm right here, *little* sis. I ain't tiny no more!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! I have never felt so lovely in all my life!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, my gosh! I never realized how horrible it is not to be able to talk. I mean, I *love* talking so much, and when I couldn't talk anymore, my tongue was all 'ehhhh'! It was the *worst*! Don't you agree, Fluttershy?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [normal voice] ... Yes.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: La, la la, la la, la la, la la. Thank you little squirrel, but remember: these flowers are for Princess Celestia. Only the prettiest ones will do. La, la la, la la, la la, la la.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Gah!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hello, little guy. I've never seen anything like you before.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, are you hungry? Here you go. [gasp] I guess you *were* hungry.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You're the cutest thing *ever*! I can't wait to show you to my friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh! Hurry up, Spike! This place isn't gonna clean itself.

speaker: Spike
text: It also didn't mess itself up.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Celestia will be here tomorrow!

speaker: Spike
text: I thought this was just an unofficial *casual* visit.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There's nothing casual about a visit from royalty. I want this place to be spotless, and you've barely made a dent in the clutter.

speaker: Spike
text: Maybe you should, ugh, start reading them one at a time-- whoa ho! Aw.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Everything's got to be perfect. No time for fooling around.

speaker: Spike
text: You know, this would be an awful lot easier if there weren't two of us here getting under each other's feet.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Great idea. You clean, I'll go see how everyone else's preparations are coming.

speaker: Spike
text: Or maybe I should... [groan]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What happened to the rest of her name?

speaker: Golden Harvest
text: We couldn't fit it all in.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You can't hang a banner that says "Welcome Princess *Celest*". Take it down and try again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *That* looks perfect. Keep up the good work.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hello, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. How's the banquet coming?

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Uh...it would be coming a little better if...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm... [slurp]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Pinkie*! What are you doing? Those sweets are supposed to be for the princess.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I know. That's why I'm tasting them. Somepony needs to make sure that everything is tasty enough to touch the royal tongue, and I, Pinkie Pie, declare that these treats are fit for a *king*, or a *queen*, or a *princess*.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Twilight, Pinkie, you won't believe... oh, I'm sorry. Uh, am I interrupting?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, not at all. Come on in and make yourself at home. [slurp] What's going on, Fluttershy?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You won't believe what I found at the edge of the Everfree Forest. Come on out, little guy. It's okay.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] Three?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They're *amazing*. What are they?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm not sure. I'm also not sure where these other two came from.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'll take one off your hooves. I've never seen anything so... *adorable*. Besides, it'll be nice to have a companion for Spike so he won't bother me so much while I'm studying.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Pinkie, do you want the other one?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ugh! A parasprite? *Are you kidding*?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Ugh*?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A para-*what*?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: How could you not like...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ugh. Now I gotta go find a *trombone*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A *what*?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A trombone, you know: [trombone imitation]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ahhh, typical Pinkie.

speaker: Rarity
text: Stand still, Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh, I *caaan't*, I need to *flyyy*! This is waaay too boring for me.

speaker: Rarity
text: *Do* you want to look nice for Princess Celestia or not?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow. Rarity, those outfits are gorgeous.

speaker: Rarity
text: Mmhmm. Thank you, Twilight. Nice to know *someone* appreciates my talents.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh, *sooo boooring*.

speaker: Rarity
text: Huh?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What's that sound, Twilight?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wow, what are they?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The better question is, where did they come from? I only had one a minute ago.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, I'll take one.

speaker: Rarity
text: Me too, oh, they're perfect.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Does anypony know where I can find an accordion?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Girls! *Hello*! This is important. Durgh! Thanks a lot.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] The decorations, the banquet, I really hope everything comes together in time for tomorrow.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, [yawn] what's there to worry about?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! Wake up! What happened?

speaker: Spike
text: Huh? Whaaa! What's going on?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Where did they come from?

speaker: Spike
text: I don't know. The little guy got hungry in the night, so I gave him a snack, but... I have no idea where these others came from. Oh no! They're messing up all my hard work!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The princess will be here in a few hours.

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, help me round up these little guys.

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh, what does it look like I'm doin'? Ooow, waaah! D'oh. I know, I know, "stop fooling around".

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh? Huh?! [screech] [grunt] [groan] Get off me! [groan] [grunt] Waaa!

speaker: Rarity
text: Not only are you adorable, but you're also quite useful.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Are you okay? Aaah! [gasp] *Eewww*. Aaah! Gross gross *gross*! No creature that behaves so revoltingly is allowed in my boutique!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Look Rarity, Applejack loaned me a harmonica. [plays harmonica] Isn't that great?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] And not a moment too soon.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh, Pinkie, I'm a little busy right now.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And I'm *not*? You know how many more instruments I've gotta find? *A lot*, that's how many. Now if we split the list between us, we might just make it in time.

speaker: Rarity
text: *Please*, Pinkie, I don't have time for some silly scavenger hunt. I've got a *real* problem.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You've got a real problem, all right. And a banjo is the only answer!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] I see we're having the same problem.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ditto!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy knows *everything* about animals, I'm sure she can tell us how to stop them from multiplying.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...or not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh, do something Fluttershy, can't you control them?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I've tried everything I know: I've tried begging, and pleading, and beseeching, and asking politely and...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Guh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If we can't get them under control before the princess arrives, it'll be a total disaster.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ew! If you ask me, it's already a total disaster.

speaker: Applejack
text: Here's all those apples you wanted, Fluttershy, but I still can't figure why y'need so many. Hey!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What do we do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] I got it! Nopony can herd like Applejack.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah! We can drive 'em back into the forest.

speaker: Applejack
text: [scoffs] I'll rastle 'em up, but I need everypony's help to do it. Twilight, you and Rarity wait over there. I'll herd the little critters straight at ya like a funnel. Rainbow Dash, you and Fluttershy stay on top of 'em, don't let 'em fly away.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aye aye.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeeeeeee-haw!

speaker: Applejack
text: Alright y'all, here goes nothin'. Look out Rarity, that one's fixin' to get away. Keep a lead on 'em, Rainbow Dash! Hold on girls, we're almost there.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight, we don't have much time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're telling me. The princess could arrive at any moment.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Exactly. That's why I need you gals to drop what you're doing and help me find some *maracas*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maracas? Pinkie, we've got much bigger problems than missing *maracas*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] You're right! Getting a tuba has to be our number one goal. Follow me. I said, follow me!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pinkie Pie, you are so *random*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And you are all so stubborn!

speaker: Applejack
text: Forget her ladies. Focus. Head 'em up and move 'em out.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: All *right*! [grunt]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ouch.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We did it. Nice work, Applejack.

speaker: Applejack
text: Couldn't a'done it without y'all.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now let's get back and clean up the mess they made before the princess arrives.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, everyone knows what to do, right? We gotta work extra hard to make up for lost time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Where did they come from?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, I may have kept just one. Heh. I couldn't help myself. They're just so cute.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We don't have time to keep rounding up these things. What do we do now?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We call in the weather patrol. [grunts]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Time to take out the adorable trash. YAAAAAA!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [grunt] Way to go, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Applejack
text: Looks like our problems are solved.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: They will be with these cymbals. [crash] Hey! Give me those back!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa. Yaa! Yow! Whoa! Wow! I can't hold it! She's breaking up.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie, what have you done?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I've lost a brand new pair of cymbals, that's what I've done.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Will you forget about your silly instruments for one second? You're ruining our efforts to save Ponyville.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Me? Ruin? I'm not the ruiner, I'm the ruin-*ee*! Or is it ruiness? Ruinette?

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on girls, there's no reasoning with that one. She's a few apples short of a bushel.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey! I'm trying to tell you all that the ruining is on the other hoof. If you'd just slow down and *listen to me*!

speaker: Gardening pony
text: Aah!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What do we do? They're eating all the food in town.

speaker: Applejack
text: [gasp] My apples!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We've gotta do something. [gasps] I got it! I'll cast a spell to make them stop eating all the food.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Look, tambourines! If you could all just... [scream] [tambourines shake]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. Hey, it worked. They're not eating the *food* anymore.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh no... if they get inside my store... *Everypony for herself*!

speaker: Rarity
text: My outfits! Go on, shoo! Get out of here, you naughty! Naughty! [shrieks]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *I'll save you*!

speaker: Applejack
text: No woodland creature's gonna eat the Apple Family's crop.

speaker: Applejack
text: Brace yourself, y'all, here they come. [gasp] Didn't see that one comin'.

speaker: Spike
text: Help!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] They're eating the *words*. [grunts]

speaker: Spike
text: Help...

speaker: Zecora
text: Ugh. Have you gone mad?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Zecora, these little guys are devouring Ponyville, and the princess is on her way. Can you help us, please?

speaker: Zecora
text: Oh, monster of so little size. Is that a parasprite before my eyes?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know! Is it?

speaker: Zecora
text: Tales of crops and harvests consumed. If these creatures are in Ponyville, you're doomed.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [grunts] Oh no, here she comes.

speaker: Daisy
text: Aaaah, aaaaaaah!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, here's the plan. Rainbow Dash, you distract them.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: YAAAA!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Good. Everyone else, we need to build an exact copy of Ponyville right over there. *We've got less than a minute*. Zecora was right, we're doomed. Oh no, the princess's procession is here. It's all over!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie? We're in the middle of a crisis here. This is no time for your... nonsense?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Look.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Twilight Sparkle, my prized pupil.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hello, princess.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: So lovely to see you again, as well as your friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So... how was the trip? Hit much traffic?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Ah, what is this? Oh ho ho, these creatures are adorable.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: They're not *that* adorable.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I'm terribly honored that you and the good citizens of Ponyville have organized a parade in honor of my visit.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Parade? Oh. Yes, the parade.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Unfortunately, that visit is going to have to wait for another time. I'm afraid an emergency has come up in Fillydelphia. Apparently there's been some sort of *infestation*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: An... infestation?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Yes, a swarm of incredibly bothersome creatures has invaded the poor town. I'm sorry Twilight, to have to put you all through so much trouble.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Trouble? What trouble?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Before I have to go, would you care to give me your latest report on the magic of friendship in person?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My... report?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Haven't you learned anything about friendship?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Actually, I have. *I've learned that sometimes the solution to your problems can come from where you least expect it. It's a good idea to stop and listen to your friends' opinions and perspectives...*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Even when they don't always seem to make sense.*

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I'm so proud of you, Twilight Sparkle, and I'm very impressed with your friends as well. It sounds like you're all learning so much from each other.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank you, princess.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, what happened to the princess?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Emergency in Fillydelphia.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Some sort of *infestation*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh no! Have they got parasprites too? Well, have tuba, will travel.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I think the princess can handle it.

speaker: Applejack
text: So you knew what those critters were all along, huh Pinkie Pie?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, duh! Why do you think I was so frantic to get my hooves on all these instruments? I *tried* to tell you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We know, Pinkie Pie, and we're sorry we didn't listen.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're a great friend, even if we don't always understand you.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Thanks guys, you're all great friends too, even when *I* don't understand me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You saved my reputation with Princess Celestia, and more importantly, you saved Ponyville.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...Or not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Spike, wake up. Wake up, wake up, it's Winter Wrap Up day!

speaker: Spike
text: Huh? Mommy?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Winter Wrap Up!

speaker: Spike
text: You're not mommy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, the first day of spring is tomorrow, so everypony in Ponyville needs to clean up winter. Now help me get ready.

speaker: Spike
text: Clean up winter? Who cleans up winter? Don't they just use magic to change the seasons like they do in Canterlot?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No Spike, Ponyville was started by Earth ponies, so for hundreds of years they've never used magic to clean up winter. It's traditional. [sigh]

speaker: Spike
text: It's ridiculous. No magic... Fuh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, let's see: scarf, check; saddle, check; boots, check; Spike refusing to get up and going back to sleep, check. It's a good thing I'm so organized, *I'm ready*. Bright and early. Oh... maybe a little too early.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Those must be the team vests Rarity designed. Blue for the weather team, green for the plant team, and tan for the animal team. I wonder which team vest I'll be wearing.

speaker: Spike
text: I'll take a blue vest, same color as my blanket, which I think I hear calling my name. "Spike! Spike! Come to bed!" Ugh, it's too early.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Thank you, everypony, for being here bright and early. We need every single pony's help to wrap up winter, and bring in spring.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Now, all of you have your vests, and have been assigned to your teams, so let's do even better than last year, and have the quickest Winter Wrap Up ever!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, this is so exciting.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: All right everypony, find your team leader, and let's get galloping!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh gosh, where should I go? I'm not sure where I fit in. What exactly does everypony do?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
Three months of winter coolness
And awesome holidays

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
We've kept our hoovsies warm at home
Time off from work to play

speaker: Applejack
text:
But the food we've stored is runnin' out
And we can't grow in this cold

speaker: Rarity
text:
And even though I love my boots
This fashion's getting old

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
The time has come to welcome spring
And all things warm and green
But it's also time to say goodbye
It's winter we must clean
How can I help? I'm new, you see
What does everypony do?
How do I fit in without magic?
I haven't got a clue!

speaker: Choir
text:
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up!
Let's finish our holiday cheer
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up!

speaker: Applejack
text: 'Cause tomorrow spring–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: –is here!

speaker: Choir
text: 'Cause tomorrow spring is here!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
Bringing home the southern birds
A Pegasus' job begins
And clearing all the gloomy skies
To let the sunshine in
We move the clouds
And we melt the white snow

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
text:
When the sun comes up
Its warmth and beauty will glow!

speaker: Choir
text:
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up!
Let's finish our holiday cheer
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up!
'Cause tomorrow spring is here
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up!
'Cause tomorrow spring is here
'Cause tomorrow spring is here!

speaker: Rarity
text:
Little critters hibernate
Under the snow and ice

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
We wake up all their sleepy heads
So quietly and nice

speaker: Rarity
text:
We help them gather up their food
Fix their homes below

speaker: Fluttershy
text: We welcome back the southern birds

speaker: Fluttershy
Rarity
text: So their families can grow!

speaker: Choir
text:
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up! ([Rarity] Winter, winter)
Let's finish our holiday cheer
Winter Wrap Up! Winter Wrap Up! ([Rarity] Winter, winter)
'Cause tomorrow spring is here
