text: I knew you could do it, Twilight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know how it happened; coincidence, dumb luck, or what, but you said there'd be a doozy here at Froggy Bottom Bogg, and I'd say we just had ourselves one heck of a doozy. I mean that hydra—

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That wasn't it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Spike
text: What wasn't what?

speaker: Applejack
text: What are you talking about, Pink?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: The hydra wasn't the doozy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm still getting the shudders. Oo-o-oh, oo-o-oh. You see? There it is again. Whatever the doozy was at Froggy Bottom Bogg, my Pinkie Sense says it still hasn't happened.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh? But I— WHAT?! The hydra *wasn't* the doozy?! How could it *not be* the doozy?! What could be *doozier* than that?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Dunno, but it just wasn't it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rrrgh... [flames and growls] Ooh... I give up...

speaker: Spike
text: Give what up, Twi?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The fight. I can't fight it anymore. I don't understand how, why, or what, but Pinkie Sense somehow... makes sense. I don't see how it does, but it just does. Just because I don't understand doesn't mean it's not true.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Y-Y-Y-You m-m-mean you b-b-b-believe?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Eeyup, I guess I do.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oo-woo-oo-oo-oo, woo-oo-oo-oo-oh, woo-oo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh. Ooh! [gasp] That was it. *That's* the doozy.

speaker: Spike
text: Bbrrbbrrbbrr.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What? What is?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You believing. I never expected *that* to happen. *That* was the doozy, oh and, oh what a doozy of a doozy it was! La-la-la-la-la...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, good, Spike, you're here. Take a letter.

speaker: Spike
text: With pleasure, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia, I'm happy to report that—* Spike, what have I been saying about focus?

speaker: Spike
text: I know, but I... Well...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's wrong, Spike? Never thought you'd see me with an umbrella hat on?

speaker: Spike
text: Not really, no.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie's tail's a-twitchin'. What else can I do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *I am happy to report that I now realize there are wonderful things in this world you just can't explain, but that doesn't necessarily make them any less true. It just means you have to*choose*to believe in them, and sometimes it takes a friend to show you the way.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Honk!

speaker: Spike
text: Honk.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Always your faithful student, Twilight Sparkle.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: There it goes again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I wonder what's gonna drop outta the sky *this* time?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You never know.

speaker: Spike
text: Twitchy tail? Holy guacamole!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Now, what have we learned?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Loss of control.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Good.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Screaming and hollering.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes, and most importantly?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Passion!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Right! So now that you know the elements of a good cheer, let's hear one.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [inhales] Yay.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: ... Ugh. You're gonna cheer for me like *that*? Louder.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yay.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Louder!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yay.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Louder!*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [deep breath] [quietly] Yaaay.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Too loud?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yay.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [deep breath] And now, phase one of my routine.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wooo.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Phase two.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Way to go.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Here we go. Phase three. The sonic rainboom. C'mon! [grunt] Uh-oh. [scream]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] Last one. Thank you so much for helping me clean up all these books, guys. It was a *crazy* week of studying.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Rainbow Dash, you rock! Woohoo. [gasp] Did my cheering do that?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hehe. Sorry about that ladies. *That* was a truly feeble performance.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Actually, it wasn't all bad. I particularly liked it when you made the clouds spin.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh. I'm not talking about my performance, I'm talking about yours. That feeble cheering!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What are you two arguing about?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Were we arguing? I'm sorry.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [grunt] I wish *you* guys could come to Cloudsdale to see me compete in the Best Young Flyer Competition.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's that?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's where all the greatest Pegasus flyers get together and show off their different flying styles! Some are fast! [makes car sounds] And some are graceful. Whoa, whoa, *whoa*!

speaker: Applejack
text: Golly. I'd love to see you strut yer stuff in that competition.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah. I wish you guys could be there. Fluttershy's a great support, but her cheering isn't exactly inspirational.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh! I'd love to see you make a sonic rainboom! It's like, the most coolest thing ever! Even though I've never actually seen it, but I mean come on! It's a sonic rainboom! How not cool could it possibly not be?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's a sonic rainboom?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You really need to get out more. The sonic rainboom is legendary! When a Pegasus like Rainbow Dash gets going sooo fast... Boom! A sonic boom and a rainbow can happen all at once!

speaker: Applejack
text: And Rainbow Dash here's the only pony to ever pull it off!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It was a long time ago... I was just a filly.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah, but you're gonna do it again, right?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are... you kidding? I'm the greatest flyer to ever come out of Cloudsdale! I could do sonic rainbooms in my sleep.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow. If you pull that off, you'll win the crown for sure!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The grand prize is an entire day with the Wonderbolts. A whole day of flying with my lifelong heroes... It'll be a dream come true!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yay.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm gonna go rest up. Don't wanna over prepare myself, y'know. Hehe. *You*, on the other hand, better keep practicing. I need a cheering section to match my spectacular performance.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She's practiced that move a hundred times, and she's never even come *close* to doing it. I don't know if I can cheer loud enough to help her.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, guess we better get this cleaned up... again.

speaker: Rarity
text: Go on, go on.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Go on what?

speaker: Rarity
text: Find a spell that will get us wingless ponies into Cloudsdale. Didn't you see how nervous she was?

speaker: Applejack
text: Nervous? Have you spit yer bit or somethin'? She was tootin' her own horn louder than the brass section of a marching band!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, puh-lease. I have put on enough fashion shows to recognize *stage fright* when I see it. We've got to find a way to be there for her. Now go on!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Owaa! Ugh. How am I supposed to find a flight spell in this mess?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A flight spell? One sec. Page twenty-seven.

speaker: Applejack
text: How'd you do that?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It landed on my face when Rainbow Dash knocked me into the bookcase.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Here it is! A spell that will allow Earth ponies to fly for three days. Ooh, it looks *really* difficult... I'm not sure I can do it.

speaker: Rarity
text: You've got to try!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay... But who's gonna volunteer to be the test subject?

speaker: Rarity
text: I will! For Rainbow Dash, I will go first.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Here goes. [grunts] [screams]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I think it worked!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You've got to learn to be *assertive*, Fluttershy. Don't be afraid to speak up.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Well, well, well. What do we have here?

speaker: Hoops
text: It's our old friend Rainbow *Crash*!

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Get kicked outta any flight schools lately?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I *didn't* get kicked out.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Face it, Rainbow Crash. Flight school had *too*many rules, and not enough naptimes for you.

speaker: Hoops
text: Huh, ask her about the sonic rainboom.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: That's nothing but an old mare's tale. You don't have the skills to try something like that.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now *wait just a minute!* Oh, I'm sorry. I'm trying to be more assertive. Anyhow... She *is*going to do a sonic rainboom!

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: No she's not, 'cause there's no such thing!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Then show up at the Cloudeseum and see for yourself! ...If you're free.

speaker: Hoops
text: [within laughter] Yeah, I'll be free.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Oh, don't worry. We'll be there!

speaker: Hoops
text: See you then, Rainbow *Crash*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Did you see that? I was so assertive!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sigh] Those guys are right. I'll never be able to do it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But, Rainbow Dash. Just because you've failed the sonic rainboom a hundred *thousand* times in practice doesn't mean you won't be able to do it in front of an *entire* stadium, full of impatient, super-critical sportsfan ponies.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Aaaaaah! What do I do?! Everypony's gonna see me fail! The Wonderbolts will never let a loser like me join. Princess Celestia will probably*banish *me to the Everfree Forest!*My life is *ruined!*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Rare...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rare?! The sonic rainboom is *way* more than rare!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Rarity?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rarity! Are you... flying?!

speaker: Rarity
text: I most certainly am! Aren't my wings smashing?! Twilight made them for me. I just *adore* them! Why so shocked? We couldn't leave our favorite flyer without a *big*cheering section!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: "We"? I... I can't believe it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's incredible!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This is *so*cool! You guys made it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Sure did!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait! How'd you do that? Only Pegasus ponies can walk on clouds.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Haha. Pretty cool, huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I found a spell that makes temporary wings, but it was too difficult to do more than once. So I found an easier spell that lets the rest of us walk on clouds.

speaker: Applejack
text: And we came to cheer you to victory!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: To be honest, I was starting to get just the *teeniest, tiniest* bit nervous. But I feel a *lot* better now that you guys are here. Hey, we've got some time before the competition. Why don't Fluttershy and I show you around Cloudsdale?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Yes!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Here it is: the greatest city in the sky!

speaker: Group
text: Oooh! Aaah!

speaker: Rarity
text: [in mirror] Oooh! Aaah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uhh... Some of the greatest Pegasi in history came from Cloudsdale!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, wait for me!

speaker: Steam Roller
text: Those wings are gorgeous!

speaker: Rarity
text: Why, thank you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Be careful with those wings, Rarity. They're made from gossamer and morning dew, and they're incredibly delicate.

speaker: Rarity
text: Don't worry, Twilight. I'm sure they can't get worn out from too much attention.

speaker: Applejack
text: Since we're up here, I'd sure like to get a look at where the weather's made.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Great idea! C'mon, girls. To the weather factory!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This is where they make the snowflakes. Each one is hoofmade. As you can see, it's a delicate operation.

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] Ooh, the snowflakes look even better from up here.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We better move on before Rarity ruins winter and causes a drought.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And here's where they make the rainbows!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [slurp] [pants] Spicyyyyyy!...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, rainbows aren't really known for their flavor.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: [offscreen] Whoa!

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Oh, where'd you get those amazing wings? I want a pair!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmm... Yeah, I guess I could see that.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Oh, hey look, it's Rainbow Crash again!

speaker: Hoops
text: Heheheyeah! Rainbow... Umm... Eyah... *Crash*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rarity! What're you doing talking to *these*guys?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, they were just admiring my wings, Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Yeah, you should forget the sonic rainboom and just get yourself some wings like these!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oohh...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uhh... C'mon, girls. Why don't we go see how clouds are made? Don't listen to them. You're gonna win that competition for sure!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are you kidding? I can't *do* the sonic rainboom, and just look at these boring, plain old feathered wings. I'm doomed!

speaker: Rarity
text: What, these old things? Go ahead, everypony. Photos *are* encouraged.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity, we're supposed to be helping Rainbow Dash relax, remember? Put your wings away and stop showing off!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, pfft. How can you ask me to put away perfection?

speaker: Rarity
text: *Waa-haa-haa!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash, are you okay? You don't look so good.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [panting] Of course! Why wouldn't I be okay? Everyone's so in love with Rarity's wings that they won't even notice when I totally *blow it* in the Best Young Flyer's Competition.

speaker: Rainbowshine
text: Hey! There's an idea! YOU should enter the competition!

speaker: Foggy Fleece
text: Yeah! I could watch you fly all day long!

speaker: Rarity
text: There really isn't anypony who uses their wings quite like me. Perhaps I *should* compete.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: WHAT?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What am I gonna DO?! I'll never win the competition now...

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm going to be a while!

speaker: Madden
text: Fillies and gentlecolts! Please rise and join me in welcoming our beloved Princess Celestia!

speaker: Madden
text: Please welcome our celebrity judges for the Best Young Flyer Competition: the Wonderbolts!

speaker: Madden
text: And now, let's find out who will take the prize as this year's best young flyer!

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: Okay, contestant number one, you're up.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Eyah!

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: Okay, number two, let's go.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Umm...

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: C'mon, c'mon, we ain't got all day!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: She's talking to you!

speaker: Dr Hooves
text: Oh. Umm... Oh, I guess that's me!

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: Okay, number four, time to go.

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm number four, and I need just one more itsy-bitsy minute. Be a dear and have somepony go ahead of me, hmm?

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: Look, I don't care who it is, but somepony's gotta go on!

speaker: Meadow Song
text: Let's *do*this!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uhh... What am I gonna do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I loved number seven. Doing fifteen barrel rolls in a row can't be easy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: My favorite is number ten. She just looked like such a nice pony.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hmm... Wonder how come we haven't seen Rainbow Dash or Rarity yet. The competition's almost over.

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: Number fifteen, let's go!

speaker: Rarity
text: Rarity... is ready!

speaker: Lucy Packard
text: Look, ladies. I don't know what to tell you. There's only time for one more performance. If you both want to compete, you'll just have to go out there together!

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, Rainbow Dash? Shall we?

speaker: Madden
text: And now, for our final competitor of the day, contestant number fifteen! Uhh... And apparently contestant number four...

speaker: Rarity
text: Good luck, Rainbow Dash. Just do your best. I hope you don't mind, but I took the liberty of changing our music. That "rock and roll" doesn't really match my wings.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gulp] C'mon, Rainbow Dash. You can do this. Just remember the routine. Phase one.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oof. Waaah!

speaker: Hoops
text: Nice work, Rainbow Crash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Time for phase two.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Look! Phase two is working.

speaker: Rarity
text: And now for my grand finale. I will fly right up to the sun and beam my beautiful wings over the whole city of Cloudsdale! [gasp and squeal] They'll be talking about it for years!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Looks like this is my last chance to turn things around. Phase three. The sonic [gulp] rainboom. Wings, don't fail me now!

speaker: Rarity
text: [panting] Look upon me, Equestria, for I... am... Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh-oh. [screams]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no! Her wings evaporated into thin air!

speaker: Misty Fly
text: Ooh!

speaker: Soarin
text: Aah!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Uuh!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hold on, Rarity! I'm coming!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I can't look!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *A sonic rainboom! She did it! She did it! Wooo!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *A sonic rainboom! Wooo! Yeah!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I did it. I did it!

speaker: Rarity
text: [sigh] You sure did. Oh thank you, Rainbow Dash. You saved my life!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh yeah. I did that too. Ha, *best day ever!*

speaker: Rarity
text: I want to apologize to all of you for getting so carried away with my... beautiful wings. I guess I just lost my head.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's okay.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, don't worry about it, kiddo.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We still love you.

speaker: Rarity
text: And I'm especially sorry that I was so thoughtless as to jump into the contest at the last minute after you had worked so hard to win it. Can you ever *ever* forgive me?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aw, it's okay. Everything turned out all right, right? I just wish I could have met the Wonderbolts when they were awake.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasp] Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!

speaker: Spitfire
text: So you're the little pony who saved our lives. We really wanted to meet you, and say thanks.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Hello, Twilight Sparkle, and hello to your friends too.

speaker: Rarity
text: Princess Celestia, I am sorry I ruined the competition. Rainbow Dash here really is the best flyer in Equestria.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I know she is, my dear. That's why, for her incredible act of bravery and her spectacular sonic rainboom, I'm presenting the grand prize for Best Young Flyer to this year's winner, Miss Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh *ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh!*

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: So Twilight Sparkle, did you learn anything about friendship from this experience?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I did Princess, but I think Rarity learned even more than me.

speaker: Rarity
text: I certainly did. *I learned how important it is to keep your hooves on the ground, and be there for your friends.*

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Excellent. Well done, Rarity.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This really is the *best day* *ever*!

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Uhh, hey, Rainbow Crash.

speaker: Hoops
text: *Dash*!

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Oh! Uhh... Sorry. Rainbow Dash. Uhh, we just wanted to congratulate you on winning the competition.

speaker: Hoops
text: That sonic rainboom was awesome!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh, thanks, guys.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Uhh, we're really sorry we gave you such a hard time before.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aww, that's okay. Don't worry about it.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: Hey. Do you want to hang out with us? Maybe you could show us how you did that incredible trick!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sorry, boys... But I've got plans!

speaker: Rarity
text: Where'd I put that? Ohh, I thought I already...

speaker: Rarity
text: Ohh, and I can't forget I've got to... oh, how am I ever gonna get this done?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Are you sure I can't help? I could—

speaker: Rarity
text: No!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Maybe just a—

speaker: Rarity
text: No thanks!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: How about—

speaker: Rarity
text: Just stand over there.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But—

speaker: Rarity
text: Where you'll be out of the way. Ribbon, ribbon! Where's the ribbon?!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I got it!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Whoa!

speaker: Rarity
text: Aah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Um, I-I'll just go and stand over there, where I'll be... out of the way.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Won't you at least let me help you clean up?

speaker: Rarity
text: No. You've helped me quite enough.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I'm sorry, sis! I just thought that if I could help, I might find my special gift and finally earn my cutie mark.

speaker: Rarity
text: I understand. It's just that... I need this time to fill this order without any... complications.

speaker: Rarity
text: Okay, all done. Now, back to work. I've lost a lot of time, and I cannot have any more interruptions.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, what now?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, sorry. I thought the "open" sign meant you were open, but I must have been mistaken.

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] Fluttershy! Forgive me! I was so wrapped up in my work that I forgot you were bringing Opalescence back from her grooming!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No worries, Rarity. I've left her there in the basket.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, she looks great! I just don't understand how you're able to do it! I can't get near her without getting a swipe from her claws.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ahh! Did you use... the *Stare* on her?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no! I wouldn't! I couldn't! I-I don't really have any control over when that happens. I-It just happens. No, I'm just good with animals. It's my special gift, you know?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, you should have a picture of Opal as a cutie mark instead of those butterflies.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Ooh, ooh, oh, oh, oh, oh! Maybe I can be good with animals, too!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Or not.

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm sorry I can't invite you to stay and chat, Fluttershy. I've bitten off a bit more than I can chew with this order.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But you're not eating anything.

speaker: Rarity
text: No, Sweetie, it's an expression. It means that I've taken on more work than I can handle. I've got twenty of these special robes to make tonight! They're due in Trottingham tomorrow morning.

speaker: Rarity
text: See? I've lined them in a special gold silk. It took *so* long to make, but I think it adds just the right touch, don't you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: These are lovely, but twenty by tonight? How will you get it all done?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, I, uh...

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, oh, oh! Maybe I could... just... just stand over here and watch.

speaker: Rarity
text: I'll manage.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, maybe I should get out of your mane so you can work.

speaker: Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Hi, Fluttershy! Hi, Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hello, uh, girls...

speaker: Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Hey, Sweetie Belle!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Scootaloo! Apple Bloom!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: You ready for tonight?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Yup! Cutie mark planning session is a go!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Tonight is the night we each try to find our own special talent.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Even if it takes us all night!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I'm ready! You ready?

text: You'll see. Thanks, Twilight. We'll give it back as soon as we're done with it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What do you think they're up to?

speaker: Spike
text: I have no idea and I don't know if I should be excited or scared to find out.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I'm glad we're doin' this as a team.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Me too. Um... so what are we doing again?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: A super awesome dramatic song for the talent show, of course.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Right! With super-cool scenery. And amazing costumes!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: And mind-blowin' dance moves.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: This is gonna be *soo* amazing!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Sweetie Belle, I think you should be a singer.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: What? No way I'm singing in front of a crowd. Twilight said to do something we like to do, and I'd like to be like my big sister, and she's a designer.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Fine then. You can do the costumes and the scenery.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: And Scootaloo, you're great in maneuvers on your scooter. So you should do the choreography. Y'know, all those dance moves.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Nah. I'd rather sing a wicked rock ballad. Why don't you come up with the dance routine, Apple Bloom?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Hm... I'm not much of a dancer... *but* I do like Kung-fu. That's kinda like dancin'. Hi-ya! Hah! Hah! Yah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Then it's settled! Let's get started.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: One... two... three... Oh! Oh!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ow, Apple Bloom! What are you doing?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh, I feel like I have four left feet. I can't even spin right.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Don't be silly. You just gotta keep your head forward until the very last minute, like this. See? Easy-peasy. You just gotta practice a bunch, that's all.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Wow! That does look easy. Thanks. Okay. Let's try this again. Oh! Ouch! Ow. I'm okay!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Keep practicing!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Will do.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: We fight the fight, walk the walk. Talk the talk, eat the... uh... food like a celery stalk? Ugh! I'll never come up with anything! Never, never, never!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Come back! Come back! Uh. Dumb fabric. Hey, Scoot! How's the song going?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Pbbbt.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Pbbbt? Oh my! Sounds serious.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: I'm just no good at lyrics. Coming up with words is, like... [pause] really hard.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text:
There is nothing that we fear
We'll have to figure out what we'll do next
'Til our cutie marks are here

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Wow! That's so awesome! Did you just come up with that now?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Yeah... kind of.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Thanks, I'm totally using that.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh no!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: One, two, three, four, *five*? [moan] [sigh]

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Ouch!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: How's the spin coming along?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I think I gotta just stick to punches and kicks. You know, ponies only have four legs.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [moan] I'll never be a designer like my sister Rarity.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Hey, it's no big deal. Why don't you use the dress form? It'll help you with your patterns and help you put all the pieces in the right places.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, is that what that's for?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Uh... maybe you should also clean your paintbrush between each color.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, I was wondering why all the colors looked like mud.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: You're not using power tools, are you?

speaker: Applejack
text: The talent show is just around the corner. I wonder how the fillies are doin'.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh! Sorry, Scootaloo.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: That's okay. Ugh!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oops! Sorry, Scootaloo. Ouch!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Oh, my bad, Sweetie Belle. Let's sing the chorus again!

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, gosh. Sure wasn't expectin' that.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I think that sounded pretty good.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Me too. You think we're ready?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ready as we'll ever be. Hey! Did you see us practicing?

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh... Yeah.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Well? How'd we do? How'd we do?

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh...

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Speechless! See, girls? I told you that's what we're gonna do. We're gonna leave them speechless.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Yay!

speaker: Applejack
text: "Speechless" is right.

speaker: Snips
text: ...And on the count of three, this rabbit will disappear, and something tasty will reappear in its place. A one, a two, and a three! Hey! Where are they? Snails, where are the... carrots. SNAILS!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Uh, how about a round of applause for the S&S magic act? Now for our next act, we have Sunny Daze and Peachy Pie reciting their favorite poem... on roller skates!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Break a leg!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Sweetie Belle! What a thing to say!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: No, no, no. You see, in the theater it's considered bad luck to say "good luck". So you say "break a leg" instead.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My little ponies! How are you doing?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Nervous...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't worry. You're gonna be amazing. Remember, just stick to what you know best. I can't wait to hear you sing, Sweetie Belle.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Why does everypony always think *I'm* gonna sing?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Actually, Twilight Sparkle, *I'm* the main singer tonight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: And I'm the main dancer. Hi-ya!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: And I'm in charge of...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Costumes?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: And sets and props. How'd you know?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Really, girls? Are you sure...?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Cutie Mark Crusaders, you're on next. Break a leg.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Break a le—

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Ugh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh... good luck!

Look, here, are three little ponies,
Ready to sing for this crowd,
Listen up, 'cause here's our story
I'm gonna sing it

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Very loud!

text:
When you're a younger pony
And your flank is very bare
Feels like the sun will never come
When your cutie mark's not there

text:
So the three of us will fight the fight
There is nothing that we fear
We'll have to figure out what we'll do next

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: 'Til our cutie marks are here!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text:
We are the Cutie Mark Crusaders
On a quest to find out who we are
And we will never stop the journey
Not until we have our cutie marks

speaker: Scootaloo
text:
They all say that you'll get your mark
When the time is really right
And you know just what you're supposed to do
And your talent comes to light

speaker: Scootaloo
text:
But it's not as easy as it sounds
And that waiting's hard to do
So we test our talents everywhere

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Until our face is blue

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text:
We are the Cutie Mark Crusaders
On a quest to find out who we are
And we will never stop the journey
Not until we have our cutie marks

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text:
We are the Cutie Mark Crusaders
On a quest to find out who we are
And we will never stop the journey
Not until we have our cutie marks!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Wow. That did *not* go as well as I expected.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I can't believe they're laughin' at us.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Was it that bad?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Back on stage, girls. It's time for the awards.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Back on stage? No.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: They'll just laugh some more.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah, what's the point?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Now girls, let's be good sports. You made a great effort. You should be proud. Now come on!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Let's hear it for all our talented fillies and colts.

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Our first award goes to... Snips and Snails for best magic act.

speaker: Snips
text: Hey! Mine's at least shinier.

speaker: Snails
text: Well, mine's bigger.

speaker: Snips
text: Oh yeah, well... Well, mine is, um... heavier?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: The next award goes to... Sunny Daze and Peachy Pie for best dramatic performance.

speaker: Cheerilee
text: And finally, the last award of the night goes to... the Cutie Mark Crusaders!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: What?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: For best comedy act.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Can you believe it? We won!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: I knew our act was awesome.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You know what would be the best? If we won *and* we got our cutie marks.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Congratulations, ponies! Job well done.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: [sadly] Thanks, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey, you don't sound too excited.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [sigh] We worked really hard and won a prize, but we still don't have our cutie marks.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Which is the prize we *really* wanted.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, girls...

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: But we think we know why.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Yes. We know why.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh? Tell me. I'd love to make a special report to the Princess.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well, maybe we were trying too hard.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes? *And*?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: And *instead of forcing ourselves to do something that's not meant for us...*

text: Yes? Yes?

speaker: Apple Bloom

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And that is...?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom! You did it!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Did you see our award? Weren't we funny?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: One day... [giggle] One day...

speaker: Rarity
text: Perfect!

speaker: Rarity
text: Coming! Welcome to Carousel Boutique, where every garment is chic, unique, and magnifique. [gasp] Sapphire Shores! The pony of pop!

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: Good afternoon, Miss Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: You yah... Y-y-you know my name?

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: Well, of course I do, darling. I make it a point to know all of the up-and-coming designers and *Clothes Horse* magazine simply raved about *you*.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh my stars. If I'm dreaming, do not wake me up. How may I help you, Miss Shores?

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: Oh please, call me Sapphire.

speaker: Rarity
text: [giggle] How may I help you, Sapphire?

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: Well, as I'm sure you know, I'll be touring all of Equestria with my latest concert, *Sapphire Shores' Ziegfilly Follies*, so I need to look *seeensational*! *Ow*!

speaker: Rarity
text: I have just what you need. Sapphire Shores, prepare yourself for the pièce de résistance de la haute couture. I used every last diamond I found on this one garment.

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: [gasp] And it is spectacular! I'll take it.

speaker: Rarity
text: Really?

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: Oh yes, and five more, each done up in a different jewel.

speaker: Rarity
text: Beg pardon?

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: Costume changes.

speaker: Sapphire Shores
text: [chuckle] Yes, I do have that effect on ponies.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh my gosh! Sapphire Shores! The pony of pop! She is awesome! I mean, she's gorgeous and talented and — heh... and not even half the pony you are. I mean, you're ten times more gorgeous and talented and—

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike, a lady is never jealous.

speaker: Spike
text: Eh, of course not. But were you totally flipping out or what?!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ladies do not "flip out", Spike. However, I was quite in awe. Oh, I need to find more jewels than ever before to decorate her costumes. Oh, aha!

speaker: Spike
text: Did you find some?

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes, Spike! Right there!

speaker: Spike
text: Ooooo! You look so delicious...

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike! I promised I'd give you gems to snack on, but we need to collect more first or I'll never be able to make these outfits for Sapphire.

speaker: Spike
text: Hm... I will miss you, my sweets.

speaker: Rarity
text: Come along, Spike. We have many jewels to find.

speaker: Spike
text: At your service, milady.

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike!

speaker: Rarity
text: You've been very patient today, Spike. And for that you get the finest reward. This is from me to you.

speaker: Rarity
text: Is something wrong, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: No. It's *perfect*.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooo, bring the cart, Spike. There are more over here.

speaker: Spike
text: For me. From Rarity.

speaker: Rover
text: Yesss, gemsss. Gemsss!

speaker: Fido
text: Where?

speaker: Rover
text: Preciousss gemsss! He is the gem hunter. With him we can have all those gems... and more! Let's get the dragon.

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike! Where are you?

speaker: Rover
text: Wait! Who is that?

speaker: Rarity
text: You know, it's terrible to keep a lady waiting.

speaker: Spike
text: Coming!

speaker: Rarity
text: I think we're really going to strike gold this time. So to speak. [laugh]

speaker: Spike
text: Jackpot!

speaker: Rover
text: Oh, it's not the dragon we want. It's the pony!

speaker: Diamond Dogs
text: The pony...

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, Spike, I think that's all we can do for today. And these will certainly get me well on my way with Sapphire's outfits. Why don't we start headi... Oh! What's this? Another jewel. Oh.. Oh, strange. It's in the trees. Oooo... Ewww! Uh... uh... Good day, gentle... uh, fellow. Uh, I am Rarity and this is my friend Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: Ehe...

speaker: Rarity
text: And you are...

speaker: Rover
text: A Diamond Dog.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh really? Oh well, that explains your fine taste in jewelry. I mean I-I-I know that diamonds are a girl's best friend and now I know that they're a dog's best friend too, ha ha ha. So, um, [cough] you're out hunting for gems as well?

speaker: Rover
text: Yes. We hunt.

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh... we?

speaker: Rover
text: We hunt for gems. But you are a better hunter. So now we hunt... for you!

speaker: Spot
text: Yaaaaah!

speaker: Spike
text: [grunt] Run, Rarity! Run! Aaaah! Uh!

speaker: Fido
text: Ooooooh!

speaker: Spot
text: Yaaaaah!

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike! Come on! Hurry!

speaker: Rover
text: Gotcha!

speaker: Rarity
text: Waah! *Spike*!

speaker: Spike
text: Got him, Rarity! I got him!

speaker: Fido
text: Haha! Nope!

speaker: Spot
text: Sorry, scaly one.

speaker: Spike
text: Wait! Rarity?

speaker: Rarity
text: Unhand me this instant, you ruffians. Stop! Put me down, you thugs! You brutes!

speaker: Spike
text: [gasp] Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike! Ah, dirt! *Aaaaah, Spiiiike*!

speaker: Spike
text: Which, what, where?

speaker: Rarity
text: *Save me*...!

speaker: Spike
text: *Nooooooooooo*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, can you breathe now?

speaker: Spike
text: Yes... [pant] I think so.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Good. Now tell us what you know.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah. 'Cause all you said earlier was...

speaker: Spike
text: [pant] Aaaah! Rarity... woods... jewels... dogs... hole... taken... *Save her*!

speaker: Applejack
text: Not a whole lot to go on there, sport.

speaker: Spike
text: Sorry. Rarity and I were in the woods looking for jewels when these creepy guys showed up.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Creepy guys?

speaker: Spike
text: They called themselves the Diamond Dogs. They grabbed Rarity and disappeared down a hole in the ground.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, this sounds mighty easy. Just take us to that there hole and we'll save Rarity.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Holy moly, that's a lotta holeys.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come on, girls! Let's get started.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hello?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Puh!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yuck! Ugh!

speaker: Spike
text: Puh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Quick! We gotta get down one before they're all filled up.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh! Oh my. Oh, oh!

speaker: Applejack
text: We can't muscle through it!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We'll see about that. [gasp]

speaker: Applejack
text: Whew. Heavens to Betsy. Now I'm used to pickin' myself up and dustin' myself off, but Rarity won't even *touch* mud 'less it's imported.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Rarity...

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, woe is me! Whatever shall I do? Ah! Dirt, dirt! Get away, dirt! Oh! Make it stop, make it stop! Ah! Filthy, disgusting dirt. It stings, it burns. Help! Oh, somepony save me, *save me*!

speaker: Applejack
text: We gotta save her.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But they blocked up all the holes.

speaker: Applejack
text: Don't mean we can't dig 'em out. Come on!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ow!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oof!

speaker: Spike
text: [panting] Whoa! Oof!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Get 'em!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whoooaaa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Come on!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: All those scary monsters popping up everywhere. Oh, poor Rarity must be terrified.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [worryingly] Ooh.

speaker: Spot
text: Give me the baubles!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ah!

speaker: Fido
text: Give me the beads!

speaker: Rarity
text: Aah!

speaker: Rover
text: Where are the trinkets?!

speaker: Rarity
text: Aaaah!

speaker: Diamond Dogs
text: Where is the treasure?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Poor Rarity. What are we gonna do?

speaker: Spike
text: I got it! I'll save you, my sweet.

speaker: All
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, it is very noble of you...

speaker: Spike
text: Shhh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [quieter] ...to sacrifice the gem Rarity gave you.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, Lady Rarity. My damsel in distress.

speaker: Sir Spike
text: I shall save you. Show yourselves, you dogs! You curs! Ah. There you are, you mangy mutts.

speaker: Rover
text: Who are you calling mutts? Unleash the hounds! [blows dog whistle]

speaker: Sir Spike
text: Now, where is Lady Rarity?

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] Spike! I knew you would save me!

speaker: Sir Spike
text: Nothing could stop me, milady.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ohohohoh, Spike. You are my... hero. [smooch]

speaker: Sir Spike
text: Mmmmmm...

speaker: Applejack
text: Hoho there, lover boy.

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa! Whoa whoa whoawhoawhoa... I got a bite! I got a bite!

speaker: Applejack
text: Hold on there, little fella.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Twilight!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh my goodness, oh my goodness...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait for me!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whee!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whee! Ha, ha, ha!

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, oh!

speaker: Spike
text: Ha ha, it worked! We're in! Now we can finally save Rarity!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um... Which way do we go?

speaker: Spike
text: *Nooooooooooo*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All these tunnels... How are we ever gonna find Rarity?

speaker: Applejack
text: Guess we're just gonna have to start going down them one by one.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That could take forever! There's gotta be way to narrow it down.

speaker: Spike
text: I know! I bet they've taken Rarity down the tunnel with the most gems.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But Spike, Rarity is the only one who knows how to find gems.

speaker: Spike
text: No, Twilight. You can! You can copy Rarity's gem-finding spell.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh my gosh! You're right! Rarity showed me how she did it a while back. If I can just remember...

speaker: Spike
text: That's it. You did it, Twilight! Come on! We're coming, Rarity. We'll save you. Just hold on.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh please, Diamond Dogs. Please let me go.

speaker: Spot
text: No!

speaker: Fido
text: You're our precious little pony.

speaker: Rover
text: Forever! Muhahahaha!

speaker: Rarity
text: But whatever do you want from me?

speaker: Rover
text: Gemsss!

speaker: Spot
text: Yes! The gems. The jewels.

speaker: Fido
text: Find them! Find them all!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Is that all?

speaker: Rarity
text: There. A lovely pocket of jewels are right there. Now, if you'd be so kind as to show me the exit?

speaker: Rover
text: Good! [laugh] Now, dig them up, pony.

speaker: Rarity
text: What? But you said you wanted me to *find* the gems.

speaker: Spot
text: Yes! Find and then dig.

speaker: Rarity
text: Dig?

speaker: Fido
text: Yes. Dig.

speaker: Rarity
text: *Ohh...* [grunting]

speaker: Fido
text: What are you doing? We said dig!

speaker: Rarity
text: Forgive me, but prior to you so rudely dragging me into your dirt pit, I had a pony-pedi and I am not about to chip a hoof because you dislike my style of digging. [grunting]

speaker: Rover
text: Oh, for goodness— Fine! Just stop. Stop! Dig, dogs! Dig! And fast.

speaker: Fido
text: She won't dig, she pulls.

speaker: Rarity
text: I beg your pardon, but what, pray tell, are you doing?

speaker: Fido
text: Others will dig. You will haul the wagon.

speaker: Spot
text: Prrrecious pony-pedi will be preserved.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, somebody certainly needs proper nail care. When was the last time you two had a manicure? You're scratching up my coat with those jagged things!

speaker: Rover
text: Please be quiet!

speaker: Rarity
text: Good heavens, what *is* that smell?

speaker: Rover
text: *Smeeeeeell*?

speaker: Rarity
text: Ah, mystery solved. It's your breath.

speaker: Rover
text: Enough! Search, pony!

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, since you insist... But I must say the working conditions in here are simply dreadful. Musty and damp, it's going to wreak havoc on my mane. And this air is stifling, suffocating. And when I try to take a deep breath, the stench of all you dogs makes me nauseated.

speaker: Rarity
text: You look and smell like you haven't bathed in weeks. Have you never heard of soap? You could all do with a good round of soap and water. Oh water, oh water, I'm terribly thirsty. Could I please have some water?

speaker: Spot
text: Good gracious, I can't take this anymore. *Be quiet, pony*!

speaker: Rarity
text: And that's another thing. I would appreciate if you stopped calling me "pony". I am a *lady* and I wish to be addressed as such. So you may call me "Miss" or "Rarity" or "Miss Rarity".

speaker: Rover
text: Enough! Your whining! It-it-it hurts!

speaker: Rarity
text: Whining? I am *not* whining. I am complaining. Do you want to hear whining? *Thiiis iiis whiiining*! Oooh, this harness is too *tiiight*! It's going to *chafe*. Can't you *loosen* it? Oooh, it hurts and it's *sooo ruuusty*! Why didn't you clean it first? It's gonna leave a *staaain*! And the wagon's getting *heeeavy*, why do I *have to pull it*?!

speaker: Spot
text: Aaah! Make it stop!

speaker: Rover
text: Stop whining!

speaker: Rarity
text: *But I thought you wanted whiiining*!

speaker: Rover
text: Geh! We'll do anything, pony!

speaker: Rover
text: Oh, uh, uh, we'll do anything, "Miss Rarity". [nervous laughter]

speaker: Rarity
text: [dreamily] Anything?

speaker: Rarity
text: [sigh] This water is hardly sparkling. But I suppose it will have to do.

speaker: Rover
text: [panting] Wait! Why are *we* doing this?

speaker: Spot
text: To stop the awful noises from the pony's mouth, remember? [whines]

speaker: Rover
text: Yes, yes, I know. This is ridiculous! Letting a pony order *us* around. What are we? Mice or dogs?

speaker: Spot
Fido
text: Mi... dogs?

speaker: Rover
text: Dogs do not pull. Ponies pull. Let her make the awful noises.

speaker: Rarity
text: What are you doing? Hey, you spilled my drink. Oh! [whining] *Not sooo tiiight*!

speaker: Rover
text: Ha! Make the noises all you want. But move while you make them. Hyah, mule!

speaker: Rarity
text: Did you just call me a... *mule*?

speaker: Rover
text: Ehh...

speaker: Rarity
text: Mules are ugly. Are you saying that I too am ugly? [cries]

speaker: Spot
text: What are *these* noises?

speaker: Rarity
text: *He called me ugly*!

speaker: Rover
text: No! Mule! I said mule!

speaker: Rarity
text: An old ugly mule! And it's true! Just look at me. I used to be beautiful, but, but nooow...

speaker: Fido
text: No, no! You're still beautiful, po... uh, Miss Rarity.

speaker: Rarity
text: You're just saying that!

speaker: Spot
text: No, you're still pretty and... and...

speaker: Rover
text: Oh, uh, uh, nice. Yeah.

speaker: Rarity
text: I don't believe you! You never liked me! [wails]

speaker: Rover
text: Oh, I've had just about enough of this!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We're getting close. I can feel it.

speaker: Spike
text: It's coming from down here. Come on!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: She must be in there. Let's go!

speaker: Mook dogs
text: More workhorses.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hoh, doggies. If you can take this bull by the horns, you better be ready for a ride. Come on, ponies! Kick 'em up, kick 'em out. Buck 'em up, buck 'em down.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeehaw! Get along, little doggies!

speaker: Spike
text: I'm coming for you, milady. Hi-ho, Twilight! Away!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And just *what* do you think you're doing?

speaker: Spike
text: Please, Twilight. Just give me this.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Eh... fine. [neighs]

speaker: Spike
text: Lady Rarity, I'm here to save you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Excuse me?

speaker: Spot
text: So picky.

speaker: Fido
text: And critical.

speaker: Spot
text: She won't stop talking.

speaker: Fido
text: And crying.

speaker: Rover
text: We, uh, give her back. Yes.

speaker: Spike
text: Rarity! You're safe!

speaker: Rarity
text: Why, yes. Hello, girls. You arrived just in time to assist me.

speaker: Applejack
text: Assist you with what?

speaker: Rarity
text: With those.

speaker: Spike
text: You're letting her leave with all these... jewels?

speaker: Rover
text: Yes. Take them. And her with them.

speaker: Spot
text: Please!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I can't believe you found all these gems!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. I can't believe you tricked all those dogs.

speaker: Rarity
text: Just because I'm a lady doesn't mean I cannot handle myself in a sticky situation. I had them wrapped around my hoof the entire time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can't wait to write to Princess Celestia to tell her what you taught me today.

speaker: Rarity
text: Me? What did I teach you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Just because somepony is ladylike doesn't make her weak. In fact, by using her wits, a seemingly defenseless pony can be the one who outsmarts and outshines them all.*

speaker: Spike
text: Hm... "Outshines" is right. Now you have enough gems to cover Sapphire Shores' costumes.

speaker: Rarity
text: Not if you eat them all, Spike.

speaker: Rarity
text: So sorry, Fluttershy. I hate being late for our weekly get-together. The usual!

speaker: Rarity
text: But you will not *believe* what happened to me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Is everything all right?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, it's much more than all right. I was on my way here, wearing my latest hat creation, when who should stop me on the street but Photo Finish!?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Photo Finish?

speaker: Rarity
text: She is the most famous fashion photographer in all of Equestria. Anywho, she saw my hat and said it was absolutely marvelous!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What a lovely compliment.

speaker: Rarity
text: She was so impressed that she wants to take some pictures of my shop featuring some of my clothes!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [squee] That's wonderful.

speaker: Rarity
text: [vibrating] Do you know what this could mean for my fashion career?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, Rarity, I'm so happy for you.

speaker: Rarity
text: But I'm going to need somepony fabulous to model for me. Somepony with beauty. Somepony with grace. Somepony... like you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, goodness. I don't know.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, this is such a huge opportunity. And it would mean so much to me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm flattered, really.

speaker: Rarity
text: Nopony is going to have your elegance and poise.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But...

speaker: Rarity
text: Nopony!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: There has to be somepony more quali...

speaker: Rarity
text: Please!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Somepony more into fashion.

speaker: Rarity
text: Please!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Somepony more comfortable in the spotlight.

speaker: Rarity
text: Please, please, *pleeease*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, if it's that important to you, of course I'll do it.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, thankyouthankyouthankyouthankyou! You are the best friend a pony could ever have!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sigh] What a wonderful way to spend an afternoon.

speaker: Rarity
text: Isn't it? Though I was so afraid you wouldn't agree to model for me that I felt completely frazzled. I think I feel a pimple coming on. Oh! Only one solution!

speaker: Rarity
text: The usual!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hm... She's going to want to see attitude and pizzazz.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: A-a-attitude and, um... pizzazz.

speaker: Rarity
text: More light! It has to catch the sequins just so or the whole outfit is just a disaster. Oh, and the headdress needs more feathers. Pinkie Pie! More feathers! And sequins! More sequins!

speaker: Rarity
text: And more ribbon! Oh no! Less ribbon. No! More ribbon.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, this hem is completely off. Pincushion! Thank you all for helping me. I'm sorry to be so short with you, but I'm... I'm just so nervous.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, doesn't that hurt?

speaker: Spike
text: Thick scales. Can't feel a thing. And even if I could, there is no pain that would keep me from assisting the most beautiful creature in the world. I'm gonna tell you two a secret. But you have to promise not to tell anyone.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I promise.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye.

speaker: Spike
text: I have a crush on Rarity!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] We won't say a word!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Give me a break. Everypony already knows how you...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight! You promised Spike you wouldn't say anything. He trusts you. And losing a friend's trust is the fastest way to lose a friend forever!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Forever*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My lips are sealed. Though I'm pretty sure Rarity is gonna pick up on your feelings.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: I, Photo Finish... have arrived.

speaker: Rarity
text: Let me just say, what an honor!

speaker: Photo Finish
text: We begin... now!

speaker: Rarity
text: Attitude and pizzazz!

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Yes! Show Photo Finish something. No! Yeees. No! Yeees. No! Yeees. Enough!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She hardly took any pictures.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm so sorry. I tried my best.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, the headdress is too big for you and cape had too much sparkle. I can't believe I ever thought *I* could impress *her*.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: It seems that I, Photo Finish, have found the next fashion star here in Ponyville.

speaker: Rarity
text: Really?

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Yes. Really. And I, Photo Finish, am going to help her to *shine* all over Eqvestria. Tomorrow, a photo shoot in ze park. [pause] I go!

speaker: Rarity
text: Did you hear that? I am going to "shine all over Equestria".

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, Rarity. I was so worried I'd ruined everything.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, never. I knew you'd be perfect. [excited giggling]

speaker: Rarity
text: No, no, no, yes! That is definitely the one. Photo Finish is going to love it. Everypony is going to love it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I am so excited for you. Just don't forget us little ponies when you become the most famous designer in all of Equestria.

speaker: Rarity
text: Never.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Put me down here. Oh, nonononononono. The model should be in something simple! Something inspired by... the nature!

speaker: Rarity
text: That's just what I was thinking. Um... give me a moment and I'll, uh, put a little something together.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Yes... that will not be necessary.

speaker: Rarity
text: But... but... how are you going to help me "shine across Equestria" if I don't design something new for these pictures?

speaker: Photo Finish
text: I am not going to help *you* shine across Equestria. I am going to help *her* shine. She is my star. You! Go!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I can't, Rarity.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, but you must, Fluttershy. Photo Finish wants to make you a star. This is the opportunity of a lifetime. I know we were both hoping it would be my lifetime, but nonetheless you can't throw away this chance. You must do this for me. You must. You must! *You must*!

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Floottershy! It is time to make... the magics! Oh, wunderbar! You are like a delicate flower. So much more alluring without all those sparkles und feathers.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: How'd it go? How'd it go?

speaker: Rarity
text: It didn't. Photo Finish wanted to work with Fluttershy, not me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Rarity. I'm so sorry. Is there anything we can do?

speaker: Rarity
text: I just vant to be alone right now.

speaker: Spike
text: You heard her. She vants to be... alone. What? I didn't think she meant *alone* alone.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Too much blush. Not enough. Too much. Not enough. Perfect.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ah... Aaah... [tiny sneeze]

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Oh, yes! Even her schneezes are graceful. Now go! How do you feel? Excited? Overjoyed? Thrilled beyond your wildest dreams?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: N... nervous.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Nervous? Dun be ridiculous. You're only facing a large crowd of ponies who will be watching your every move and silently judging you.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Your cue! Now go!

speaker: Background voice
text: No seriously...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You can't let Rarity down. You must do this. You must. You must. You must.

speaker: Lyrica Lilac
text: So graceful.

speaker: Royal Ribbon
text: So lovely.

speaker: Hoity Toity
text: So perfect for my new advertisement.

speaker: Shoeshine
text: It's Fluttershy!

speaker: Rarity
text: Wow. Look how popular you are. I'm so excited for you. You must be having the best time ever.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, yes. Best time ever...

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Floottershy! I have been looking for you everywhere. We have the thing at the place.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'll see you at the spa? Our usual time?

speaker: Rarity
text: Of course! I can't wait to hear all about the... "thing at the place".

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm the one who should be mobbed by strangers wherever I go.

speaker: Rarity
text: Welcome to Carousel Boutique!

speaker: Bon Bon
text: Is she still here? We heard Fluttershy was here.

speaker: Rarity
text: Sorry. You just missed her. But you're still in luck. I'm having a huge sale on some of my best designs.

speaker: Bon Bon
text: And you are...?

speaker: Rarity
text: Rarity, of course.

speaker: Bon Bon
text: Never heard of you.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Obviously I, Photo Finish, am thwilled to have found her.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Photo Finish?

speaker: Photo Finish
text: She's a natural in front of the camera.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um... Photo Finish?

speaker: Photo Finish
text: I only need to point and shoot, and I capture... the magics!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Photo Finish, I'm so sorry to interrupt. It's just that I'm running late.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: [gasp] How could I have forgotten?! Your appearance at the ballet opening! Everypony who is anypony will be there.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, actually I'm supposed to be meeting my friend...

speaker: Photo Finish
text: We go!

speaker: Rarity
text: My hooves are getting positively pruney, I've been waiting here so long. Obviously Fluttershy's just too busy with her new *career* to spend time with her best friend.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sure she just got tied up.

speaker: Rarity
text: Of course she did. She's a big bright shining star! I wish that star would burn out.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity! Fluttershy is your friend.

speaker: Rarity
text: I know, I know. And I should be happy for her, but instead I'm just... jealous! Oh, please promise you won't tell her I feel this way. Please, please, pleaseplease*please*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You have my word. Losing a friend's trust is the fastest way to lose a friend.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Forever!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow! You look great!

speaker: Rarity
text: Fluttershy may be the one who's famous, but that doesn't mean I have to stop looking fabulous.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Rarity! I'm so sorry I'm... Oh no. She's already gone, isn't she?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sorry.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I can't believe this. I am so frustrated, I could just scream. [inhales] [squeak]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Feel better?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No. Can I tell you something?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You promise not to tell Rarity?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I swear.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Pinkie Pie Swear?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my [poke] Ooowwwww!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't like being a model. No, I *hate* being a model. All this attention is awful, just awful. And I'm only doing it because Rarity told me I must. I must! *I must*! [sigh] I must...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, really? Well... If you wanna know the truth, Rarity...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, what were you about to say?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [quietly] Forever!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nothing!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I was just thinking. If you really don't like being a model, you could always quit.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no. I could never do such a thing. Rarity would be devastated.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But Rarity told me... [gasp]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [chomp] Mmm... Juicy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uhhhhhh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, if only all these ponies didn't like me so much. Photo Finish wouldn't want me to model anymore. She'd find somepony else with... the magic!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I guess you're right. [pause] You're right. You're right, you're right, you're right!

speaker: Gala Appleby
text: It's Fluttershy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't you see? On her own, Fluttershy could never do something unattractive. But if I used my magic to help her do something unattractive at her next fashion show, no one will ever want her to model again. And if Fluttershy no longer has to be a model, Rarity will no longer have to be jealous of her. And I'll no longer have to keep their secrets! It's the perfect plan! You can't tell anyone about it. Promise me you won't tell anyone?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So you do promise or you don't?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Uh, yes! Obviously, that's why I zipped my mouth closed, then locked it with a key, then dug a hole, then buried the key, then built a house on top of the hole where I buried the key, then moved into the house on top of the hole. [squee]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Obviously.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You really think it'll work?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They love you for being you. So all I have to do is make you *not* be you. Just leave it to me.

speaker: Rarity
text: Guess it's time to see what all the fuss is about.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oof!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] Ooh... Aah!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh no.

speaker: Golden Harvest
text: Get her off the stage!

speaker: Lemon Hearts
text: She's an embarrassment to all things fashion!

speaker: Photo Finish
text: I, Photo Finish, have made a terrible mistake!

speaker: Rarity
text: Bravo! I say bravo!

speaker: Lyrica Lilac
text: Bravo? Who could possibly say bravo to that horrid display?

speaker: Rarity
text: Such attitude! Such pizzazz! She's invented an entirely new kind of modeling! Bravo!

speaker: Lyrica Lilac
text: Who is saying these things?

speaker: Royal Ribbon
text: It's her. The unicorn in the gorgeous cape and headdress.

speaker: Lyrica Lilac
text: Now *that* is a pony who clearly knows a thing or two about fashion. Well, if that fabulous pony likes it, then I do too! Bravo!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: This is awful. Just awful! Somehow I've become more popular than ever. Oh, I'm so frustrated I could just kick something!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: If only Rarity didn't want me to be a model so badly.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh! But Rarity...!

speaker: Rarity
text: Fluttershy! Are you all right?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm great! I'm a super famous fashion model. Why wouldn't I be great?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Because you ha...!

speaker: Rarity
text: Out there on the runway, everyone was turning on you and... Oh... Oh, Fluttershy. It's so awful. I wanted them to.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You did?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course she did! Because...!

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm jealous! I wanted all the attention. And instead it was going to you. I even started hoping that you would do something silly so your modeling career would be over. But then, when it started happening, all I could think was how could I want you to fail at something you love so much?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But... Fluttershy doesn't... Ugh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Love? Oh, Rarity. I *hate* being a model.

speaker: Rarity
text: You do?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: More than anything.

speaker: Rarity
text: Then why did you keep doing it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I was afraid if I quit, you'd be mad at me for not wanting to... "shine all over Equestria".

speaker: Rarity
text: And I thought if I told you how jealous I was of your success, you'd think I was a terrible friend.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Never!

speaker: Rarity
text: All this time!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: If we'd just told each other the truth.

speaker: Rarity
text: I promise never to keep my feelings in secret again.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Me too.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rarity
text: Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye. [laughs]

speaker: Photo Finish
text: You were brilliant. Brilliant! I've already got six photo shoots lined up for tomorrow alone.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sorry, Photo Finish, but I don't think I'll be able to make any of them.

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Whaaat?

speaker: Fluttershy
Rarity
text: We go!

speaker: Photo Finish
text: Vat has just happened?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike has a crush on Rarity!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sigh] And you were doing so well.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now this is a wonderful way to spend an afternoon.

speaker: Rarity
text: Isn't it, though?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Being a good friend means being able to keep a secret. But you should never be afraid to share your true feelings with a good friend.* Did you get all that, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: No. I did not. I still can't believe you told someone about my secret feelings for Rarity.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're right. That was wrong of me, and I'm very sorry.

speaker: Spike
text: Apology accepted.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now will you take down my letter to Princess Celestia?

speaker: Spike
text: I would love to. But... I'm a little busy at the moment.

speaker: Applejack
text: *And that's when the yellow birdie thought to himself, "Hmm. My favorite little tree isn't such a little tree anymore." So she sang her song, big and strong, and they all lived in that great, big tree happily ever after. The... end.*

speaker: Rarity
text: Applejack! Were you reading a bedtime story to... an apple tree?

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh... uh... Well, ya know, bein' replanted in a whole new place is very upsettin' for a tree... and Bloomberg here is one of my favorites.

speaker: Rarity
text: No fair, Applejack! You've got a luxurious, private sleeper car for a *tree*, while I am crowded and cramped in the same car with all the other ponies. How am I supposed to get my beauty sleep?!

speaker: Applejack
text: But Bloomberg's the whole reason we're makin' this trip. He needs his rest so we can give him as a gift to my relatives in Appleloosa.

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmph! You talk about it as if it's your baby or something.

speaker: Applejack
text: Who you callin' a baby?! Bloomberg's no baby! Don't wet widdle Rarity make you all saddy-waddy. Bloomberg's a big and strong apple tree. Yes, he is. A-coochie-coochie-coo-coo-coo!

speaker: Rarity
text: It's widdle Rarity who's all "saddy-waddy"! Urgh!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh man, we're going fast! This is so exciting, I can't even wait!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh my goodness...

speaker: Rarity
text: [sigh] For crying out loud in the morning!

speaker: Spike
text: [groan] Do you guys mind? I was up early fire-roasting those snacks you're all eating, and I'm pooped!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, speaking of, some of these popcorn kernels didn't get popped.

speaker: Spike
text: Okay, fine...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ghk...

speaker: Spike
text: Good night!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uhh... maybe it's time we all got a little shut-eye. We've got a big day ahead of us tomorrow.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
text: Awwww!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering] Psst! Pinkie Pie, you asleep yet?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [whispering] No, are you asleep yet?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering] If I was sleeping, how could I have asked you if you were asleep?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [whispering] Oh yeah! [giggle]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering] When we get to Appleloosa, you think we'll have to carry that heavy tree all the way from the train to the orchard?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [whispering] What tree? You mean Bloomberg?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering and sarcastically] ...No, Fluttershy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [whispering] Fluttershy's not a tree, silly!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's going on?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow Dash thinks Fluttershy's a tree!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering] I do *not* think she's a tree! I was just–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Did you *say* she was a tree?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering] No. Well.. Yes. But not exactly–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ya know she's not a tree, right?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She's not a tree, Dashie!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'd like to be a tree...

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, for Pete's sake!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well that was kind of huffy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Huffy the magic dragon!

speaker: Rarity
text: Would you all be quiet... *now?!*

speaker: All except Rarity
text: Aaaaaah! [blows out candle]

speaker: Spike
text: Bloomberg...? Bloomberg? Sorry, but I tend to snore a bit. Good night. [sigh]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A buffalo stampede!

speaker: Rarity
text: I just *love* their accessories!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They're getting awfully close to the train.

speaker: Rarity
text: I want to speak to the manager!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oooh, looky! Now they're doing tricks! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Now do a backflip!... Or... Just jump?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hmm.. Something tells me this isn't a circus act. Hey there!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Where ya headed in such a hurry? Wow, you're pretty quick for someone so... bulky. No offense.

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: Huh..?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I just wanna know– Hey! I'm talking to you– Whoa... Arrgggg... I got you now, you– [groan]

speaker: Applejack
text: [gasp] They've got Bloomberg!

speaker: Spike
text: Heeeelp!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And Spike!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugggh..

speaker: Spike
text: [distant] Heeeelp!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Dragon-napping Spike. I'll show her! Ow...

speaker: Braeburn
text: Hey there! Welcome ta A-A-ppleloosa!

speaker: Applejack
text: Braeburn, listen–

speaker: Braeburn
text: Cousin Applejack, mind yer manners, you have yet ta introduce me to your compadres! Shame on you!

speaker: Applejack
text: Braeburn, listen, somethin' terrible's happened–

speaker: Braeburn
text: Terrible is right, your train is a full seven minutes late! That's seven minutes less for you to delight in the pleasures and wonders of... A-A-A-ppleloosa! Boggles the mind, we settler ponies built all this in just the past year, don't it?! And as you can see, we have all of the finest comforts. Like horse-drawn carriages!

speaker: Black Stone
text: Okay, you pull now.

speaker: Noteworthy
text: Aww, we just switched.

speaker: Braeburn
text: And those there are horse-drawn, horse-drawn carriages.

speaker: Applejack
text: ...Listen, Braeburn, I– Oof!

speaker: Braeburn
text: And here's our local waterin' hole, the Salt Block.

speaker: Morton Saltworthy
text: That's enough salt for you!

speaker: Ol Salt
text: Can't I at least... get a glass of water?

speaker: Braeburn
text: Over there's the office of Sheriff Silverstar. And here's where we have our wild west dances! And here's where we have our *mild* west dances!

speaker: Applejack
text: But, Braeburn, we–

speaker: Braeburn
text: And here's the most wonderful sight in all of... A-A-A-ppleloosa! Our apple orchard.

speaker: Applejack
text: Braeburn!

speaker: Braeburn
text: First harvest should be any day now.

speaker: Applejack
text: Braebu–

speaker: Braeburn
text: Good thing too!

speaker: Applejack
text: Brae–

speaker: Braeburn
text: 'Cause we need that grub to live on.

speaker: Applejack
text: Braeburn!

speaker: Braeburn
text: Uh, yes, cuz?

speaker: Applejack
text: You have a very nice town an' all, but but we have a *hu-uge* problem! Some of our friends are missin'!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: A stampede of buffalo.

speaker: Rarity
text: They took Spike!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash went after them!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And we can't find Pinkie Pie.

speaker: Applejack
text: And we had an apple tree with us for your orchard, but they took that too!

speaker: Braeburn
text: Did you say... buffalo? [sigh] Them buffalo, they want us settler ponies to take every single tree you see here off this land. They sure as hay don't want any new ones added in.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But why?

speaker: Braeburn
text: Beats me. We put a lot of hard work into this land, so we can feed our town, our families, our foals! And now they're sayin' all these trees have to go? T'ain't fair...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ooh, I can't *wait* to get my hooves on that little buffalo... Hnnh... Ow! Nobody tricks Rainbow Dash and gets away with it.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Boo!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yah! ...Pinkie Pie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ah, ya caught me! Looks like I tricked you and didn't get away with it either! You're good.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Shhshh! What do you think you're doing?! You gotta get out of here!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I do?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You're gonna blow my cover.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I am?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm trying to save Spike!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh my gosh! So am I!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And the more of us there are out here, the more chances of us getting... caught. Run, Pinkie, I'll hold 'em off. Save yourself!

speaker: Spike
text: Stop! Dash, Pinkie, 'sup? Hey, no worries, I know those guys. They're cool.

speaker: Buffalo
text: If you say so, Spike. Catch ya later, bro.

speaker: Spike
text: Seems they took *me* by mistake. And they feel awful about it too, poor guys. Fortunately, they totally respect dragons, so they treat me like an honored guest.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sniff] Ugh...

speaker: Spike
text: Still don't like ponies much, though... But you're with me, so it's cool.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh. Well, I still don't trust them. I say we turn tail and bail while we still–

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm! [munching] Before we finish eating? Are you loco in the coco?! Can I please have more of that mushy stuff, whatever it was?

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: Certainly. And, Mr. Spike, you like gemstones, yes?

speaker: Spike
text: Turquoise. Mmm! [munching] Heh hah! This here is Little Strongheart, and these are my friends Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You!

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: You!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's it! We are outta here!

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: Wait! Please accept my apologies for what happened on the train. We didn't mean for anyone to be hurt.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, right.

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: We only wanted the tree. The settler ponies have overtaken the land and have planted an orchard all over it! Because of their thoughtlessness, we can no longer run over our traditional stampeding grounds.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
text: Huh?

speaker: Spike
text: I think it's time they met Chief Thunderhooves.

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: Hmmh. We have a long and winding stampeding trail that we have run upon for many generations. [breath] My father stampeded upon these grounds, and his father before him, and his father before him, and his father before him, and his father before him, and–

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: I think they get the idea, Chief.

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: Hmph. It is a sacred tradition to run the path every year. But this year, these... settler ponies, these... [snort] Appleloosans! [snorting]

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: They planted apple trees all over it without asking our permission.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
