text: Well *that's* not very nice. Right, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hmph...

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: The ponies refused to move their trees, so we are stuck here, and it is not fair!

speaker: Spike
text: See, Rainbow Dash? They had a good reason to–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh... Ah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'll say they had a good reason! C'mon. We have some apple-pickin' Appleloosans to talk to!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ow! [groaning] Gently, please!

speaker: Applejack
text: Sorry, Rarity, but our friends are out there and we have ta' be ready for a long hike into buffalo territory if we're gonna save 'em! Let's go!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hi, guys!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Pinkie! We're so glad you're safe.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How did you escape from the buffalo?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We didn't!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We promised the buffalo a chance to talk.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, yeah? 'Bout what?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We brought our new pal Little Strongheart here to explain to the Appleloosans why they should move the apple trees off buffalo land.

speaker: Braeburn
text: That information would be quite help–

speaker: Applejack
text: That's weird. 'Cause my cousin Braeburn here wants to explain to the buffalo why they should let the apple trees stay.

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: That would be a useful thing to–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The land is theirs! You planted the trees not knowing that. Honest mistake. Now, you just gotta move 'em, that's all.

speaker: Braeburn
text: Well... heh...

speaker: Applejack
text: They busted their rumps here! An' now they're supposed ta bust their rumps again, just 'cause some buffalo won't stampede someplace else?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Plant the trees somewhere else!

speaker: Applejack
text: Where?! It's the only flatland around these parts!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The *buffalo* had it *first*!

speaker: Applejack
text: The settler ponies need it to *live*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Come *on*, Applejack!

speaker: Applejack
text: [over Rainbow Dash] You're bein' unreasonable!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [over Applejack] I put my hoof down!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Look! Both the settlers and the buffalo have good reasons to use this land. There must be something we can do.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey! I've got an idea!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
We may be divided
But of you all, I beg
To remember we're all hoofed
At the end of each leg

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
No matter what the issue
Come from wherever you please
All this fighting gets you nothing
But hoof-and-mouth disease

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Arguing's not the way
Hey, come out and play!
It's a shiny, new day
So, what do you say?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
You gotta share
You gotta care
It's the right thing to do
You gotta share
You gotta care
And there'll always be a way through

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Both our diets, I should mention
Are completely vegetarian
We all eat hay and oats
Why be at each other's throat?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
You gotta share
You gotta care
It's the right thing to do
And there'll always be a way
Throoooough!

speaker: Spike
text: [applauds] All right, Pinkie Pie! That was fantastic! What a great song! Yeah, right on!

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: It appears that Sheriff Silverstar and I have come to... an agreement.

speaker: Sheriff Silverstar
text: We have.

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: That was the worst performance we've ever seen.

speaker: Sheriff Silverstar
text: Teh... Abso-tively!

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: The time for action... Hmh... is upon us! Our stampede will start at high noon tomorrow. And if the orchard is still there, we'll flatten it... and the whole town!

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: But, Chief!

speaker: Sheriff Silverstar
text: An' we Appleloosans say you'd better bring yer best, 'cause we'll be ready and waitin'.

speaker: Braeburn
text: But, Sheriff...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh... That wasn't the message of my song at all...

speaker: Applejack
text: I want my kin ta' have what they need to live... but a storm's a-brewin' here. And I don't like the look of it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We've just got to talk some sense into them before somepony gets hurt. Listen, maybe if you would just reconsider, we–

speaker: Rarity
text: About the trees. Now if you could–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If we could just sit down and talk we could–

speaker: Goldengrape
text: Grrrrr!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Why won't anybody be rational and reasonable?!

speaker: Applejack
text: Sheriff, if we could only–

speaker: Spike
text: Isn't there someway to stop this?

speaker: Little Strongheart
text: Unless the settlers remove those trees, I do not think so.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I know you don't want to do this.

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: But they have taken our land. What would you have me do, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I don't know... but it's never too late to think of something.

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: At noon, it *will* be too late.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Come on, *think*! Think, think, think, think, think, think, think!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasp] He's not gonna do it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
–what do you say?
You gotta share
You gotta care
It's the right thing to do

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: You gotta share

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: You gotta care

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wah-ahh! Whoa-oo-oo-oo-ooa!

speaker: Sheriff Silverstar
text: Ready... aim... *fire!*

speaker: Sheriff Silverstar
text: Ah! Aah!

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: [distorted] Nooo!

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: Yum! Hey, I've got a much better idea!

speaker: Chief Thunderhooves
text: We... will allow the apple orchard to stay in exchange for a share of its fruit, heh... Those... *delicious* apple pies!

speaker: Spike
text: I'd rather eat turquoise any day of the week. [chomp] Auhh...!

speaker: Applejack
text: Bloomberg, this is yer special day. Mama's so proud of you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Friendship is a wondrous and powerful thing. Even the worst of enemies can become friends. You need understanding and compromise. You've got to share. You've got to care.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey! That's what *I* said!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: There you go, Mr. Mousey. Now you stay off that leg and do everything I told you. And it will be just like new in no time at all.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, you're welcome. Happy to be able to help.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You... found a watch? You... wanna be a watch? You're running! Running out of time? No. You're... late?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] I'm late for a very important date! The big brunch for Princess Celestia at Sugarcube Corner. Oh, the princess is here in Ponyville for a party, and we all promised we'd be there. But I'm not there! Oh, do I look all right? Do I need to bring anything? Maybe I shouldn't go.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Aah! It's starting! I'm missing it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, thanks, Angel. I mean, if you hadn't reminded me, I might have not remembered, and then I wouldn't be there, and everypony would be wondering where I was and... Oh, right. I'm late.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, okay then. See you later.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So... what do I have to do to get to be one of the Princess's royal guards, anyway? Is the pay good? Hellooo? Anybody home? [babbles] Wah-wah! [babbles] Ooh, you're good. [pause] Too good. I'm bored.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Phew. Made it. [gasp]

speaker: Guard 1
text: Halt!

speaker: Guard 2
text: Who goes there?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gulp] No one. Never mind. I'll go home.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's all right, sirs. She's on the list.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Thanks, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm so glad you could make it, Fluttershy. It wouldn't be the same without you.

speaker: Mr Cake
text: How's everypony doing? Good? Good.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Anything else we can get for you, dearies...? Ooh, I-I mean, esteemed guests.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Everything is fine, Mr. and Mrs. Cake.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Sorry I'm late. I had to finish taking care of a patient first.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, you and your tender loving care of little animals. I just know Princess Celestia is gonna love that about you. I mean, I hope she will... I mean, of course she will!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wow, Twilight. I thought I was the only one who got nervous at social gatherings.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, it's not that. I just want the princess to approve of my friends.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But she's met us all before.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And read about you in my letters. But this is the first time she's spent any real time with you. I want everypony to make a good impression.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, I'm sure you have nothing to worry about. Besides, it's just a casual get-together, right?

speaker: Rarity
text: Don't touch me! Watch the dress! Careful, you're gonna spill that on me! Oh, oh, that looks delicious. What is it? Oh, does it stain?! Keep it away from me!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Or... perhaps not that casual.

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh... which is the salad and which is the appetizer again? And which am I supposed to eat first? Oh, never mind. I'm not hungry.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's okay, Twilight. So our friends' manners aren't perfect. I doubt the princess will even notice.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [giggles] Whoo-hoo! Cupcakes, candies and pies, oh my! Oooh! Chocolate fountainy goodness! [munching] You gonna eat that?! [munching]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey!

speaker: Mr Cake
text: A thousand pardons, Your Majesty.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: That's quite all right, thank you. [sips]

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Empty teacup at 4 o'clock!

speaker: Mr Cake
text: Uh, I see it, honey bun!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Oh, um... thank you.

speaker: Mr Cake
text: Not at all, Your Highness.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: [sips] Thank you again.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Oh, but of course, Your Majesty.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: [sips] [sips] [sips] Gotcha!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh...

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: And what about you, dear? Fluttershy, is it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Me? Oh yes, Your Highness.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I understand from Twilight Sparkle's letters that you enjoy tending to the needs of woodland creatures.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes, I love to take care of animals.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: As do I. As Princess, I care deeply about all creatures, great and small.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Nothing means more to me than the well-being of all my subjects.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Ah, Philomena, my pet. You're awake. Do say hello to our gracious hosts.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh... my.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: She is quite a sight, isn't she?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I... I... I've never seen anything like it.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Really? Well, if I must... I'm sorry, everypony. I'm afraid I have to cut the party short. The mayor has requested an audience with me. Royal duty calls. Thank you for a wonderful time. It's been a joy getting to know you all better.

speaker: Applejack
text: Phew! Now I can eat someth'n! I'm starved! Oh...

speaker: Rarity
text: Stay right where you are. All I want is a clear path to the exit. Nobody move and my dress won't get hurt! Stay back! Back, I say!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] Well, Spike, I don't know for sure how things went with the princess, but at least no big disasters happened.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, you poor little thing. How did you ever get in such bad condition? Don't you worry, Philomena. I'll nurse you back to health. As a favor to the princess, who's obviously just far too busy to care for you properly.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sure the princess will appreciate the help. Oh my. We'd better get you to bed right away. There. [gasp]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: This is far worse than I thought. What you need is some medicine. Stat!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Here you go, Philomena. This will fix you right up.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Doctor Fluttershy expected that.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Always works. [gasp] Uh... Almost always.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: There's nothing like homemade soup to cure what ails you. Come on now. You're not gonna get better if you don't cooperate. Mmm... See? It's delicious. Good and good for you. Here comes the choo-choo train. Chugga-chugga, chugga-chugga, whoo-whoo!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh dear. Don't worry, Philomena. I know what'll make you feel better. Wait right here. I have just the thing.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Look, Philomena. I brought a fellow feathered friend by to cheer you up. Hummingway here was sick once too, but he let me help him and got better in no time. Didn't you, boy?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Say hello to your new friend Philomena.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Aw, look. I think he likes you. [vocalizes *My Little Pony* theme]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Your turn now, Philomena. Go ahead. You can do it. [vocalizes *My Little Pony* theme] Oh! Um... good try?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I know what'll clear up that tickle in your throat. A humidifier. [deep breath] Refreshing. How's that feeling now for you, Philomena? Better?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh... That's okay. I know lots of other ways to take care of you. Don't worry. You're gonna get better. How about...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Aromatherapy?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Warm bath?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ointment?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Scalpel. Surgical tape. Feathers.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, Philomena. I thought it would be easy to nurse you back to health. I've tried everything I know. And look at you. You're worse than ever.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hi, Fluttershy! I just wanted to drop by and say thank you so very much for making such a good impression on the princess today... [gasp] What is Celestia's pet doing here?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I couldn't leave the poor thing there. She needed my help.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no. Nononononono*no*! This is bad.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: How could I just walk away and not do anything?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But... but... she doesn't belong to you!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I had to do something.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Without telling anypony?! Without asking permission?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know you had good intentions, but you have *got* to return the princess's pet!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sigh] You're right. Okay, let's...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If we hurry, we can put her back before anypony even realizes she's missing. [gasp]

speaker: Guard 1
text: We were told we could find Twilight Sparkle here.

speaker: Guard 2
text: We regret to inform you, miss, that the royal pet has gone missing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Really? You don't say! [nervous laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's that dry night air?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But it's daytime.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well... day air's even drier. You guards better be on your way if you're gonna find the princess's missing pet. Philomena, was it? Thank you ever so much for keeping me in the loop. Bye! [pants] Phew... What are you doing?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Going to return Philomena, remember?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We can't *now*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Why not?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You have no idea what the princess is gonna do if she finds you're the one who took her pet, do you?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Do *you*?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well... no. But it can't be anything good. She might banish you from Equestria. Or throw you in a dungeon. Or banish you and then throw you in a dungeon *in* the place that she banishes you to!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You really think the princess would do that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay. Granted that probably won't happen, but do you wanna take any chances?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: All that really matters to me is that poor little Philomena here gets well.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's very noble of you. I'll write to you when you're banished. Unless I'm banished too somewhere there's no post office. Then you'll have to write to me. Deal?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Please, Twilight. You just have to help me get Philomena healthy and *then* we can return her to the princess. And everything will be fine.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Did you give her any kind of medicine?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I tried to, but she wouldn't take it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [groan] Then you have to *make* her take it. You can't be such a pushover, Fluttershy! You need to show this patient who's the boss. Make her straighten up and fly right!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She can't fly.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No excuses!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Done. Okay, what else?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh... well, she keeps pulling her feathers off. The ones that haven't fallen out yet from all her coughing, I mean.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There you go.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't think she likes it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Tough love, baby. You want her to get well, don't you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Of course, but...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Next!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, she desperately needs some bed rest, but I can't get her to stay put.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: One step ahead of you.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's for your own good, Philomena, I promise. Please, just relax and try to get some sleep.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's this soup over here? Smells delicious.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I made it for Philomena. But she wouldn't eat it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, she'll eat it, all right.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey! Where are you going?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No! Philomena! Come back!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What are you two doing? Are you having a race? Oh, can I play? One, two, three, go!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Excuse me!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hi!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Beg your pardon!

speaker: Rarity
text: Put me down!

speaker: Applejack
text: What in tarnation?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Sorry, but we've gotta find...

speaker: Guard
text: The princess's pet bird!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Philomena, come down from there! You'll hurt yourself!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'll catch you!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: What is going on here? Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, your Majesty, there's been a terrible accident.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's all my fault.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, Princess. Fluttershy didn't know any better. It was *my* fault.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm the one who did it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But you were only trying to help.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Some help I was.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Will ya let me do this? She'll go easier on me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But it's my fault!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, it's *my* fault!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, it's my fault! Wait, what are we talking about?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Thanks for trying to protect me, Twilight, but... Princess Celestia, I'm the one who took your pet bird. I really was only trying to help the poor little thing. Then I was gonna bring it right back to you, honest. So, if you wanna banish me and then throw me in a dungeon in the place that you banish me to, then that's what I deserve.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Oh, stop fooling around, Philomena. You're scaring everypony.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't understand! What is that thing? What happened to Philomena?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: This *is* Philomena. She's quite a sight, as I said. But nothing unusual for a phoenix. Isn't that right, Philomena?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: A... A phoenix?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: A phoenix is a majestic and magical bird. While it appears healthy and happy most of the time, every so often it must renew itself by shedding all of its feathers and bursting into flame. [silently] Rather melodramatic, if you ask me. [loud again] It then rises from the ashes, fresh as a daisy. All just a normal part of the life cycle of a phoenix. I'm afraid mischievous little Philomena here took the occasion to have a little fun with you, Fluttershy. Say you're sorry, young lady.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So... aren't you gonna banish me? Or throw me in a dungeon? Or banish me and then throw me in a dungeon in the place that you banish me to?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Of course not, my little pony. Where on Earth would you get such an idea?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I guess I have some imagination.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy really did do everything she could to try to take care of Philomena for you.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: And I do appreciate that your heart was in the right place, child. But all you had to do was ask me and I could have told you Philomena was a phoenix and saved you all this trouble.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I know. *I shouldn't have jumped to conclusions. Next time I'll ask before taking matters into my own hooves.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Should I write you a letter about that lesson, Princess?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: No, that's quite all right. I think I can remember.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's beautiful. Thank you, Philomena. No hard feelings.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hmm... [indistinct whispers] Hey, you know what you should do? You should go over there and tickle them!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah! [laughs]

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [gulp] Are you sure about this, Scootaloo? I've never even heard of a pony zip lining before.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Neither have I, but Spike told me it was awesome!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Whoa!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Wah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Ow!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: See anything?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Tree sap and pine needles but no cutie mark.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Plan B?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah. You know where we can find a cannon at this hour? It's no use! No matter what we try, we always end up without our cutie marks. And, surprisingly often, covered in tree sap.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Maybe we should do something less dangerous, like pillow testing or flower sniffing.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: This town is full of ponies who have their cutie marks. Why don't we ask them how they did it?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: That's a great *safe* idea.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah! And we can start with the coolest pony in Ponyville.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Applejack!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Rarity!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Come on, guys, I said "cool"! You know who I'm talking about. She's fast. She's tough. She's not afraid of anything!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
text: Pinkie Pie?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: No! The greatest flyer ever to come out of Cloudsdale.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
text: Fluttershy?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: No! Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh! Yeah, that makes much more sense.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Of course!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Let's do it. Let's find out how Rainbow Dash earned her cutie mark!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
text: Yeah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Aah! Uuh!

speaker: Applejack
text: Get back here, you thievin' varmints!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Thievin' what now?

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Hey sis! How'd you get your cutie mark?

speaker: Applejack
text: I never told you that story?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Hey! I thought we were gonna ask Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: We need all the help we can get.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ugh. Fine.

speaker: Applejack
text: Why, shoot. I was just a little filly. Even littler than y'all.

speaker: Applejack
text: [voiceover] I didn't want to spend my life on a muddy old apple farm. I wanted to live the sophisticated life, like my Aunt n' Uncle Orange. So I set out to try my luck in the big city, Manehattan! The most cosmopolitan city in all of Equestria.

speaker: Caesar
text: Hey! Outta the way, you rube!

speaker: Applejack
text: [voiceover] I knew I'd find out who I was meant to be in Manehattan.

speaker: Applejack
text: Aunt Orange! Uncle Orange! Thank y'all so much for lettin' me stay!

speaker: Aunt Orange
text: "Y'all". [laughs] Isn't she just the living end?

speaker: Uncle Orange
text: [chuckle] How quaint.

speaker: Aunt Orange
text: Don't worry. We'll have you acting like a true Manehattanite in no time.

speaker: Tall Order
text: And how are you finding good old Manehattan?

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, it's simply divine.

speaker: Aunt Orange
text: Very well said, my dear.

speaker: Applejack
text: Although, I must admit the city noise took some getting used to. Where I'm from, nights are so quiet, you seldom hear a peep until the roosters wake you.

speaker: Dainty Dove
text: The... what?

speaker: Tall Order
text: I say, my dear, what in the world is a "rooster"?

speaker: Applejack
text: [voiceover] What's he talking about? What do I say? I don't wanna look like a fool.

speaker: Pony
text: Dinner is served.

speaker: Applejack
text: Thank goodness. Being a city pony's hard work. I'm so hungry I could eat a...

speaker: Applejack
text: Cock-a-doodle-doo... Oh, I wonder what Granny Smith and Big McIntosh are up to. I bet they're applebuckin' their way through the Red Delicious trees. Oh, what I wouldn't give for just one bite...

speaker: Applejack
text: [voiceover] I never felt so homesick in all my days as I did right then.

speaker: Applejack
text: [voiceover] It was amazin'! A rainbow pointin' right back to... home. In that moment, it all became clear. I knew right then just who I was supposed to be. That's when this here appeared.

speaker: Applejack
text: I've been happily workin' in the farm ever since.

speaker: Applejack
text: There they are! Get back here, ya thievin' varmints!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Aw. That was such a sweet story!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Sweet? Try sappy. [mock-gags] Come on! We've got to find Rainbow Dash and hear the *cool* way to get a cutie mark.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: All right, little ones. This way. This way. You really should be more careful. Somepony could get hurt. Why are you in such a hurry anyway?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: We're trying to find Rainbow Dash, so we can hear how she earned her cutie mark.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, that would be interesting. You know, I wouldn't have gotten my cutie mark if it weren't for her.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Rainbow Dash?! Really?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh yes. It all started at Summer Flight Camp.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [voiceover] You'd never guess, but when I was little I was very shy. And a very weak flyer.

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: [laughter] Nice going, "Klutzershy"! They oughtta ground you permanently.

speaker: Hoops
text: Ha! My baby brother can fly better than *you*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [voiceover] It was the most humiliating moment of my life. And then, out of nowhere...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Leave her alone!

speaker: Hoops
text: Ooh, what are you gonna do, "Rainbow Crash"?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Keep making fun of her and find out!

speaker: Dumb-Bell
text: You think you're such a big shot? Why don't you prove it?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whaddya have in mind?

speaker: Hoops
text: You're going down!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: In history, maybe. See you boys at the finish line!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [screaming] Huh?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [voiceover] I had never seen such beautiful creatures. Butterflies don't fly as high as my cloud home. And I'd never been near the ground before.

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
What is this place
Filled with so many wonders?
Casting its spell
That I am now under

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
And the cute little bunnies
Birds flying free
And bees with their honey

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hooooonneeeeeeey!

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
And I owe it all to the Pegasus race
If I knew the ground had so much up its sleeve
I'd have come here sooner, and never leave

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes, I love ev-er-ythiiiiing!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Shhh. It's okay. You can come out. Everything's okay. There's nothing to be afraid of.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [voiceover] Somehow I had the ability to communicate with the animals on a different level.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Wait, wait, wait. What happened to Rainbow Dash? What about the race?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh. Well, I wasn't there, so I don't really know what happened.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Come on, Crusaders. We've gotta find her. Besides, I can't take anymore singing.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Maybe my sister knows where she is. Bye, Fluttershy!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Bye, girls!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: How did we get roped into *this*? Oh, we'll never hear Rainbow Dash's story.

speaker: Rarity
text: Are you girls still obsessing over your cutie marks?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Of course! Most of the fillies at school already have theirs.

speaker: Rarity
text: Mmm, I know how you feel. For the longest time I couldn't figure out why I didn't have mine.

speaker: Raritys teacher
text: Well done, Rarity. Your costumes are very nice.

speaker: Rarity
text: Nice?! They need to be spectacular! And the performance is tomorrow!

speaker: Rarity
text: [voiceover] I tried every trick I could think of, but nothing seemed to work. The costumes just weren't right. And the play opened that night.

speaker: Rarity
text: Maybe I'm not meant to be a fashionista after all... Aah! What's going on?!

speaker: Rarity
text: [voiceover] I had no idea where my horn was taking me. But unicorn magic doesn't happen without a reason. I knew this had to do with my love of fashion and maybe even my cutie mark! I knew that this was... My destiny!

speaker: Rarity
text: A rock?! *That's* my destiny?! What is your problem, horn? I followed you all the way out here for a *rock*?! [groans] Dumb rock!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ugh! These namby-pamby stories aren't getting us any closer to our cutie marks! They're all about finding who you really are and boring stuff like that.

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes, Scootaloo, that's exactly...

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Come on, girls! We need action! We need Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: As a young filly in Canterlot, I always wanted to go to the Summer Sun Celebration, where Princess Celestia raises the sun.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [voiceover] And I saw the most amazing, most wonderful thing I've ever seen.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [voiceover] I poured myself into learning everything I could about magic.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [voiceover] My parents decided to enroll me in Princess Celestia's School for Gifted Unicorns. It was a dream come true! Except for one thing... I had to pass an entrance exam!

speaker: Crystal Clear
text: Well, Miss Sparkle?

speaker: Crystal Clear
text: Well, Miss Sparkle?

speaker: Crystal Clear
text: We don't have all day.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [voiceover] I knew it was the most important day of my life, that my entire future would be affected by the outcome of this day and I was about to blow it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sorry I wasted your time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aah!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Twilight Sparkle.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I'm so sorry. I didn't mean...

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You have a very special gift. I don't think I've ever come across a unicorn with your raw abilities.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: But you need to learn to tame these abilities through focused study.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Twilight Sparkle, I'd like to make you my own personal protégé here at the school.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Well?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: One other thing, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: More? My cutie mark! Yesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyesyes...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...yesyesyesyes...

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Okay, okay.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We're happy for you, Twilight.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah, thrilled. Let's get out of here while we still can.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...yesyes, *yeeees*!

speaker: Cherry Fizzy
text: Are you okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [giggle] Um... yes.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ugh! Why don't we ever smash into Rainbow Dash?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You're looking for Rainbow Dash? If I was her, I'd be at Sugarcube Corner. Of course, if I was anyone, I'd be at Sugarcube Corner. Hey! I have an idea! Wanna go to Sugarcube Corner?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well, we're sort of looking for Rainbow Dash, so we can hear how she got her cutie mark.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Cutie mark? Come with me and I'll tell you how I got mine!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [sigh] Why not?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: All right!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [voiceover] My sisters and I were raised on a rock farm outside of Ponyville. We spent our days working the fields. There was no talking. There was no smiling. [sigh] There were only rocks. We were in the south field, preparing to rotate the rocks to the east field when all of a sudden...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [voiceover] I'd never felt joy like that before! It felt so good I just wanted to keep smiling forever! And I wanted everyone I knew to smile too, but rainbows don't come along that often. I wondered, how else could I create some smiles?

speaker: Igneous Rock Pie
text: We better harvest the rocks from the south field.

speaker: Cloudy Quartz
text: Pinkamena Diane Pie! Is that you?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mom! I need you and dad and the sisters to come in. Quick!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Surprise! You like it? It's called... a party!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh. You don't like it. [gasp] You like it! I'm so happy!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And that's how Equestria was made!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Wha... huh?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Look! We're here!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Maybe on the way home I can tell you the story of how I got my cutie mark. It's a gem!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, come on. She's just being Pinkie Pie.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ugh...

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Rainbow Dash! You're here!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I hear *you're* looking for my cutie mark story.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [sigh] You have no idea what I've been through today to hear that story.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It all happened during the race at Flight Camp...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [voiceover] ...where I stood alone against all odds to defend Fluttershy's honor.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [voiceover] I've never flown like *that* before! That freedom was unlike anything I've ever felt! The speed, the adrenaline, the wind in my mane... I liked it... a lot!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ow!

speaker: Hoops
text: Ha! Later, Rainbow Crash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [voiceover] Turns out the only thing I liked more than flying fast... was winning!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [voiceover] Most people thought that the sonic rainboom was just an old mare's tale. But that day... The day I discovered racing... I proved that the legends were true. I made the impossible happen!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And that, little ones, is how you earn a cutie mark.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Whooooaaaa...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wait a second. I heard that explosion. And I saw the rainbow too. Rainbow Dash, if you hadn't scared the animals, I never would have learned I could communicate with them and gotten my cutie mark.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I heard that boom! And right afterwards, there was this amazing rainbow that taught me to smile.

speaker: Applejack
text: When I got my cutie mark, I saw a rainbow that pointed me home. I bet it was your sonic rainboom!

speaker: Rarity
text: There was an explosion I could never explain when I got *my* cutie mark.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is uncanny! If that explosion didn't happen when it did, I would have blown my entrance exam. Rainbow Dash, I think you helped me earn my cutie mark too!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We all owe our cutie marks to you!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Do you realize what this means? All of us had a special connection before we even met.

speaker: Rarity
text: We've been BFFs forever and we didn't even know it!

speaker: Applejack
text: Come here, y'all.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: AWWW!!!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm so glad we're friends!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I love you, guys!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
text: Awwww...

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ewwww... Gimme a break. Come on, Crusaders! Maybe we just need to try zip lining again. [sigh]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hey. How about a song?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Definitely!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Nooooo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Today I learned something amazing. Everypony everywhere has a special magical connection with her friends, maybe even before she's met them. If you're feeling lonely and you're still searching for your true friends, just look up in the sky. Who knows? Maybe you and your future best friends are all looking at the same rainbow.*

speaker: Spike
text: Gross! When did you get so cheesy?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Just write it, Spike.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This meteor shower tonight's gonna be amazing!

speaker: Spike
text: Awesome!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You know, this shower only happens once every 100 years.

speaker: Spike
text: A centennial celebration!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We better get a move on!

speaker: Spike
text: Don't wanna be late! Whoa, whoa, whoa! [sigh] There.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, did you grab my quill and ink?

speaker: Spike
text: Check!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Scrolls?

speaker: Spike
text: Check! I've also packed a telescope, apples, bananas, fruit punch, and my freshly baked homemade triple-decker nut-crazy vanilla cream cookies!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [giggle] I can see that. Once again you've read my mind, Spike. And that is why you are my number one assistant.

speaker: Spike
text: I'm sorry. I didn't hear you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That is why you are my number one assistant.

speaker: Spike
text: Missed that! Huh...?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I said... [giggle] Come on, let's get going. Wait! I almost forgot! I wanna bring the "Astronomical Astronomer's Almanac to All Things Astronomy".

speaker: Spike
text: The Astronomo-lomo homono what?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You know that really old big blue book on stars, moons, planets, the universe...?

speaker: Spike
text: Right. Check! Ah... Ahh... Ahhh... Ahhhh...! [sigh] [huge sneeze]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey! What's taking my number one assistant so long?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I was sure I put the astronomer's guide back. The book would have helped me identify different planets and stars tonight.

speaker: Spike
text: Well... Maybe someone borrowed it? Besides, you don't need that book. You can already name all the planets and stars, 'cause you're super smart and astronomically awesome!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks, Spike. You're such a flatterer.

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah, I'm a sweet talker.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And a number one assistant, right?

speaker: Spike
text: Check!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [munch] [gulp] Wow, Twilight! You're lucky to have such a rad assistant. I wish I had someone to do whatever I told them.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Ooh! Ooh! Me! Me! Me! I'll do whatever you want, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh yeah, pipsqueak? How about taking out the trash?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yes ma'am!

speaker: Rarity
text: Do we have Spike to thank again for this amazing spread? Isn't he simply amazing?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, come on. [pause] I said come on.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Little Spikey-wikey! Who knew that big ferocious dragon started off so cutesy wootsy?

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike, you are such a little star that I had to make a little bow tie for you.

speaker: Spike
text: Gosh. You guys are embarrassing me. Stop it. [pause] Twilight, your turn.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, that's enough.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, right. That's enough.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Hey, everypony! The show is starting!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Spike
text: Wow...

speaker: Spike
text: [yawn] Huh?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm. Wow! These cookies are delish!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike made them. Speaking of, Spike, can you bring us some punch? Spike?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, poor little thing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aww... He's worked himself to the bone.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And now the punch has been... "spiked"!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Goodnight, Spike. [giggle] Sweet dreams, number one assistant.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] "The Study of Comets. Comets are small, irregularly shaped bodies that are made of nonvolatile grains and frozen gases. They..."

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "...have body structures that are fragile and diverse..."

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Shoot! Oh... This is a job for Spike. If only he were awake...

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wait! Don't go! Don't be afraid. Thank you for returning my scroll.

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo! Hoo! Hoo-hoo.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Gosh, it's cold tonight. Say, would you like to relax in here and keep me company while I work?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo! Hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now, where was I? Oh, yes. "...fragile and diverse with a surrounding cloud of material called a coma, that grows in size and brightness as the comet approaches the sun..."

speaker: Spike
text: [snoring] Huh? Waah! I overslept! I know it's already ten, but I'm scaly-tailed and bright-eyed and ready to work twice as fast! Oh please, don't be upset, Twilight! And what do you want for breakfast? Oatmeal? How about a sunflower smoothie? Grass pancakes?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, don't worry.

speaker: Spike
text: But my morning chores...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's okay. Owlowiscious did them for you.

speaker: Spike
text: Who?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: He's our new junior assistant. He's gonna help out with your chores so you won't be so tired all the time.

speaker: Spike
text: Wha... Wh... What do we need a junior assistant for? I'm not tired. I do fine on my own. I don't need sleep, I...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, don't worry. He's just here to help out a little. Now, I have to go out, so why don't you introduce yourself to Owlowiscious? He's in the library.

speaker: Spike
text: Worried? Do I look worried? I'm not worried. Who's worried?

speaker: Spike
text: Hello? Hellooo! Whoa! Dude, that's creepy. Uh... Hi there! I'm Spike. I'm sure Twilight has told you all about me.

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo.

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, Spike? You know, assistant number one?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo?

speaker: Spike
text: I'm Spike! And who are you? What are you?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo!

speaker: Spike
text: Who?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo!

speaker: Spike
text: I thought your name was Owlowiscious!

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo?

speaker: Spike
text: Okay, "Who", "Owlowiscious", whatever. I'm Spike, okay? Look! All you need to know is that I'm number one and you're number two. Got it?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo?

speaker: Spike
text: So, a man of mystery, huh? I'm keeping my eye on you! I've got eyes in the back of my head too, you know? [crash] Well, not really, but... You know what I mean!

speaker: Spike
text: That bird is out for my job. He wants to be number one. I'll prove to Twilight that I deserve to be number one. Not Freaky Feathers over there. I won't let him have my job if it's the last thing I do!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, what a fantastical, flufflicious feathery little friend! I'm... *Hoo*ked!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: He's just wonderful.

speaker: Spike
text: [mocking] "He's just wonderful." Uh, yes. Wonderful. He's quite... the charmer.

speaker: Rarity
text: And Owlowiscious is just such a star I just had to make this little bow for you.

speaker: Spike
text: Grrr!

speaker: Applejack
text: What's he all saddle sore about?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: He's probably just jealous of Owlowiscious.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Maybe Spike feels threatened or worried that Owlowiscious will replace him?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Replace him? Hah! That's crazy! Spike knows he can't be replaced.

speaker: Spike
text: They're trying to replace me! I better step it up and make sure that Twilight *and* Owlowiscious know that I'm still number one!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey, Spike! Can you fetch me that book called "Two-headed Myth—

speaker: Spike
text: ...Mythological Mysteries!" I know where it is.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks, Owlowiscious. Hey, Spike, no worries. Owlowiscious flew up and got the book for me. Oh, and gee! I guess I need "Ferrets of Fairyland" too.

speaker: Spike
text: Hey! Whoa! Whoa!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Climb down from there before you fall.

speaker: Spike
text: Grrr!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Shoot!

speaker: Spike
text: Yes, sir!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My last writing quill. It's broken.

speaker: Spike
text: Never fear! Spike, your number one assistant, is here! [under his breath] Quill... Quill... Where is it? Not here... Quill... Quill, where is it...?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo.

speaker: Spike
text: Where am I gonna get a quill?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, wait! Wait!

speaker: Spike
text: But the store is called "Quills and Sofas". You only sell two things!

speaker: Davenport
text: Sorry, Junior. All outta quills until Monday. Need a sofa?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I swore I had one here somewhere. Ah, here it is! A quince!

speaker: Spike
text: Not a quince. A quill!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Right. A quail? A quilt! A quesadilla? Aha! A quiche! [pronounced phonetically]

speaker: Spike
text: Not a quiche. [pronounced correctly] A quill!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nope. Sorry. All outta quills.

speaker: Spike
text: [sigh] Shoot.

speaker: Spike
text: Come on, chicken! Here, chicky-chicky-chicky! Here, chick-chick-chick-chicky! Come here! Ugh! Come here! [grunting] Not the face, not the face! No! Hey! Stop! Quit it!

speaker: Spike
text: [panting] Spike... to the rescue.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Spike. I was calling out for you when you were turning this place upside down. Owlowiscious gave me one of his feathers to use as a quill.

speaker: Spike
text: That's just great. Perfect! Sweet! I think I'll just, uh... finish up the rest of my chores! Or did Owlowiscious already do them?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, no no. There are quite a lot of them.

speaker: Spike
text: Well, that's fine. Because I can just stay up all night and finish– [snoring]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Poor Spike. He'll come around. He's genuinely a good little guy.

speaker: Spike
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike. What is this? You said this book was missing. Well, Owlowiscious found it right where it belongs, but like this. How did it get this way?

speaker: Spike
text: Uh... Well, um... You see, I... I just didn't wanna disappoint you and, uh... Have you ever seen a dragon sneeze?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've seen a dragon lie. I'm very disappointed in you, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: [to Owlowiscious] You set me up! Well, two can play that game.

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo!

speaker: Spike
text: Not "who"! Two! Urgh!

speaker: Spike
text: Owlowiscious is out to take my place, I just know it! I've gotta stop him. But how?

speaker: Spike
text: Ah... *Muahahaha!*

speaker: Rarity
text: Come along, Opal. Let's hurry up and get to Fluttershy's tea party.

speaker: Spike
text: So lifelike. And when Twilight discovers it shredded up on her floor, she'll think mouse-eating Owlowiscious is to blame. And I'll be number one... again! *Muhahaha!*

speaker: Spike
text: That poor little field mouse! Torn to pieces! It must have been Owlowiscious! You know, since owls eat, you know, mice. What a terrible, terrible bird! He must be punished! Right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! I don't know what upsets me more. That you deliberately tried to set up Owlowiscious or that you actually thought this pathetic attempt would work! You've let your jealousy get the best of you, Spike. I am truly disappointed. This is *not* the Spike I know and love.

speaker: Spike
text: She... She doesn't love me anymore.

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight hates me. I'm cold, hungry, tired and lonely. Could it get any worse?

speaker: Spike
text: I guess that's a yes.

speaker: Spike
text: Hello? Hello?

speaker: Spike
text: What is that?

speaker: Spike
text: If this is what running away is all about, I never wanna go home! Gems! Mmm... Woohoo!

speaker: Spike
text: [hiccup] Even if my tummy's full, the rest of me is still empty. I miss Twilight and the pony gang. But she doesn't love me anymore. So, I'm better off here, all by myself. Wow. Seems to be getting warmer. The steam is great for my complexion, but it's sure getting hot in here.

speaker: Green dragon
text: *What are you doing in*my*cave? And why are you eating*my*gems?*

speaker: Spike
text: Heyah bro! I didn't know this was your cave. And I didn't know these were your gems, but... we're cool, right?

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa, whoa! Hey... We're like brothers, you know? I mean, you're a dragon, I'm a dragon... It's us against the world, right?

speaker: Spike
text: You don't scare me! So you're big.

speaker: Spike
text: *Really* big. And your claws are super sharp. Tail... extra spiky. But, uh... You don't scare me! Ha! How'd you like that? Uh... I'd love to stay, but gotta go! See ya! Wouldn't wanna be ya! Aah!

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo-hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! Over here!

speaker: Spike
text: Am I glad to see you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hurry! Hop on! It's too dark! I can't see!

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo! Hoo-hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [pants] Spike. We were so worried about you. *I* was so worried about you. Why did you run away?

speaker: Spike
text: I thought you didn't need me anymore. And that you didn't love me anymore.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike. Sure, I was disappointed, but you are my number one assistant! And friend. And you always will be. It's just that sometimes I need some help at night. I can't ask you to stay up late. You're a baby dragon and you need your rest. Owls are nocturnal. So I asked Owlowiscious to help. But not to take your place. No one could ever replace you, Spike. Not even when you are being a jealous numbskull.

speaker: Spike
text: I'm sorry, Twilight. I never should have been so jealous.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And I'm sorry too, Spike. I should have been more sensitive.

speaker: Spike
text: And Owlowiscious... I know now that you weren't out to take my job. Forgive me?

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo?

speaker: Spike
text: Me. Forgive me, Spike.

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [giggle] He forgives you, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: Hey! How did you guys know where I was?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It was your ketchup-covered feet. Owlowiscious discovered your footprints and we followed them all the way to the cave.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh yeah, the ketchup. It looked pretty real though, didn't it? Uh... [nervous giggle]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know Princess Celestia will wanna read about what happened today...

speaker: Spike
text: I'm ready when you are.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey, Spike. Why don't *you* write to Princess Celestia? And tell her what *you've* learned?

speaker: Spike
text: Really? Why, that's a big responsibility!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know. But nothing my number one assistant can't handle.

speaker: Spike
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Spike
text: *This is Spike, writing to you about my adventures. This week I've learned that being jealous and telling lies gets you nowhere in friendship. I also learned that there's plenty of love for every friend to share. So from here on out, I promise, that I, Spike, will...* [drops asleep]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Spike.

speaker: Owlowiscious
text: Hoo?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Who? Spike! You kno... Ohhhh... [giggle]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh! Hi, Pinkie Pie...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
This is your singing telegram
I hope it finds you well
You're invited to a party
'Cause we think you're really swell

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Gummy's turning one year old
So help us celebrate
The cake will be delicious
The festivities first-rate

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
There will be games and dancing
Bob for apples, cut a rug [pop]
And when the party's over
We'll gather 'round for a group hug

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
[Slowing down]
No need to bring a gift
Being there will be enough
Birthdays mean having fun with friends
Not getting lots of stuff

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
[Breathing heavily]
It won't be the same without you
So we hope that you say yes
So, please, oh please R.S.V.P.
And come, and be our guest!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [rasping voice] Next time, I think I'll just pass out written invitations.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nice one! Now, let me show you how it's really done.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, girls!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, Pinkie Pie!

speaker: Applejack
text: Howdy!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [squeal] Just wanted to tell you how happy I am that you could make it to Gummy's party.

speaker: Applejack
text: Are you kiddin'? I wouldn't have missed it for the world.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Me neither. When Pinkie Pie throws a party, I am there! Ta-da!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aw! It's just a boring old apple. Don't worry, there are plenty of other surprises in there.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [spits] What kind of surprises?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I can't tell you that, silly. Then it wouldn't be a surprise.

speaker: Rarity
text: This punch is simply divine. Is this the same recipe you used for your "Spring Has Sprung" party?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nope! Something new.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's Gummy's favorite.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, this is my jam!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Having fun?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A blast!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You always throw the best parties, Pinkie Pie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: They're always the best parties 'cause my best friends are always there!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yah!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: C'mon, everypony! Gummy wants to dance! Go, Gummy! It's your birthday! Go, Gummy! It's your birthday!

speaker: Applejack
text: Hoo-wee! I am beat! I haven't danced that much since... Well, since your last party. Thanks again for the invite!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: See ya later, birthday alligator!

speaker: Rarity
text: Bravo for hosting yet another delightful soiree.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's been lovely.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You sure you don't wanna stay? There's still some cake left.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, I think I'm gonna pass. Great party though. We should do this again soon.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] We *should* do this again soon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh! Hi, Pinki-

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's soon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pardon me?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You said we should have another party soon, and... it's soon! Here's your invitation!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "You're invited to Gummy's 'after-birthday' party. This afternoon at 3 o'clock."

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: All our bestest friends are invited, and there's gonna be dancing, and games, and cake, and ice-cream, and punch!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *This* afternoon? As in, "this afternoon" this afternoon?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes, indeedy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, gosh. I wish I could make it, but I've gotten a bit behind in my studies. I've really gotta hit the books.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I understand. Your studies come first. But don't worry, we'll be sure to save you some cake.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Please do.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh! And Twilight, you shouldn't hit the books. You should really just read them.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'll keep that in mind.

speaker: Applejack
text: Huh? Oh, hi, Pinkie Pie! What brings you 'round these parts?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Who's ready to shake their hoof-thang?! It's an invitation to Gummy's "after-birthday" party this afternoon. There's gonna be dancing, and games, and cake, and ice-cream, and punch!

speaker: Applejack
text: *This* afternoon? A-as in, "this afternoon" this afternoon?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's funny. That's just what Twilight said, and the answer is, "Yes! It's this afternoon!"

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, well, I... I... uh... I don't think I can make it 'cause... uh... I have to... uh... uh, you know what? I... uh... pick apples! Yep, apples! 'Cause that's what we do! With the... apples. We, uh... pick 'em!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okey-dokey-lokey! A party is still a party, even if there are only three guests.

speaker: Spike
text: [grunts] Anything else I can do for you, most beautiful one?

speaker: Rarity
text: [sniff] [whimper] Hmm... perhaps you could take a bath. How do I put this delicately? You smell like a rotten apple core that's been wrapped in moldy hay and dipped in dragon perspiration.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh! Love the new hat. Very modern. What's the occasion?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Gummy's "after-birthday" party is this afternoon. I'm delivering the invitations.

speaker: Rarity
text: The party is *this* afternoon? As in, "this afternoon" this afternoon?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's so strange. Everypony keeps saying that.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh... do they?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I know it's short notice, but we had such a great time at his birthday party, I thought we could have even more fun at his after-birthday party.

speaker: Rarity
text: And I'm sure that we would, but I'm going to have to decline. I have to... wash my hair!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Don't be silly, your hair doesn't look dirty.

speaker: Rarity
text: It doesn't?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nope!

speaker: Rarity
text: See? [gag] Dirty! I have to go!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh... No Twilight, no Applejack, no Rarity. Oh well, a party is still a party even with only two guests.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This afternoon?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: As in...?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes! As in, "this afternoon" this afternoon!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, man! We'd love to, but... we're... house-sitting this afternoon.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sigh] Both of you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's... uh... a big house.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, look at the time! We'd really better get going.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait! Maybe I could bring you some after-birthday cake and ice-cream. Who're you house-sitting for?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Harry.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Harry?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, I don't think you know him.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's strange. I know just about everypony around here.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: He's... a bear.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A bear?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yup! He's a bear all right, and he'll be pretty upset if we don't get over to his house soon.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait! There's a bear around here who lives in a house?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's, uh, really more of a cave.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But he's fixed up the place so much, it *feels* like a house.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And, uh, he wants us to look after his house... uh, cave... while he's, uh...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: A-at the beach!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: He's vacationing at the beach?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yup! He loves to...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [over Rainbow Dash] Collect sea shells! ...Play beach volleyball! ...Collect volleyballs!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [over Fluttershy] Play beach volleyball! ...Collect sea shells! ...Play sea shells!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Gotta go!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Something strange is definitely going on around here, Gummy. Sure Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy had to house-sit for that vacationing bear, but what are the chances all my other friends would have plans this afternoon too? Rarity has to wash her hair? Applejack has to pick apples? Twilight is behind on her studies and has to hit the books? The more I think about it, the more those are starting to sound like... [gasp] *excuses*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That doesn't look like studying... or hitting!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Ooh! You must be here for...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Shh!* Is Pinkie Pie around?

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Oh, I don't think so.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Good. I don't wanna her to know anything about this.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Yes, of course. I'll be right back.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But... we're friends. What wouldn't Twilight want me to know anything about? [gasp] She's coming back.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: There you go.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks, and remember, not a word to Pinkie Pie. Hey! What's with the tin can? [yelp]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Time to get to the bottom of things! [gasp] I think our cover's been blown! We'll need a new disguise.

speaker: Rarity
text: She didn't see you at the sweet shop, did she?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't think so.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, good. I'd hate for her to ruin everything.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Me too.

speaker: Rarity
text: Have you seen her?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Not since this morning.

speaker: Rarity
text: Me neither. Can you believe she was planning on throwing an after-birthday party *today*?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm just glad I was able to come up with an excuse for why I couldn't be there.

speaker: Rarity
text: Me too! This is obviously going to be so much better.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: As long as we keep her from finding out about it, it will.

speaker: Rarity
text: [whispering] *See you later!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I thought everypony loved my parties.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hi, Pinkie Pie! Uh-oh!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow Dash! Wait!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Phew...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Where're you going?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ah!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *What's the real reason you didn't want to come to Gummy's party?!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *What's in those bags?!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Applejack! We have a problem!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *I know you're IN THERE!*

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh! Howdy, pardner!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mind if I... take a look inside the *barn*?

speaker: Applejack
text: No! Uh, I mean, yes, I mean... you can't come in here!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow Dash just went in there.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, well, she was just bringin' in some... *supplies*! Yup, supplies for the... *renovation*! Fixin' up the whole thing, top to bottom... uh, *lots of construction goin' on in there right now.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [whispering] You heard her! *Construction!*

speaker: Applejack
text: Yup! Construction! That's my story, and I'm stickin' to it. [nervous laugh] [gulp]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okey... dokey... lokey.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Secrets and lies! It's all secrets and lies with those ponies! They're up to something, Gummy! Something they don't want me to know about! Well, I'm gonna know about it! I'm gonna know about it big time! And I know just who's gonna tell me all about it. *Tell me all about it big time!*

speaker: Spike
text: Wow! Nice spread!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's all yours, Spike. All you have to do is *talk*.

speaker: Spike
text: That's it? Oh, you got it. Okay... uh, beautiful weather we're having, eh? I love a sunny spring day, don't you? The birds chirpin' and the flowers bloomin'.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, no, no. Talk about our *friends*.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, okay. Let's see, there's Twilight Sparkle. She's a unicorn. Good with magic. A real brainiac. And then you got Rarity. Total *knockout*. Twilight seems to think I don't even have a chance with her, but... eh, what does she know? Let's see. There's... there's Fluttershy, a Pegasus who's afraid of heights. Heh, what's up with that?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Grr! No! You're not understanding me! I want you to confess!

speaker: Spike
text: Confess?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Confess!

speaker: Spike
text: I'm the one who spilled juice all over Twilight's copy of "Magical Mysteries and Practical Potions"!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And?

speaker: Spike
text: And I'm the one who used up all the hot water in Ponyville yesterday when I took a seven-hour bubble bath!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aaand?

speaker: Spike
text: And sometimes... when no one's around... I do this: *Lookin' good, Spike! Lookin' real good!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No! No! No! No!

speaker: Spike
text: W-What do you wanna hear? Tell me what you want me to say, and I'll say it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Tell me that my friends are all lying to me and avoiding me because they don't like my parties and they don't want to be my friends anymore*!* [panting]

speaker: Spike
text: Your friends are all lying to you and avoiding you 'cause they don't like your parties and they don't want to be your friends anymore!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aha! I knew it! [balloon deflating noise] Oh no, my friends don't like my parties and they don't want to be my friends anymore.

speaker: Spike
text: Uh... so... [loud eating noises]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Thank you all so much for coming! It means so much to Gummy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Could I have some more punch?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, of course you can have some more punch, Mr. Turnip. [twang]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This is one great pahty! You really outdone yourself!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Why, thank you, Rocky.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm having a delightful time as well.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm so glad, Sir Lintsalot. [ding]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Might I trouble you for anozer slice of cake?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Anything for you, Madame le Flour.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm just glad none o' them *ponies* showed up.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, they're not so bad.

speaker: Rocky
text: Not so bad? Puh-lease! They're a buncha losers!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, c'mon now. "Losers" might be a little strong, dont'cha think?

speaker: Sir Lintsalot
text: After the way they treated you? I say "losers" isn't strong enough.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, it was pretty rude...

speaker: Madame le Flour
text: Pretty rude? It was downright deespicable!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It was, wasn't it?

speaker: Mr Turnip
text: If I were you, I wouldn't speak to them ever again.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You know what? I'm *not* gonna speak to them ever again. And I'm not gonna invite them to another party as long as I live! They don't deserve to be invited to my parties. [plink] Not after the way they've been acting.

speaker: Madame le Flour
text: [clapping] Deeespicable!

speaker: Sir Lintsalot
text: Such losers!

speaker: Madame le Flour
text: Yes, zat's right.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well done.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You show 'em!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Who could that be?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey there, Pinkie Pie! Sorry I was in such a rush earlier. Had some place to be and couldn't slow down and say, "Hello." You know how it goes.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *I know how it goes, all right!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah... so, why don't you come with me over to Sweet Apple Acres?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No thanks. I'm spending time with my *real* friends. Isn't that right, Madame le Flour?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Oui!* Zat iz correct, *madame.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh... Pinkie Pie?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Another slice of cake, Sir Lintsalot?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'd love one.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aaallrighty. What do you say we get on out of Creepytown and head over to Applejack's...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She's not going anywhere.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I most certainly am not. I'm having a wonderful time right here.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You should really just come with me.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You heard the lady! She ain't goin' nowheres, *chump*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who *you* calling a chump, *chump*?! Ugh... That's it. Party's over. Come on, Pinkie Pie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pinkie Pie, let's go!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I said no!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You... [grunts] have to... come with... me!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No... I... Don't!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, you wanna do this the hard way?! We'll do this the *hard way*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [grunting] [panting] We're... here...

speaker: Fluttershy
Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Rarity
text: [in unison] Surprise!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I really thought she'd be more excited.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Excited*? *Excited?!* Why would I be excited to attend my own farewell party?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Farewell party?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes! You don't like me anymore, so you decided to kick me out of the group and throw a great, big party to celebrate! A "Farewell to Pinkie Pie" party!

speaker: Applejack
text: Why in the world would you think we didn't like you anymore, sugarcube?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Why? *Why?* *Why?!* Because you've been lying to me and avoiding me all day, that's why!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, *yeah!* Because we wanted your party to be a *surprise*.

speaker: Rarity
text: We'd been planning this party for such a long time, we had to make excuses for why we couldn't attend Gummy's party so that we could get everything ready for yours.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If this is a farewell party, why does the cake I picked up from Sugarcube Corner say "Happy Birthday, Pinkie Pie"?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [squeak] Because it's my birthday! Ooh, how could I have forgotten my own birthday?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And you like me so much you decided to throw me a surprise party!

speaker: Rarity
text: That's what we've been trying to tell you, darling.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You girls are the best friends ever! How could I have ever doubted you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's okay, Pinkie Pie. It could have happened to any of us.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh-huh! It sure would.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Don't worry about it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm just glad I haven't been replaced by a bucket of turnips.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You don't wanna know.

speaker: Applejack
text: All right, girls! Enough of this gab. *Let's party!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *I am writing to you from the most delightful party. I'm not only having a great time with my friends, but also was given the opportunity to learn a valuable lesson about friendship. Always expect the best from your friends, and never assume the worst. Rest assured that a good friend always has your best interests at heart.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Your faithful student,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Twilight Sparkle*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You girls wouldn't mind if we celebrated Gummy's after-birthday party too, would you? His party was cut short, and he's pretty upset about it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, definitely.

speaker: Rarity
text: Aww, he was upset?

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh-huh, sure!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: For Gummy, yeah!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, why not? Let's have a party for Gummy. [giggles]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ahh! I... can't... believe... the Grand... Galloping... Gala... is... tonight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie! Please stop shouting, I'm trying to concentrate.

speaker: Rarity
text: Pinkie Pie! Stop that right now. It's time to prepare for the Gala, and I refuse to let you put on your new dress when you're all sweaty.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What's Twilight doing?

speaker: Spike
text: She's got an awesome magic spell she's been working on for the Gala.

speaker: Rarity
text: Where are the others? It's getting late.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hold your horses, girl. We're here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Perfect! I'm ready.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: For what?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right, Spike.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: An apple! Are we having pie?

speaker: Spike
text: Shh! Watch!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks. But that's just the start. Fluttershy, did you bring your friends?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes. Will they be safe, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You have my word.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ta-da!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Neat, huh? And don't worry. They'll be mice again at midnight.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Opalescence, no!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wait! Come back! Those horses were supposed to pull our carriage. How will we get to the Gala?

speaker: Rarity
text: What ever shall we do?

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh... ahem. Excuse me. Uh, would you boys mind pulling our carriage to the Gala?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh. Yeah. Right.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh!

speaker: Spike
text: Come on, you guys. Let me in!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sure thing, Spike.

speaker: Rarity
text: Heavens no! We're getting dressed.

speaker: Applejack
text: Dressed? Uh, beg pardon, Rarity, but, uh... we don't normally wear clothes.

speaker: Rarity
text: [moan] I'm sorry, Spike. Some of us do have standards.

speaker: Spike
text: I still can't believe we're gonna be at Canterlot tonight. Our home town, Twilight! And the best part is that we all get to hang out together all night long!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh... I-I don't know, Spike.

speaker: Rarity
text: We'll just have to see.

speaker: Applejack
text: We're gonna be a mite busy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Busy having fun! [boing]

speaker: Spike
text: Oh. Okay.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't worry, Spike. We'll all get to spend some time together.

speaker: Spike
text: Great!

speaker: Spike
text: 'Cause I planned out my insider's tour of Canterlot. I've gotta show Rarity the crown jewels, and Applejack the Princess's golden apple tree. And Pinkie, we gotta go to my favorite donut shop.

speaker: Spike
text: Then let's get moving! Hyah!

speaker: Caramel
text: Excuse me!?

speaker: Lucky Clover
text: If you weren't friends with our neighbor Rarity... Hmph.

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa! You all look... amazing!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can't believe we're finally here. With all that we've imagined, the reality of this night is sure to make this... The Best Night Ever!

text: Princess Celestia!

text: Twilight! It is so lovely to see my star student.

text: Oh, I'm so excited to be here! We have so much to catch up on.

text: Well, I want you right by my side the entire evening, so we'll have plenty of time together.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's just what I was hoping you'd say.

text: [gasp] [squeals of excitement] Hurry, Rarity... Oh, but not too fast. But don't wanna lose him... WAIT! Have to play it cool. Oh, but don't be cold! I can't lose him, I can't! He's everything I imagined! Even *better* than I imagined.

text: Howdy, partner! You hungry?

speaker: Soarin
text: As a horse!

text: Well, what'cha hankering for? Caramel apple? Apple pie? Apple fritter? Apple fries?

text: I'll take that big apple pie!

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, thank you kindly, sir! Yee-haw! In the first minute, I made my first sale. Just like I expected.

text: Always hungry after a show. Eh, Soarin?

speaker: Soarin
text: Heh. Yeah! [gasp] My pie! You saved it. Thanks.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, no prob.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Hey! I know you. You're the pony that saved us in Cloudsdale and won The Best Flyer Competition.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hay yeah! Name's Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Well, Rainbow Dash. Looks like your skills saved us again. Oh, well, at least they saved Soarin's apple pie.

text: [OMNOM] Yeah... [NOMNOMNOM...]

text: Wanna come hang out with us?

text: Sure. Why not? I'm... hanging... with the... Wonderbolts! [squee, giggle]

text: The shiny dance floor... The pretty party ponies... Ooh, the fancy band... Shiny! Pretty! Fancy! [anxious noise] GOTTA DANCE!

I'm at the Grand Galloping Gala,
I'm at the Grand Galloping Gala,

*[pause]*

text: Well, hello. I am Prince Blueblood.

text: I am... Rarity. Oh my, what a lovely rose.

text: You mean... this rose? Thank you. It goes with my eyes.

text: [gasp] My little meadowlark is right around this bend!

text: Was that you?

text: Yep! I love whistlin' while I work. [whistles]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh! Yes... Well... Excuse me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh! I see a toco toucan! And a spider monkey! And, oh! Is that a wallaroo? Oh, Fluttershy. You're such a loudmouth.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, Spitfire! You ever done a rain cloud double backflip? [to Soarin] You ever soared past lightning? It's awesome!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Welcome to the Grand Galloping Gala.

text: Princess! I've been so excited to spend time with you and...

text: Yes. Me too, Twi... Oh, good evening! Welcome to the Gala. Which is why I... Ladies! Lovely to see you again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] Looks like getting a chance to talk to the Princess is gonna be a magic trick in itself.

speaker: Applejack
text: First minute, first sale. Second... Fourth... Sixth... Sixtieth minute... no sales. [sigh] This ain't what I expected at all.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm at the Grand Galloping Gala... and it's not what I dreamed.

speaker: Rarity
text: This isn't at all what I imagined.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: [in background] Good evening! So nice to see you. Welcome!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This isn't what I hoped.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This isn't hanging out.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: This isn't what I wished for.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No!

speaker: Rarity
text: I waited all my life...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: ...for this moment!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And I'm not going to...

text: Gotcha! It's okay. I promise not to hurt you. I just wanna be your... friend?

text: Ahem.

text: Ahem.

text: AHEM!

text: [sigh] I'm going to have to pay, aren't I?

text: [barf] Oh! Fritters! Dumplings! Caramel apples! My royal lips have touched common carnival fare! I'm going to the buffet for some... hors d'oeuvres.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, no wonder nopony wants my food. They're fillin' up on those fancy-schmancy vittles. Well, my down-home apples are plenty good enough for this crowd. I'll just dress 'em up a bit and prove it to 'em.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'll catch you yet, my pretties. Oh yes. As soon as one of you little *birds* or *monkeys* or *bears* touches this net... you'll be MINE! MINE!!! [evil laugh] Whoa!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Come on, everypony! You wanted a partay? Now it's paaartaaay! Yeah! Uh! Now that's a beat, yeah! Uh! C'mon, dance! Yeah, woohoo!

speaker: Applejack
text: Okay, all you high-class ponies. Here's a highfalutin apple cake for your hoity-toity taste buds.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: STAGE DIVE!

speaker: Rarity
text: [angry growl] You, sir, are the most *uncharming* prince I have *ever met*! In fact, the only thing royal about you is that you are a *royal pain*!

text: Ewww...! Uh, stay back! I just had myself groomed!

text: This is my chance! Yes! Whoa!

text: Well... it can't get any worse.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You're... going to *LOVE ME!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, um, uh... Eugh.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Run.

text: [shriek] No! Ugh! Let's go!

text: Don't you think you've had enough?

speaker: Spike
text: Another donut! Extra sprinkles!

speaker: Joe
text: Twilight Sparkle! Ha, ha. Long time no see.

text: Hey, how was the Gala? How was your best night ever?

text: That sounds like the *worst* night ever!

text: I just hope Princess Celestia isn't upset with us for ruining the Gala.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: That was the best Grand Galloping Gala ever!

speaker: Everypony
text: Princess Celestia!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pardon me, Princess, but tonight was just awful.

text: Oh, Twilight. The Grand Galloping Gala is always awful.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It is?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: That is why I was thrilled you were all attending. I was hoping you could liven things up a bit. And while the evening may not have gone as you planned, I'm sure you'll agree that in the end it didn't turn out so bad for this group of friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're right, Princess. *Friends have a way of making even the worst of times into something pretty great.*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Talking!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Laughing!

speaker: Spike

text: As horrible as our night was...

speaker: Rarity

text: In fact, it's made it...

Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
